45012010	Á na yɩ ko-biǝ daanɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn, á taá soe daanɩ dɩ á wʋrʋ maama, sɩ á taá nɩgɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ.
45012011	Á na tʋŋɩ á pa Wɛ te tɩn, á yɩ pa yawɔrɔ zʋ abam. Kwe-na á bɩcara maama á taá maa tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
45012012	Á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo kʋ ŋwaanɩ. Yaara na yi abam, sɩ á vɔ pu-dɩa. Kwaanɩ-na á taá loori Wɛ maŋa maama.
45012013	Cɛ-na á wǝǝnu á ma zǝni balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ yinigǝ jɩgɩ-ba tɩn. Á taá jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ á sam nɩ.
45012014	Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ abam ba bɛɛsɩ tɩn, sɩ á taá loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ. Á nan yɩ sɔɔlɩ á cɔgɩ-ba.
45012015	Kɩ-na wʋpolo dɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ wʋpolo tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á wǝli dɩ balʋ na keeri tɩn á keeri.
45012016	Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ. Á yɩ taá kɩ kamunni. Tu-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á taá tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-balɛ dɩ. Á yɩ taá bʋŋɩ á pa á jɩgɩ swan.
45012017	Nɔɔnʋ na kɩ abam lwarɩm, á dɩ daa yɩ joori á kɩ-o lwarɩm á ma ŋwɩ. Nan kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn nɔɔna maama yigǝ nɩ.
45012018	Kwaanɩ-na lanyɩranɩ sɩ á taá zʋʋrɩ dɩ ywǝǝni nɔɔna maama tɩtarɩ nɩ, nɩ á na waɩ te tɩn.
45012019	A badon-sonnu-ba, á yɩ taá bʋŋɩ sɩ á kɩ balʋ na kɩ abam lwarɩm tɩn dɩ lwarɩm. Nan yagɩ-na, sɩ Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm wʋ́ ba ba baŋa. Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ Baŋa-Wɛ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ nɔɔna dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn. Amʋ wʋ́ pa ba joori ba na kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩn.»
45012020	Kʋ nan ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ dʋm kana na wɔɛ, sɩ n pa-o wʋdiu sɩ o di. Na-nyɔm na jɩg-o, sɩ n pa-o na sɩ o nyɔ. N na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa cavɩɩra tiini ya ja-o.»
45012021	Abam nan yɩ pa lwarɩm wanɩ abam. Á taá kɩ kǝm-laarʋ sɩ tɩ wanɩ lwarɩm dam tɩ cɔgɩ.
45013001	Abam maama maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ dɩdɛɛra balʋ na te á tɩɩnɩ dɩm tɩn ni, bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ba jɩgɩ dam sɩ o taa te o doŋ yɩ Wɛ wʋ pɛ kʋ tu cwǝŋǝ. Dɩdɛɛra balʋ na wʋra tɩn yɩ Wɛ mʋ tiŋi-ba.
45013002	Wʋlʋ maama na vɩn dɩdɛɛra bam kʋntʋ ni tɩn, kʋ tu vɩn cwǝŋǝ kalʋ Wɛ na tiŋi tɩn mʋ. Balʋ na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn wʋ́ na cam.
45013003	Dɩdɛɛra bam nan ba paɩ fʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ balʋ na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn. Fʋʋnɩ jɩgɩ balʋ na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn mʋ. Nmʋ na ba lagɩ sɩ fʋʋnɩ taa jɩgɩ-m dɩ dɩdɛɛra bam, n maŋɩ sɩ n ta n kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ sɩ kʋ pa n na zulǝ ba tee nɩ.
45013004	Wɛ nan tiŋi dɩdɛɛra bam sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ ba pa-DƖ abam zǝnǝ ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Abam nan na kɩ wo-balwaarʋ, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩdɛɛra bam sɩɩnɩ ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba pa nɔɔna na cam. Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ Wɛ na tiŋi sɩ ba tɔgɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ ba ma pa balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm tɩn na cam.
45013005	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ á maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ ba ni. Kʋ daɩ ba na wʋ́ pa á na cam tɩn yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ. Á sɛ-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ á ye á bɩcara nɩ, nɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ mʋ.
45013006	Kʋ ta yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ á maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ lampoo. Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩdɛɛra bam tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ mʋ, dɩ ba na kwaanɩ ba tʋŋɩ te tɩn.
45013007	Nan taá ŋwɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na maŋɩ sɩ ba joŋi á tee nɩ tɩn á pa-ba. Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na joŋi á yuu lampoo tɩn, naa wʋlʋ dɩ na joŋi á wǝǝnu lampoo tɩn, sɩ á ŋwɩ á lampoo maama á pa-ba. Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ á taá kwar-o tɩn, sɩ á taá kwar-o. Kʋ na yɩ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ tɩn, sɩ á taá zul-o.
45013008	Abam nan yɩ taá jɩgɩ-na nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ woŋo jɩnɩ, jɩnɩ dɩlʋ á na wʋ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á taá soe á donnǝ. Wʋlʋ maama na soe o doŋ tɩn sɩɩnɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm dɩ DƖ niǝ yam mʋ.
45013009	Wɛ cullu tɩm brɩ nɩ: «Yɩ kɩ boorim, yɩ gʋ nɔɔnʋ, yɩ ŋɔnɩ, yɩ pa n yi zʋ n donnǝ wǝǝnu.» Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ dɩdaanɩ Wɛ niǝ yam maama nan tɔgɩ ni dɩdʋa mʋ. Ni dɩntʋ nan mʋ wɩ: «Ta n soe n doŋ nɩ n tɩtɩ te.»
45013010	Nmʋ na soe n doŋ, n daa n bá wanɩ n kɩ-o balɔrɔ. Wʋlʋ na soe o doŋ tɩn sɩɩnɩ o kɩ Wɛ niǝ yam na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ.
45013011	Á taá kɩ-na kʋntʋ, sɩ abam ye maŋa kalʋ wʋnɩ dɩ́ na wʋra tɩn. Maŋa yi sɩ á zaŋɩ á yagɩ dɔɔm. Maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ vrɩ dɩbam tɩn daarɩ fɩɩn sɩ ka yi, yɩ kʋ daa daɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ dɛɛn na puli dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn.
45013012	Maŋa kam daarɩ fɩɩn sɩ ka yi, nɩ tɩga na lagɩ ka pʋʋrɩ te tɩn. Tɩtɩɩ dɩm lagɩ dɩ kɛ sɩ wɩa pooni ba. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á pa dɩ́ yagɩ kikiǝ yalʋ maama na yɩ lim nyɩm tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ ma Wɛ dam dɩm dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ pooni cwǝŋǝ kam.
45013013	Pa-na dɩ́ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ balʋ na wʋ pooni wʋnɩ te tɩn. Á nan pa-na dɩ́ yagɩ nɔn-kwǝlim dɩ sa-nyɔrɩ dɩ boorim dɩ wo-digiru kikiǝ maama. Á yɩ taá jaanɩ daanɩ naa á taá kɩ wʋ-gʋʋ daanɩ.
45013014	Pa-na abam ŋwɩa kam dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwɩa kam taa yɩ bɩdwɩ. Nan yɩ pa-na á wʋbʋŋa taa tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ á fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
45014001	Joŋi-na nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn lanyɩranɩ. Á nan yɩ magɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ o na bʋŋɩ te tɩn.
45014002	Nɔɔnʋ wʋra o wʋbʋŋa na bɩga Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, kʋ ma pa o ba culi kʋlʋkʋlʋ dim. Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ wʋra o wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ yɩ kʋ pa o culi nwam.
45014003	Wʋlʋ nan na waɩ o di woŋo maama tɩn yɩ zaŋɩ o gooni wʋlʋ wʋm o na ba di woŋo maama tɩn. Wʋlʋ dɩ nan na ba di woŋo maama tɩn yɩ zaŋɩ o co wʋlʋ na di woŋo maama tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ o dɩ yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ mʋ.
45014004	Nmʋ yɩ wɔɔ mʋ sɩ n co nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ tɩntʋŋnʋ? Kʋ yɩ o tɩtɩ yuutu wʋm mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o nii o kɩ cɩga naa o wʋ kɩ. Wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔnʋ tɩn kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ wanɩ o pa o taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ.
45014005	Nɔɔnʋ wʋra o na lɩ dɛ o pa dɩ dwe da yadonnǝ yam. Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ dɩ maa wʋra o na ba kuri da yam daanɩ. Nɔɔnʋ maama nan maŋɩ sɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ o na ye o bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
45014006	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kuri dɛ sɩ dɩ taa yɩ da-kamunu tɩn yǝni o kɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Wʋlʋ na di woŋo maama tɩn kɩ kʋntʋ o ma zuli dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm mʋ, o na yǝni o kɩ Wɛ le wʋdiu kʋm baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wʋlʋ dɩ nan na ba di woŋo maama tɩn dɩ kɩ kʋntʋ o ma zuli dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm mʋ, yɩ o dɩ kɩ Wɛ le kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
45014007	Dɩbam wʋlʋwʋlʋ ba ŋwɩ o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ wʋlʋ nan na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋ ta daɩ o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ.
45014008	Dɩ́ zɩ na ŋwɩ, dɩ́ ŋwɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Dɩ́ nan zɩ na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋ ta yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ na ŋwɩ naa dɩ́ na tɩga, dɩ́ ta yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna mʋ.
45014009	Zezi Krisi tɩgɩ yɩ o joori o bi o na ŋwɩa, sɩ o taa yɩ twa dɩ naŋʋna Yuutu mʋ.
45014010	Kʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ n co n ko-bu? Sɩ nmʋ dɩ, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ n gooni n ko-bu? Dɩbam maama nan lagɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ DƖ di dɩbam taanɩ.
45014011	Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, nɩ Baŋa-Wɛ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ na yɩ ŋwɩa tu tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ, nɔɔna maama wʋ́ ba ba kuni doonǝ amʋ yigǝ nɩ, yɩ bá ta dɩ ba niǝ jaja, nɩ amʋ mʋ yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ.»
45014012	Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama lagɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama ta kʋlʋ o na kɩ tɩn.
45014013	Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ daa yɩ ta co dɩ́ donnǝ. Nan lɩ-na wʋbʋŋa sɩ á yɩ kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa á ko-bu tusi naa o yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm tɩn.
45014014	Amʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, amʋ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ wʋdiu tǝrǝ kʋ tɩtɩ na yɩ wo-digiru Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Nɔɔnʋ nan na pɛ woŋo kʋlʋ yɩ culu, kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ culu mʋ kʋ pa nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ.
45014015	Nmʋ nan na pɛ n ko-bu wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ n na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ n daa n ba tɔgɩ sono cwǝŋǝ mʋ. Yɩ pa nmʋ na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn cɔgɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩ Wɛ daanɩ, yɩ o yɩ wʋlʋ Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ o ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
45014016	Yɩ pa nɔɔna na cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba co woŋo kʋlʋ na lana dɩ nmʋ tɩn.
45014017	Dɩbam na yɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm nɔɔna te tɩn ba tɔgɩ wʋdiiru dim ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ nan tɔgɩ dɩ́ na kɩ cɩga Wɛ yigǝ nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ wʋpolo, nɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ dɩbam te tɩn.
45014018	Wʋlʋ maama nan na tʋŋɩ o pa Zezi Krisi kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ́ poli Wɛ wʋ, yɩ nɔɔna dɩ wʋ́ pa-o cɩga.
45014019	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ maama na paɩ nɔɔna jɩgɩ ywǝǝni daanɩ yɩ kʋ zǝni-ba sɩ ba bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn.
45014020	Yɩ pa wʋdiiru dim cɔgɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa. Wʋdiiru maama maŋɩ dim mʋ. Nmʋ nan na di kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa n doŋ wʋ cɔgɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, sɩ n yagɩ kʋ dim.
45014021	Kʋ lana sɩ n yɩ kɩ kʋlʋ maama na wʋ́ pa n ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ nwana dim naa sana nyɔm naa kʋlʋ maama dɩ.
45014022	Nmʋ na ye kʋlʋ n wʋbʋŋa nɩ kantʋ laŋa nɩ tɩn, ta n jɩgɩ-kʋ nmʋ dɩ Wɛ laŋa nɩ. Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ye kʋlʋ na lana sɩ o kɩ yɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋa yale kʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu jɩgɩ yu-yoŋo.
45014023	Kʋ daarɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ bʋbwɛa dɩ o na di wʋdiu kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu bá na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ. Kʋ brɩ nɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa o dim dɩm wʋnɩ. Woŋo kʋlʋ maama nmʋ na wʋ́ kɩ yɩ n ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa tɩn, kʋ yɩ lwarɩm mʋ.
45015001	Dɩbam balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá wǝli balʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ tɩn mʋ, ba wʋbʋŋa ta na bwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ na poli dɩbam yɩranɩ wʋrʋ tɩn.
45015002	Dɩbam maama nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ poli dɩ́ donnǝ wʋrʋ tɩn mʋ, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ mʋ sɩ kʋ pa ba fɔgɩ ba bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ.
45015003	Zezi Krisi dɛɛn nan wʋ kɩ kʋlʋ na poli o yɩranɩ wʋ tɩn, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Trʋ tɩlʋ nɔɔna na twɩ nmʋ Baŋa-Wɛ tɩn mʋ joori tɩ tʋ amʋ yuu nɩ.»
45015004	Kʋlʋ maama dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ kʋ taa brɩ dɩbam Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ na pu-dɩa dɩ baarɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ.
45015005	Wɛ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna pu-dɩa dɩ baarɩ tɩn, yɩ dɩntʋ wʋ́ pa á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na lagɩ te tɩn.
45015006	Kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa abam maama sɛ daanɩ yɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni dɩdwɩ á ma zuli Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko tɩn.
45015007	Joŋi-na daanɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na joŋi abam te tɩn. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ.
45015008	Amʋ nan lagɩ a ta abam nɩ Zezi Krisi tu sɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Zwifǝbam mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na goni ni dɩ ba nabaara bam te tɩn sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu.
45015009	O tum dɩm ta yɩ sɩ kʋ pa dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam dɩ mʋ ba ba zuli Wɛ DƖ na jɩgɩ ba yibwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ wǝli dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam a zuli nmʋ, yɩ a leeni a tee nmʋ yɩrɩ.»
45015010	Kʋ ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam wǝli-na dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama á taá kɩ wʋpolo.»
45015011	Kʋ ta wɩ: «Abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam maama taá zuli-na Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ. Pa-na lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama taa tee-DƖ.»
45015012	Ezayidɩ dɛɛn tagɩ o wɩ: «Zesedwi dɩm tu dɩdʋa wʋ́ zaŋɩ o ba sɩ o taa te lʋgʋ baŋa dwi tiinǝ maama, yɩ bantʋ wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ tɩɩna o ŋwaanɩ.»
45015013	Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ á jɩgɩ tɩɩna tɩn wʋ́ pa á tiini á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ wʋ-zuru, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ Joro kʋm dam laan wʋ́ pa á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Wɛ te tɩn fɔgɩ kʋ puli kʋ ja gaalɩ.
45015014	A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ tɩtɩ ye nɩ abam kɩ kǝm-laarʋ zanzan mʋ, yɩ á tiini á jɩgɩ yǝno kʋ paɩ á waɩ á brɩ daanɩ dɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
45015015	Amʋ pʋpʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩdonnǝ dɩ baarɩ mʋ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ, sɩ a maa guli abam wǝǝnu tɩlʋ á na maŋɩ á zaasɩ tɩn. Amʋ pʋpʋnɩ kʋntʋ dɩ Wɛ na pɛ-nɩ yu-yoŋo,
45015016	sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ. Amʋ na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn yɩ sɩ a yǝni a tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi dwi-gɛ tiinǝ a kɩ-ba Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ ba pa DƖ wʋ poli, DƖ Jorokʋm na fɔgɩ kʋ kwɛ ba bɩcara tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
45015017	Kʋntʋ, amʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, a kɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn.
45015018	Amʋ nan ba jɩgɩ baarɩ sɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ, kʋ na daɩ Zezi Krisi na mɛ amʋ o kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩranɩ. Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ pɛ kʋ tɔgɩ dɩ a ni-taanɩ dɩ a tɩtʋŋa yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam sɛ Wɛ.
45015019	Ba ma sɛ Wɛ dɩ DƖ na dɛ DƖ Joro kʋm dam ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa ba na wo-kɩnkagɩla dɩ maana yalʋ na brɩ DƖ dam tɩn. Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ amʋ zɩgɩ Zeruzalɛm nɩ a tʋlɩ je sɩm maama a vu a yi Yiliiri, yɩ a brɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ maama na yɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam nyɩm tɩn.
45015020	Maŋa maama amʋ lagɩ sɩ a kwaanɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam je sɩlʋ nɩ, ba daa ta na wʋ ni Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm da tɩn mʋ. Amʋ ba lagɩ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ-ka je sɩlʋ nɩ, ba na maŋɩ ba ni-ka tɩn, sɩ kʋ yɩ taa nyɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ kǝbrǝ yuu nɩ mʋ amʋ tu a lɔ,
45015021	nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Ba ta na wʋ tɔɔlɩ o kwǝrǝ ba brɩ balʋ tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ba lwarɩ-ka. Balʋ ta na wʋ ni o ŋwa tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ba ni o cɩga kam kuri.»
45015022	Mʋ kʋ kuri amʋ gɛ laŋa kuni zanzan sɩ a ba abam te.
45015023	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, je sɩm kʋntʋ nɩ jǝgǝ daa tǝrǝ ba na wʋ ni Zezi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam da. Abam fra na maŋɩ ya jɩgɩ amʋ bɩna zanzan sɩ a ba a na abam tɩn,
45015024	amʋ laan bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba maŋa kalʋ a na lagɩ a zaŋɩ a vu Ɛsɩpanyɩ tɩn. Amʋ lagɩ sɩ a tɔgɩ abam te, sɩ a wanɩ a kɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam maŋa fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ á laan wanɩ á wǝli-nɩ sɩ a kwe cwǝŋǝ a kɛ.
45015025	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ amʋ lagɩ a vu Zeruzalɛm mʋ, sɩ a tʋŋɩ a wǝli Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ dáanɩ tɩn.
45015026	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Masɩdʋanɩ dɩ Akayi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn mʋ mɛ ba wʋbʋŋa ba la sǝbu, sɩ ba ma wǝli Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Zeruzalɛm nɩ yɩ yinigǝ jɩgɩ-ba tɩn.
45015027	Kʋ yɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ ba wʋbʋŋa ba kɩ kʋntʋ. Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ ba wǝli-ba kʋntʋ doŋ, bɛŋwaanɩ Zwifǝ bam ya maŋɩ ba kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ Jorona pɛ-ba tɩn mʋ ba cɛ dɩ dwi-gɛtiinǝ bam. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam maŋɩ sɩ ba dɩ daa wǝli Zwifǝ bam dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ ba yɩra zǝnǝ nyɩm tɩn.
45015028	Amʋ na ti tɩtʋŋɩ dɩntʋ yɩ a kwe sǝbu kʋm maama a kɩ nɔɔna bam jɩŋa nɩ, amʋ laan wʋ́ tɔgɩ abam te, yɩ a daarɩ a kɛ a vu Ɛsɩpanyɩ.
45015029	Amʋ nan ye nɩ, a na tu abam te, Zezi Krisi wʋ́ kɩ abam lanyɩranɩ kʋ ja gaalɩ.
45015030	A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ nan lagɩ a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ sono kʋlʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ dɩbam tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á tɔgɩ á wǝli-nɩ á taá tiini á loori Wɛ á pa-nɩ a tɩtʋŋ-cɛɛra yam wʋnɩ.
45015031	Loori-na Wɛ, sɩ DƖ joŋi-nɩ balʋ na wʋ Zude nɩ yɩ ba vɩn Zezi tɩn jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa Zezi nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Zeruzalɛm nɩ tɩn joŋi kʋlʋ amʋ na wʋ́ pa-ba tɩn dɩ wʋpolo.
45015032	Wɛ na sɛ, amʋ laan wʋ́ wanɩ a ba abam te dɩ wʋpolo, yɩ a di ywǝǝni dɩ abam.
45015033	Bɩcarɩ-zuru Tu Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ ta wʋ abam tee nɩ. Amina.
45016001	Amʋ nan lagɩ a brɩ abam dɩ́ ko-bu Feebe na yɩ wʋlʋ tɩn mʋ. Wʋntʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ na tʋŋɩ o wǝli Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ Sankrɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ.
45016002	Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á joŋ-o lanyɩranɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ, nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna taa kɩ te tɩn. Á taá wǝl-o dɩ kʋlʋ maama o na lagɩ abam tee nɩ tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ o tɩtɩ dɩ zǝni nɔɔna zanzan, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ dɩ amʋ dɩ.
45016003	Jɔɔnɩ-na Prisili dɩ Akwila á pa-nɩ. Bantʋ mʋ tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa Zezi Krisi.
45016004	Ba ya gɛ fɩɩn sɩ ba tɩ amʋ ŋwaanɩ. Amʋ nan kɩ-ba le, kʋ nan daɩ amʋ yɩranɩ, kʋ yɩ dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ maama na tu ba sɛ Zezi tɩn dɩ mʋ kɩ-ba le.
45016005	Jɔɔnɩ-na Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na jeeri ba sɔŋɔ kʋm nɩ tɩn á pa-nɩ. Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ ciloŋ-sono Yipayinɛtɩ á pa-nɩ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na dɛ yigǝ o sɛ Zezi Krisi Azi tɩɩnɩ dɩm maama wʋnɩ tɩn.
45016006	Jɔɔnɩ-na Mari wʋlʋ na tiini o tʋŋɩ o pa abam tɩn dɩ.
45016007	Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ dwi tiinǝ Andronikusi dɩ Zuniyasɩ. Bantʋ mʋ ya tɔgɩ ba wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ dɩ amʋ. Ba yɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ yɩr-ŋʋm Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam wʋnɩ, yɩ bantʋ sɛ Zezi Krisi ba loori amʋ.
45016008	Jɔɔnɩ-na Ampiliatusi wʋlʋ na yɩ a ciloŋ-sono dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn á pa-nɩ.
45016009	Jɔɔnɩ-na Yuribɛn wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtʋŋa tɩn, dɩdaanɩ amʋ ciloŋ-sono Sɩtakisi dɩ.
45016010	Jɔɔnɩ-na Apeeli wʋlʋ na brɩ nɩ o yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga tɩn á pa-nɩ. Jɔɔnɩ-na Arisobuli sɔŋɔ tiinǝ bam dɩ.
45016011	Jɔɔnɩ-na amʋ dwi tu Erodiyɔn á pa-nɩ. Jɔɔnɩ-na balʋ na yɩ Narisisi sɔŋɔ tiinǝ yɩ ba yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn á pa-nɩ.
45016012	Jɔɔnɩ-na Trifɛnɩ dɩ Trifɔsɩ, bantʋ mʋ yɩ kaana balʋ na tiini ba tʋŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩtʋŋa yam tɩn. Jɔɔnɩ-na a ko-bu-sono Pɛɛrsidi, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ na tiini o tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
45016013	Jɔɔnɩ-na Rufusi wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩntʋŋ-ŋʋm tɩn, dɩ o nu wʋlʋ na kɩ amʋ lanyɩranɩ nɩ o tɩtɩ bu te tɩn.
45016014	Jɔɔnɩ-na Asɩnkriti dɩ Filigon dɩ Ɛrmɛsɩ dɩ Patrobasɩ dɩ Ɛrmasɩ, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ maama na wʋ ba tee nɩ tɩn.
45016015	Jɔɔnɩ-na Filologi dɩ Zuli, dɩ Neere dɩ o nakɔ, dɩ Olimpa, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ maama na wʋ ba tee nɩ tɩn.
45016016	Á na jeeri daanɩ, sɩ á taá jɔɔnɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-poŋo. Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm na wʋ je sɩlʋ maama nɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
45016017	A ko-biǝ-ba, a nan loori abam sɩ á fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ balʋ na jaanɩ kampwara ba tui nɔɔna tɩtarɩ, yɩ ba paɩ ba tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn. Bantʋ mʋ jɩgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ ba na brɩ abam tɩn ba yáala. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ja-na á tɩtɩ dɩ ba.
45016018	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ doŋ ba kɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, ba tɔgɩ ba tɩtɩ fra na zʋʋrɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn mʋ. Ba yǝni ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtar-ywe mʋ, yɩ ba ma ni-sʋŋɩ ba ma ganɩ balʋ na ba va ni tɩn ba pa ba wʋbʋŋa lǝni.
45016019	Nɔɔna maama ye abam na tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ mʋ paɩ amʋ tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam. Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam taá jɩgɩ swan mʋ sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á taá ye á tɩtɩ sɩ lwarɩm yɩ cɔgɩ abam.
45016020	Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna wʋ-zuru tɩn bá daanɩ DƖ cɔgɩ sʋtaanɩdam, yɩ DƖ laan pa á nɔ-dɩ dɩ á nɛ. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
45016021	Timoti wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ o tʋŋɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam. Amʋ dwi tiinǝ Lukiyusi dɩ Zazɔn dɩ Sosipatɛɛrɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
45016022	Amʋ Tɛrɩtiyusi mʋ pʋpʋnɩ Pooli ni-taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ o pa abam, amʋ dɩ nan jɔɔnɩ abam dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ.
45016023	Gayusi wʋlʋ amʋ Pooli na zʋʋrɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm dɩ jeeri da tɩn jɔɔnɩ abam. Erasɩtɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ tɩʋ kʋm sǝbu-tiŋnu tɩn, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Kwatusi dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam. [
45016024	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo. Amina.]
45016025	Dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le, dɩntʋ dam dɩm mʋ paɩ á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á na sɛ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋntʋ mʋ abam laan tu á lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn ya na sǝgi faŋa faŋa tɩn.
45016026	Lele kʋntʋ Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na pʋpʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba tiŋi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, DƖ pa DƖ cɩga kam kʋntʋ ba ka lwarɩ jaja. Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn laan mʋ pɛ ni, sɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama na cwǝŋǝ ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam, sɩ ba daarɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ ba sɛ DƖ ni.
45016027	Dɩntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ yɩ swan maama tu, yɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ doŋ. Dɩntʋ mʋ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ. Amina.
46001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Sositɛnɩ dɩ tɔgɩ o wǝli-nɩ.
46001002	Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ na yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Korɛntɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ. Abam mʋ yɩ balʋ Wɛ na kuri sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn. DƖ ma lɩ abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, kʋ wǝli dɩ balʋ na wʋ je maama yɩ ba zuli Zezi Krisi tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ bantʋ dɩ dɩbam maama Yuutu.
46001003	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
46001004	Maŋa maama a yǝni a kɩ Wɛ le abam ŋwaanɩ, dɩ DƖ na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
46001005	Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn, Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ pa abam yu-yoŋo woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ á taá ye DƖ cɩga kam maama, sɩ á kwǝri á taá waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm.
46001006	Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ dɛɛn na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam dɩ abam tɩn, ka tiini ka ja kuri abam tee nɩ.
46001007	Á nɛ Wɛ pɛɛra yalʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, yɩ á cǝgi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sɩ o joori o ba sɩ dɩ́ na-o.
46001008	Wʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa á taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ kʋ vu yi tiim maŋa, sɩ á yɩ taá jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ dɛ dɩm o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn nɩ.
46001009	Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩ DƖ Bu Zezi Krisi, o na yɩ dɩbam Yuutu tɩn.
46001010	A ko-biǝ-ba, a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni-mɔrɔ, sɩ á yɩ taá pɔɔrɩ daanɩ. Á nan kwaanɩ-na á kɩ á wʋbʋŋa daanɩ, sɩ á kɩ ni dɩdwɩ.
46001011	A tagɩ kʋntʋ, Klowe-ba sɔŋɔ tiinǝ na tagɩ dɩ amʋ ba wɩ á magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ daanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46001012	Abam badaara wɩ, á tɔgɩ Pooli mʋ. Abam badonnǝ maa wɩ, á tɔgɩ Apolɔsɩ mʋ. Badonnǝ maa wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ mʋ. Babam dɩ maa wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ.
46001013	Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi pɔɔrɩ yɩra yɩra mʋ na? Amʋ Pooli mʋ tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagarakam baŋa nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ na? Ba miisi abam na wʋnɩ amʋ yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
46001014	A kɩ Wɛ le, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ wʋ miisi abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ na wʋnɩ, kʋ na daɩ Krisipu dɩ Gayusi yɩranɩ.
46001015	Kʋntʋ tɩn, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o ta nɩ a miisi abam na wʋnɩ amʋ yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
46001016	Ah, a guli a ta na miisi Sɩtefanasɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ dɩ, kʋ daarɩ kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, wʋlʋ na wǝli da, a daa wʋ guli.
46001017	Zezi Krisi tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ o kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ a brɩ nɔɔna, sɩ o wʋ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa miisi nɔɔna na wʋnɩ. A na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan mʋ a maa tɔɔlɩ-ka. A ya na tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan mʋ, Zezi tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn ya bá ta jɩgɩ kuri kʋ paɩ nabiinǝ.
46001018	Bɛŋwaanɩ Zezi tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn taanɩ dɩm yɩ jwǝrim mʋ balʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ Wɛ tɩn tee nɩ. Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na vrɩ lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn, taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ dam mʋ dɩ dɩbam.
46001019	Kʋ nan maŋɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ swan tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa, yɩ a daarɩ a pa yi-pʋrɩ-nyɩna yi-pʋrʋ kʋm yáalɩ.»
46001020	Swan tiinǝ swan yam daa jɩgɩ kuri na? Tɔn-yeenǝ dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na ye ŋwaŋa tɩn yi-pʋrʋ kʋm jɩgɩ kuri na? Wɛ nan brɩ dɩbam nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan yam maama yɩ jwǝrim mʋ.
46001021	Wɛ swan yam ŋwaanɩ nabiinǝ bá wanɩ ba ma ba tɩtɩ swan ba lwarɩ-DƖ. Wɛ nan lɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ tɔgɩ kwǝrǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na brɩ nɔɔna yɩ ba paɩ ka yɩ jwǝrim tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, DƖ ma vrɩ balʋ na sɛ kwǝrǝ kam tɩn DƖ yagɩ.
46001022	Zwifǝ bam lagɩ sɩ ba na wo-kɩnkagɩla yalʋ na brɩ Wɛ dam tɩn mʋ. Grɛkɩ tiinǝ maa lagɩ sɩ ba cǝgi taanɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ brɩ-ba swan tɩn.
46001023	Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagarabaŋa nɩ tɩn kwǝrǝ mʋ. Kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ maa yɩ ta-balɔrɔ mʋ Zwifǝ bam tee nɩ, yɩ ka yɩ jwǝrim mʋ dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam dɩ.
46001024	Kʋ daarɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na kuri tɩn, kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ bam naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ dɩ, taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi yɩ Wɛ swan yam dɩ DƖ dam tu.
46001025	Woŋo kʋlʋ nɔɔna na paɩ kʋ yɩ jwǝrim Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn garɩ nabiinǝ swan maama, yɩ kʋlʋ na bwǝmmǝ DƖ tee nɩ tɩn dana kʋ dwe nabiinǝ dam maama.
46001026	A ko-biǝ-ba, á bʋŋɩ á dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ laan ba DƖ kuri abam tɩn. Kʋ daɩ á zanzan yi dɛɛn mʋ pʋʋrɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ nabiinǝ na lagɩ yi-pʋrʋ kʋlʋ tɩn. Kʋ daɩ á zanzan mʋ yɩ dɩdɛɛra, naa á zanzan mʋ nuŋi nadunǝ sam.
46001027	Wɛ nan kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ ba yɩ jwǝǝru tɩn mʋ, sɩ DƖ ma pa cavɩɩra di swan tiinǝ. DƖ ma kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ ba yɩ nabwǝnǝ tɩn, sɩ DƖ ma pa cavɩɩra di dam tiinǝ.
46001028	DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ kuri balʋ nabiinǝ na gooni yɩ ba ba nɩgɩ tɩn, sɩ DƖ ma pa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nabiinǝ na paɩ tɩ jɩgɩ kuri tɩn ji kafɛ.
46001029	Wɛ kuri nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ, sɩ nabiinǝ yɩ zaŋɩ ba wanɩ ba tee ba tɩtɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
46001030	Wɛ nan mʋ pɛ abam ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ swan yalʋ Zezi na joŋi Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn laan jigi dɩbam swan. Wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ. O maa paɩ dɩ́ yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna. O ma kwe o tɩtɩ ŋwɩa o ma vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
46001031	Kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ, dɩ kʋ na wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na lagɩ sɩ o kɩ wʋpolo tɩn, sɩ o pa kʋ taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ.»
46002001	A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ dɛɛn na tu abam te tɩn, a wʋ ŋɔɔnɩ swan naa yiyiu-ŋwɛ zanzan dɩ abam, dɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ abam te tɩn.
46002002	A wʋ kɩ a wʋbʋŋa nɩ sɩ a brɩ abam woŋo kʋdoŋ, kʋ na daɩ Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm yɩranɩ dɩ o tʋʋnɩ dɩm dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn.
46002003	A na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, a bwǝnǝ, yɩ fʋʋnɩ dɩ jɩgɩ-nɩ, yɩ a yɩra saɩ.
46002004	A taanɩ dɩm dɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ swan mʋ a ma a tɔɔlɩ-ka sɩ a pa á sɛ. Kʋ yɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm dam mʋ pɛ abam lwarɩ nɩ taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga.
46002005	Kʋntʋ tɩn, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn, kʋ yɩ Wɛ dam dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ swan ŋwaanɩ.
46002006	Dɩbam nan yǝni dɩ́ brɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ tɩn mʋ swan, ya nan daɩ nabiinǝ swan naa lʋgʋ baŋa dɩdɛɛra bam swan. Bantʋ wʋ́ ba ba cɔgɩ dɩ ba dam dɩm maama.
46002007	Dɩbam na brɩ swan yalʋ tɩn yɩ Wɛ nyɩm mʋ. Nabiinǝ nan yǝri ya ni nɩ, ya na sǝgi dɩ ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ dɛɛn maŋɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa nɩ mʋ kʋ loori lʋgʋ pulim, sɩ DƖ swan yam kʋntʋ pa dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na zulǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
46002008	Lʋgʋ baŋa dɩdɛɛra bam wʋlʋwʋlʋ nan wʋ lwarɩ ya kuri. Ba ya na ye, ba ya bá ja Wɛ-sɔŋɔ paarɩ tu Zezi ba pa tʋʋn-dagarabaŋa nɩ ba gʋ.
46002009	Kʋ nan kɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ fɔgɩ DƖ kɩ wo-laarʋ DƖ tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa balʋ na so-DƖ tɩn. Nabiinǝ yi wʋ nɛ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ, yɩ ba zwa wʋ ni tɩ ŋwa, yɩ ba ba jɩgɩ tɩ wʋbʋŋa dɩ.»
46002010	Wɛ nan tagɩ DƖ Jorokʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ ma pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ. Wɛ Joro kʋm ye woŋo maama kuri, yɩ kʋ ye Wɛ wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ.
46002011	Wɔɔ mʋ wʋ́ wanɩ nabiinu wʋbʋŋa o lwarɩ, kʋ na daɩ o tɩtɩ joro? Kʋ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ Wɛ dɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yǝri Wɛ wʋbʋŋa, kʋ na daɩ DƖ tɩtɩ Joro kʋm yɩranɩ.
46002012	Joro kʋlʋ Wɛ na kɩ dɩbam bɩcara nɩ tɩn daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm. Kʋ nuŋi Wɛ te mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ dɩbam zaanɩ tɩn.
46002013	Dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna cɩga kam yɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ tɩn daɩ nabiinǝ swan taanɩ. Kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ dɩbam taanɩ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn. Dɩbam tɛ cɩga kalʋ na yɩ Wɛ Joro nyɩm tɩn mʋ dɩ́ brɩ balʋ DƖ Joro kʋm na wʋ ba bɩcara nɩ tɩn.
46002014	Wɛ Joro kʋm na tǝri wʋlʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn ba sɛ sɩ o joŋi cɩga kalʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na brɩ tɩn. Ka yɩ wo-jwǝǝru mʋ o tee nɩ. O bá wanɩ o lwarɩ ka kuri, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ ka kuri cɩga cɩga.
46002015	Wʋlʋ maama Wɛ Joro kʋm na wʋ o bɩcarɩ nɩ tɩn mʋ waɩ o ye woŋo maama kuri. Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o na kʋntʋ tu wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
46002016	Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋbʋŋa, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o brɩ-o o na wʋ́ kɩ te tɩn.» Wɛ nan na pɛ dɩbam DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩbam dɩ jɩgɩ Zezi Krisi wʋbʋŋa yam.
46003001	A ko-biǝ-ba, a dɛɛn na wʋ abam tee nɩ tɩn, a warɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ abam nɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm na wʋ balʋ tee nɩ tɩn. A dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ abam nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ balʋ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu fra na jɩgɩ-ba tɩn, yɩ á ta nyɩ nɩ bu-balwa mʋ te Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
46003002	A dɛɛn na brɩ abam wo-mwaalʋ tɩlʋ tɩn nyɩ dɩ a pɛ abam nayɩla mʋ sɩ á nyɔ. A dɛɛn wʋ pɛ abam wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn, á dɛɛn na wʋ yi kʋ dim tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ zɩm dɩ, á daa ta wʋ yi wʋdiu dim,
46003003	bɛŋwaanɩ á ta yɩ balʋ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu fra na jɩgɩ tɩn mʋ. Abam jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ yɩ á magɩ kantɔgɔ daanɩ. Kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ fra mʋ taa jɩgɩ abam, yɩ á kɩ nɩ balʋ ta na yǝri Wɛ tɩn mʋ te. Kʋ yɩ vwan mʋ a fɔgɩ na?
46003004	Abam wʋ nɔɔna badonnǝ na tɛ ba wɩ, bam tɔgɩ Pooli mʋ, yɩ badonnǝ dɩ wɩ, ba tɔgɩ Apolɔsɩ mʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn kikiǝ mʋ kʋntʋ na?
46003005	Wɔɔ mʋ yɩ Apolɔsɩ? Wɔɔ mʋ yɩ amʋ Pooli? Dɩbam maama yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋna balʋ abam na dɛ dɩbam jɩŋa á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ. Dɩbam maama tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na pɛ dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ tɩn mʋ.
46003006	Dɩbam nyɩ nɩ vala mʋ te, amʋ Pooli mʋ jǝri wǝǝnu yɩ Apolɔsɩ yagɩ na. Kʋ daarɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ paɩ tɩ bɩra.
46003007	Mʋ kʋ kuri wʋlʋ na jǝri dɩ wʋlʋ na yagɩ na da tɩn maama daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Wɛ yɩranɩ mʋ waɩ DƖ paɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm kɩ dam nɔɔna bɩcara nɩ.
46003008	Wʋlʋ na jǝri dɩ wʋlʋ na yagɩ na tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ. Wɛ wʋ́ pa ba maama joŋi ba ŋwɩɩrʋ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ ba na tʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ.
46003009	Dɩbam maama wǝli daanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ. Abam nyɩ dɩ Wɛ kara kalʋ dɩ́ na tʋŋɩ ka wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ. Abam daa ta nyɩ dɩ digǝ kalʋ Wɛ na wʋra DƖ lɔ tɩn mʋ.
46003010	Wɛ na pɛ amʋ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ sɩ a ma tʋŋɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ amʋ cwi digǝ kam kuri mʋ lanyɩranɩ nɩ lwar-ŋʋm te. Nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ dɩ maa wʋra o lɔ o daŋɩ da. Wʋlʋ maama nan na lagɩ sɩ o lɔ o daŋɩ da tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye o na lɔ te tɩn mʋ.
46003011	Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pa digǝ kam kuri cwi, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o cwi ka kuri dɩdoŋ. Kuri dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi.
46003012	Balʋ nan na lɔ ba daŋɩ da tɩn badaara maɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa naa can-na naa kandwa-ŋʋna, naa dɛ naa gaarʋ naa kasʋrʋ mʋ ba maa lɔa.
46003013	Nɔɔnʋ maama na tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ tɩn nan wʋ́ ba kʋ lwarɩ jaja dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn, mini mʋ wʋ́ brɩ nɔɔnʋ maama tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te.
46003014	Balʋ na lɔgɩ dɩ wo-laarʋ yɩ mini dɩm wʋ wanɩ dɩ di tɩn wʋ́ joŋi ba ŋwɩɩrʋ.
46003015	Kʋ daarɩ, balʋ mini dɩm na wanɩ dɩ di ba lɔɔm dɩm tɩn, ba bá na kʋlʋkʋlʋ Wɛ tee nɩ. Wɛ za wʋ́ vrɩ ba tɩtɩ DƖ yagɩ. Ba nan wʋ́ ta nyɩ dɩ mini na di nɔɔnʋ yɩ o wǝri te tɩn mʋ.
46003016	Abam yǝri nɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm na wʋ abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn, á nyɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ mʋ DƖ na zʋʋrɩ ka wʋnɩ na?
46003017	Wʋlʋ nan na cɔgɩ Wɛ digǝ kam tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ kʋntʋ tu dɩ mʋ. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ digǝ kam yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ di-laa mʋ. Abam tɩtɩ nan mʋ yɩ DƖ digǝ kam kʋntʋ.
46003018	Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o ganɩ o tɩtɩ. Abam wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ swan nɩ zɩm lʋgʋ baŋa swan na yɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o joori o ji joro mʋ, sɩ o laan wanɩ o na swan cɩga cɩga.
46003019	Bɛŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ baŋa swan yɩ jwǝrim mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wɛ vugimi swan tiinǝ swan DƖ pa ya joori ya ja-ba.»
46003020	Kʋ nan daa ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ ye nɩ swan tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa maama yɩ kafɛ mʋ.»
46003021	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ o ta o wɩ: «Amʋ tɔgɩ wʋntʋ mʋ.» Sɩ woŋo maama yɩ abam mʋ te.
46003022	Kʋ na yɩ amʋ Pooli dɩ Apolɔsɩ dɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ, dɩbam dɩ yɩ abam nɔɔna mʋ. Kʋ nan na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ ŋwɩa dɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ zɩm dɩ jwa dɩ, abam mʋ te tɩ maama.
46003023	Zezi Krisi nan mʋ te abam, yɩ Wɛ dɩ te Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɩ.
46004001	Kʋntʋ tɩn, abam maŋɩ sɩ á taá ye nɩ dɩbam yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna mʋ. Wɛ nan kwe DƖ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi nabiinǝ yigǝ nɩ tɩn DƖ kɩ dɩbam jɩŋa nɩ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ ta-ka dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
46004002	Ba nan na kwe woŋo ba kɩ nɔɔnʋ jɩŋa nɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa nii kʋ baŋa nɩ dɩ cɩga mʋ.
46004003	-
46004004	Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ, abam naa nabiinǝ balʋ maama na di amʋ taanɩ te dɩ te tɩn, kʋ ba kɩ amʋ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Amʋ bɩcarɩ nɩ a ye nɩ, kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ a na kɩ a cɔgɩ. Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, a bá wanɩ a pa a tɩtɩ bʋra, a na bá wanɩ a di a tɩtɩ taanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wʋlʋ yɩranɩ na wʋ́ wanɩ o di amʋ taanɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
46004005	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o wuuri o di o doŋ taanɩ, kʋ loori maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na tuǝ, oó ja pooni o ba o pa woŋo kʋlʋ maama na sǝgi lim wʋnɩ tɩn taa naɩ jaja. Wʋntʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna wʋbʋŋa yalʋ na sǝgi tɩn lwarɩ jaja. Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ pa nɔɔnʋ maama na zulǝ yalʋ na maŋɩ dɩd-o tɩn.
46004006	A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ yɩ abam ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kwe a tɩtɩ dɩdaanɩ Apolɔsɩ a ma maŋɩ a brɩ abam, sɩ á wanɩ á nii dɩbam, á ma lwarɩ á na wʋ́ taá kɩ te tɩn, sɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á gaalɩ kʋlʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ abam dɩdʋa dɩdʋa yɩ zaŋɩ o kɩ kamunni o zuli nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ o daarɩ o gooni o doŋ.
46004007	Wɔɔ mʋ wɩ, nmʋ dwe n doŋ? Bɛɛ mʋ n jɩga yɩ n wʋ joŋi-kʋ Wɛ tee nɩ? Nmʋ nan na joŋi-kʋ Wɛ tee nɩ mʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ kɩa yɩ n magɩ n nyɔɔnɩ kʋ baŋa nɩ, nɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ n dam dɩ n swan n ma n na-kʋ te?
46004008	Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ á maŋɩ á jɩgɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, á kwǝri á yɩ nadunǝ, yɩ á ta bʋŋɩ nɩ abam di paarɩ á daarɩ dɩbam. Kʋ ya lana sɩ á sɩɩnɩ á di paarɩ, sɩ dɩbam dɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩ́ di paarɩ dɩ abam.
46004009	Amʋ na bʋŋɩ te tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ Wɛ pɛ dɩbam balʋ na yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋna tɩn ji kwaga tiinǝ mʋ nɔɔna bam maama wʋnɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ balʋ ba na di ba taanɩ ba lagɩ ba gʋ-ba te tɩn. Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ nɔn-mwaanʋ mʋ lʋgʋ kʋm nɔɔna bam dɩ malɛsɩdɩ yibiyǝ nɩ.
46004010	Dɩbam jigi jwǝǝru mʋ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ, abam nan pa á yɩ swan tiinǝ mʋ Zezi Krisi tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ. Dɩbam yɩ nabwǝnǝ mʋ, abam maa paɩ á yɩ dɩdɛɛra. Nɔɔna zuli abam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba gooni dɩbam.
46004011	Dɩ zɩm maama dɩ, kana dɩ na-nyɔm jɩgɩ dɩbam, yɩ gwaarʋ muri dɩbam. Nɔɔna maa bɛɛsɩ dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ cirigim jǝgǝ.
46004012	Dɩbam maɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ jɩa mʋ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋa, sɩ dɩ́ ma wanɩ dɩ́ na dɩ́ ni wʋdiu. Nɔɔna na twɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ mʋ sɩ DƖ kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ. Nɔɔna na bɛɛsɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ sɛ bɛɛsa yam mʋ.
46004013	Nɔɔna na ŋɔɔnɩ wo-lwaanʋ ba pa dɩbam, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ joori dɩ́ lǝri-ba lanyɩranɩ mʋ. Dɩbam nyɩ dɩ lʋgʋ baŋa weeru mʋ. Dɩ zɩm maama, dɩ́ nyɩ dɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ mʋ nɔɔnʋ maama tee nɩ.
46004014	A na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ tɩn, a pʋpʋnɩ sɩ a ma kwe abam mʋ, á na yɩ amʋ bu-sonnu tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ sɩ a kɩ abam cavɩɩra mʋ.
46004015	Abam ya na maŋɩ á jɩgɩ karanyɩna tiinǝ mʋrr-fugǝ mʋ ba na brɩ abam Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, á ko yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ. Amʋ yɩ á ko, dɩ a na brɩ abam Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam yɩ á na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
46004016	Mʋ kʋ kuri a loori abam sɩ á taá lwǝni amʋ na kɩ te tɩn.
46004017	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tʋŋɩ Timoti á tee nɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ a bu-sono Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ o tɔgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ cɩga. Wʋntʋ wʋ́ guli abam amʋ ŋwɩa kam na yɩ te Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ nɩ amʋ na yǝni a brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm je maama nɩ te tɩn.
46004018	Abam badaara paɩ á tɩtɩ kamunni mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ á daa ba bʋŋɩ nɩ amʋ wʋ́ joori a ba abam te.
46004019	Wɛ nan na sɛ, aá ba abam te lele. A na tuǝ, a laan wʋ́ wanɩ a lwarɩ kamun-nyɩna bam kʋntʋ na jɩgɩ dam dɩlʋ ba ma kɩ tɩn, yɩ kʋ daa daɩ ba ni-ŋwaŋa yɩranɩ má.
46004020	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm paɩ dɩbam dam mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ ma kɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn, sɩ kʋ daɩ ni-ŋwaŋa yɩranɩ má.
46004021	Abam lagɩ sɩ a ba abam te a vaŋɩ á zwɛ mʋ naa á lagɩ sɩ a brɩ abam sono dɩ wʋ-bono mʋ?
46005001	Amʋ nan ni abam labaarɩ nɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ karɩ o boorǝ. Ba wɩ, abam wʋnɩ baarʋ dɩdʋa mʋ tigi dɩ o ko kaanɩ. Balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn dɩ maŋɩ ba ba sɛ ba kɩ wo-zɔɔna yantʋ doŋ.
46005002	O na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á taá paɩ á tɩtɩ kamunni? Kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ á pa á wʋrʋ cɔgɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á lɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na kɩ kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn á wʋnɩ.
46005003	Amʋ tɩtɩ mʋ tǝri abam tee nɩ, sɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama wʋra dɩ abam. Kʋntʋ, a maŋɩ a van baarʋ wʋm kʋntʋ bʋra o cɔgɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ, nɩ a wʋ abam tee nɩ mʋ te.
46005004	-
46005005	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ a lagɩ a ta sɩ, á na jeeri daanɩ, amʋ wʋbʋŋa wʋra dɩ abam nɩ a wʋ á tɩtarɩ mʋ te, sɩ á ma dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dam dɩm á ma kwe nɔɔnʋ wʋntʋ á kɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ, sɩ dɩntʋ wanɩ dɩ cɔgɩ o yɩra dɩ wo-zɔɔna fra yalʋ na jɩg-o tɩn. Á na kɩ kʋntʋ, o joro kʋm laan wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ na vrɩm dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tum dɛ dɩm nɩ.
46005006	Abam na kɩ kamunni te tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ. Á ye nɩ dabɩlɩ fɩnfɩɩn na wʋ dɩpɛ muni dɩlʋ ba na viiri tɩn wʋnɩ, kʋ laan wʋ́ pa dɩ maama fʋlɩ mʋ.
46005007	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, lɩ-na kǝm-lɔŋɔ kʋm kʋntʋ kʋ na nyɩ nɩ dabɩlɩ-doori te tɩn á wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ yɩ loŋi á maama. Kʋntʋ á laan wʋ́ taá yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩpɛ muni dɩlʋ ba na wʋ kɩ dabɩlɩ dɩ wʋnɩ tɩn. Á nan maŋɩ á yɩ nɔn-ŋʋna mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ Pǝlbu Zezi Krisi na kwe o tɩtɩ o ma kaanɩ Wɛ sɩ DƖ yagɩ á lwarɩm mʋ DƖ ma cɛ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46005008	Pa-na dɩ́ di candiǝ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ lɩ lwarɩm dɩdaanɩ tɩtʋŋ-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maama na nyɩ nɩ dabɩlɩ-doori te tɩn dɩ́ wʋnɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo dɩ cɩga, nɩ dɩpɛ dɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ dabɩlɩ dɩ wʋnɩ te tɩn.
46005009	Amʋ dɛɛn na dɛ yigǝ a pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ a pa abam tɩn, a tagɩ dɩ abam sɩ á yɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩdaanɩ balʋ na karɩ ba boori tɩn.
46005010	Amʋ na kaanɩ abam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ yɩ ba boori tɩn, naa ba yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩna naa ŋwɩɩna naa jwǝ-kaana tɩn taanɩ mʋ a tɛa. Abam bá wanɩ á pwɛ á tɩtɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ kʋ na daɩ nɩ á yagɩ lʋgʋ baŋa.
46005011	Amʋ nan na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri mʋ yɩ sɩ á yɩ taá tɔgɩ dɩ wʋlʋ maama na brɩ nɩ o yɩ á ko-bu Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ yɩ o boorǝ, naa o yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm naa jwǝ-kaanʋ naa nɔn-twɩɩnʋ naa sa-nyɔrʋ, naa o yɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ tɩn. Wʋlʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, sɩ á pwɛ á tɩtɩ dɩd-o, sɩ á brɩ á yɩ di wʋdiu dɩd-o dɩ.
46005012	-
46005013	Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na daɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ amʋ wʋ́ di bantʋ taanɩ. Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ wʋ́ di ba taanɩ. Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á di balʋ na wʋ á kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn taanɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Zǝli-na nɔn-balɔrɔ kʋm á wʋnɩ.»
46006001	Abam wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ taanɩ dɩ o doŋ yɩ á yɩ ko-biǝ daanɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ja-o n vu sarɩya-dirǝ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn te, sɩ ba di abam taanɩ dɩm. Kʋʋ́ ta yɩ cavɩɩra mʋ kʋ pa-m, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam mʋ di á taanɩ dɩm.
46006002	Abam yǝri nɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam mʋ wʋ́ ba ba di nabiinǝ maama taanɩ na? Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, bɛɛ mʋ kɩa yɩ á tɩtɩ warɩ á kwɛ wo-balwa balʋ na wʋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn?
46006003	Abam yǝri nɩ dɩbam mʋ wʋ́ di malɛsɩsɩm taanɩ na? Kʋ nan na yɩ kʋntʋ, dɩ́ bá wanɩ zɩm lʋgʋ kʋntʋ taanɩ dɩ́ di na?
46006004	Abam nan na jɩgɩ taanɩ dɩntʋ doŋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ, á wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á ja á vu balʋ na tɔgɩ ba tǝri Zezi nɔɔna bam wʋnɩ tɩn te.
46006005	A tagɩ kʋntʋ sɩ cavɩɩra mʋ ja abam. Kʋntʋ, swan tu dɩ dɩdʋa tǝri abam wʋnɩ sɩ o wanɩ o fɔgɩ abam balʋ na yɩ ko-biǝ Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn daanɩ na?
46006006	Abam na kɩ te tɩn wʋ maŋɩ, abam na yǝni á saŋɩ daanɩ sarɩya-dirǝ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn tee nɩ yɩ ba di á taanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46006007	Abam na saŋɩ daanɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ á tusi mʋ. N ko-bu na kɩ-m lwarɩm, naa o na ŋɔgɩ-m, kʋ ya lana sɩ n yagɩ n ma n cɛ-o mʋ.
46006008	Abam nan ba kɩ kʋntʋ, abam tɩtɩ joori á kɩ balʋ na yɩ á ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn wo-lwaanʋ mʋ, yɩ á kwǝri á ŋɔnɩ-ba.
46006009	Abam yǝri nɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ cɩga tɩn bá na jǝŋǝ je Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ na? Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á ganɩ á tɩtɩ. Balʋ na boori tɩn, naa jwǝ-kaana naa ka-lagɩna, naa baara balʋ na tigi dɩ ba donnǝ ba maa jiri kaana tɩn,
46006010	naa ŋwɩɩna naa wo-swǝn-nyɩna, naa sa-nyɔra naa nɔn-twɩɩna naa vɩnvɩrna bá na jǝŋǝ je Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ.
46006011	Abam badaara dɛɛn yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ. Wɛ nan yagɩ á lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ abam. DƖ ma pa á ji DƖ nɔɔna yɩ á jɩgɩ cɩga DƖ tee nɩ. Wɛ dɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ DƖ Jorokʋm dam ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ kʋntʋ DƖ pa abam.
46006012	Abam badaara tɛ á wɩ, á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn. Amʋ nan lagɩ a ta abam nɩ, kʋ daɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ kʋ pa abam. Amʋ dɩ jɩgɩ ni sɩ a kɩ kʋlʋ maama a na lagɩ tɩn, a nan bá sɛ sɩ a pa a ji kʋlʋkʋlʋ gambaa.
46006013	Abam yǝni á tɛ á wɩ, Wɛ kɩ wʋdiu kana ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ DƖ kɩ kana dɩ wʋdiu ŋwaanɩ. Maŋa nan wʋ́ ba, yɩ Wɛ cɔgɩ wʋdiu dɩ kana maama. Wɛ nan wʋ kɩ dɩbam yɩra yam sɩ dɩ́ ta maa kɩ boorim. Wɛ mɔɔnɩ dɩ́ yɩra yam sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ taa te-ya, sɩ dɩ́ ta maa tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa-o.
46006014	Wɛ mʋ bi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi DƖ pa-o o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ. Maŋa nan wʋ́ ba, yɩ DƖ ma DƖ dam dɩm DƖ bi dɩbam dɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
46006015	Abam yǝri nɩ á yɩra yam yɩ Zezi Krisi yɩra yam daa dɩdʋa mʋ na? Abam yɩra yam dɩ Zezi yɩra yam na yɩ bɩdwɩ tɩn, á yɩ zaŋɩ á kwe-ya á ma pǝni dɩ ka-tʋla, sɩ yaá ji yɩra dɩdʋa dɩdaanɩ ka-tʋla kam yɩra yam. Á brɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á kɩ kʋntʋ.
46006016	Bɛŋwaanɩ, wʋlʋ na pǝni dɩ ka-tʋla tɩn, o dɩ ka-tʋla kam maama laan jigi yɩra dɩdʋa mʋ. Á yǝri kʋntʋ na? Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Baarʋ dɩ kaanɩ wʋ́ wǝli daanɩ sɩ ba ji nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ.»
46006017	Wʋlʋ nan na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, o joro dɩ Zezi Joro maama yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ.
46006018	Á nan yagɩ boorim kǝm dwi maama. Kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maama nɔɔnʋ na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, o bá kɩ o yagɩ o yɩra wʋnɩ. Nɔɔnʋ nan na boori, kʋntʋ yɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ kʋlʋ o na kɩ o yagɩ o yɩra wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
46006019	Abam yǝri nɩ á yɩra yam nyɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ mʋ DƖ Jorokʋm na zʋʋrɩ ka wʋnɩ na? Wɛ kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm á bɩcara nɩ mʋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ daa daɩ abam tɩtɩ mʋ te á yɩra yam.
46006020	Á yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ. DƖ yǝgi abam dɩ yǝlo kʋlʋ na cana tɩn mʋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kwe-na á yɩra yam á maa tʋŋɩ sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na zulǝ.
46007001	A lagɩ a lǝri á na pʋpʋnɩ á bwe amʋ taana yalʋ tɩn mʋ a pa abam. Kʋ ya lana dɩ baarʋ na wʋ di kaanɩ.
46007002	Kʋ nan ba lana sɩ baara dɩ kaana taa lagɩ daanɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ baarʋ maama taa jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ kaanɩ, sɩ kaanɩ maama dɩ taa jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ barʋ.
46007003	Baarʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn sɩ o taa wʋra dɩ o kaanɩ. Kaanɩ dɩ nan yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn sɩ o taa wʋra dɩ o barʋ.
46007004	Bɛŋwaanɩ kaanɩ ba te o tɩtɩ yɩra, kʋ yɩ o barʋ mʋ te-ya. Barʋ dɩ nan ba te o tɩtɩ yɩra, kʋ yɩ o kaanɩ dɩ mʋ te-ya.
46007005	Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á vɩn sɩ á taá wʋra daanɩ, kʋ na daɩ nɩ á maama mʋ sɛ sɩ á lɩ pwǝlǝ á yagɩ da-pwǝgǝ maŋa fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á nywanɩ á yigǝ á loori Wɛ, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ á na lagɩ tɩn. Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, sɩ á joori á taá wʋra daanɩ. Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, sʋtaanɩ wʋ́ sʋgɩ abam dɩ pa á tusi dɩ á na warɩ á tɩtɩ á ja tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46007006	Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, a tagɩ sɩ kʋ wǝli abam mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ a fɩn abam.
46007007	Amʋ ya wʋ́ ta lagɩ sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama taa yɩ nɩ amʋ na yɩ badǝm te tɩn. Wɛ-pɛɛra nan yɩ tǝri tǝri mʋ yɩ DƖ pa nɔɔnʋ maama o nyɩm.
46007008	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ badǝnǝ dɩ kadǝnǝ tɩn, a lagɩ a ta dɩ abam nɩ kʋ lana sɩ á taá yɩ á yɩranɩ kʋntʋ, nɩ amʋ na yɩ te tɩn.
46007009	Á nan na warɩ á tɩtɩ á ja, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á di kaana naa á zʋ banna mʋ. Kʋntʋ garɩ á na paɩ ka-laga fra tiini ya jɩgɩ abam.
46007010	-
46007011	Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ banna dɩ ba kaana, kʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ kaanɩ yɩ yagɩ o barʋ, naa barʋ dɩ yɩ vɩn o kaanɩ. Kʋntʋ daɩ amʋ tɩtɩ ni, kʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ pɛ culu kʋntʋ. Kaanɩ nan na maŋɩ o yagɩ o barʋ, o maŋɩ sɩ o taa wʋra o yɩranɩ mʋ, naa o joori o vu o barʋ wʋm te mʋ sɩ ba fɔgɩ daanɩ, o daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o zʋ barʋ wʋdoŋ.
46007012	Kʋ daarɩ, baarʋ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na jɩgɩ kaanɩ, yɩ kaanɩ wʋm na ba tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ o sɛ sɩ ba taa zʋʋrɩ daanɩ, kʋntʋ tu yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn o kaanɩ wʋm. Kʋ yɩ amʋ mʋ pɛ ni dɩm kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi.
46007013	Kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ nan na tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ o barʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi, yɩ o barʋ wʋm na sɛ sɩ ba taa zʋʋrɩ daanɩ, sɩ o yɩ zaŋɩ o yagɩ o barʋ wʋm.
46007014	Barʋ wʋlʋ na wʋ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ, o kaanɩ wʋm na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kaanɩ wʋlʋ dɩ na wʋ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ, o barʋ wʋm na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ ya na daɩ kʋntʋ, ba biǝ wʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn biǝ, yɩ ba laan yagɩ ba batwarɩ dɩ Wɛ.
46007015	Wʋlʋ nan na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na bʋŋɩ sɩ o viiri, kʋ na yɩ kaanɩ wʋm naa barʋ wʋm dɩ, sɩ á yag-o sɩ o viiri. Wʋlʋ na daarɩ yɩ o tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn laan wʋ́ ta te o tɩtɩ. Wɛ na bǝŋi dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá zʋʋrɩ daanɩ dɩ ywǝǝni mʋ.
46007016	Kaanɩ, nmʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn, nń kɩ ta mʋ n lwarɩ nɩ nń wanɩ n pa n barʋ wʋm sɛ Zezi naa n bá wanɩ n pa o sɛ? Barʋ, nmʋ dɩ wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ n lwarɩ nɩ nń wanɩ n pa n kaanɩ wʋm sɛ Zezi naa n bá wanɩ n pa o sɛ?
46007017	Abam dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, á ta taá yɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na pɛ abam ŋwɩa kalʋ tɩn. Mʋ kʋlʋ a na brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm jǝgǝ maama nɩ tɩn.
46007018	Wɛ na bǝŋi abam tɩn, abam wʋlʋ dɛɛn na maŋɩ o go nɩ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn, kʋntʋ tu daa yɩ ta sǝgi o tɩtɩ o na goni tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ daarɩ, wʋlʋ dɛɛn nan na maŋɩ o wʋ goni tɩn, o daa yɩ ta kwaanɩ sɩ o go.
46007019	N na gonǝ naa n zɩ wʋ goni dɩ, kʋ daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ nɔɔnʋ maama kwaanɩ o sɛ Wɛ niǝ yam lanyɩranɩ.
46007020	Nɔɔnʋ maama dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o ta taa yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
46007021	N dɛɛn na yɩ gambaa mʋ yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi-m sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ-DƖ, yɩ ta n kɩ liǝ kʋ ŋwaanɩ. N nan na nɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ n ta n te n tɩtɩ, sɩ n sɛ sɩ kʋ ji kʋntʋ.
46007022	Wʋlʋ maama dɛɛn na yɩ nɔɔnʋ gambaa yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o sɩ o taa tɔgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋntʋ tu daa daɩ sʋtaanɩgambaa, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na vrɩ-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wʋlʋ dɩ dɛɛn na te o tɩtɩ yɩ Wɛ bǝŋ-o sɩ o taa tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu laan sɛ Zezi Krisi ni, nɩ o yɩ o gambaa mʋ te.
46007023	Á yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ. DƖ yǝgi abam dɩ yǝlo kʋlʋ na cana tɩn mʋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ zaŋɩ á sɛ sɩ á ji nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gambaa.
46007024	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a ko-biǝ-ba, abam maama dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, á ta taá yɩ kʋntʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
46007025	Kʋ daarɩ, a laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ balʋ na wʋ zʋ banna dɩ balʋ na wʋ di kaana tɩn woŋo mʋ. Kʋ daɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni dɩntʋ, kʋ yɩ amʋ tɩtɩ na bʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ, yɩ á wʋ́ taá jɩgɩ amʋ cɩga, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na wʋra dɩ amʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46007026	Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ, yaara yalʋ na wʋ dɩbam baŋa nɩ lele kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋʋ́ ta lamma sɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o di kaanɩ.
46007027	Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋlʋ na maŋɩ o jɩgɩ kaanɩ, o daa yɩ zaŋɩ o yag-o. Wʋlʋ nan na ba jɩgɩ kaanɩ, o daa yɩ zaŋɩ o taa kwaanɩ sɩ o di kaanɩ.
46007028	Kʋ daɩ nɩ, n na di kaanɩ, n ga n kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ, bukɔ na zʋ barʋ, o kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ. Banna dɩ ba kaana nan bá lu lʋgʋ baŋa yaara yam wʋnɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ a ba lagɩ sɩ abam dɩ tɔgɩ á na yaara yam kʋntʋ doŋ.
46007029	A ko-biǝ-ba, woŋo kʋlʋ na pɛ a ta kʋntʋ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ maŋa kam daa mʋ ba tiini ka daga, sɩ dɩ́ maa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam. Kʋ na zɩgɩ lele kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ ta maa ve tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ kaana tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋ di kaana mʋ te.
46007030	Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ balʋ wʋrʋ na cɔgɩ tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋrʋ wʋ cɔgɩ mʋ te, sɩ balʋ wʋrʋ na poli tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba wʋrʋ wʋ poli mʋ te, sɩ balʋ na yǝgi wǝǝnu tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba ba te wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ mʋ te.
46007031	Kʋ daarɩ sɩ balʋ na tʋŋɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩtʋŋa tɩn taa tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam nɩ ba ba jɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩtʋŋa mʋ te. Bɛŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ kʋm lagɩ kʋ ti mʋ dɩ kʋ wǝǝnu tɩm maama.
46007032	Amʋ ba lagɩ sɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ liǝ taa jɩgɩ abam. Wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kaanɩ tɩn yǝni o kwe o wʋbʋŋa maama o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o wʋ.
46007033	Wʋlʋ nan na jɩgɩ kaanɩ tɩn yǝni o kwe o wʋbʋŋa o kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o kaanɩ wʋ.
46007034	Kʋ ma brɩ nɩ o wʋbʋŋa yam cɛ kuni bɩle mʋ. Kʋ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ bukɔ naa kaanɩ wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ barʋ tɩn dɩ. Wʋntʋ kwe o wʋbʋŋa maama mʋ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ, o na lagɩ sɩ o yɩra dɩ o joro maama taa yɩ Wɛ nyɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ daarɩ kaanɩ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ barʋ tɩn kwe o wʋbʋŋa o kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o poli o barʋ wʋ.
46007035	Amʋ nan tɛ bɩtarɩ sɩntʋ sɩ kʋ wǝli abam mʋ. Kʋ daɩ nɩ a lagɩ sɩ a fɩn abam. A nan lagɩ sɩ a pa á taá tɔgɩ cwǝ-laa mʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á nywanɩ á yigǝ á taá tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi, sɩ á yɩ taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋa yale yale.
46007036	Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o wʋ kɩ o katɔgɔ lanyɩranɩ o na wʋ di-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o fra na tiini ya zʋ o katɔgɔ kʋm kʋ pa o daa warɩ o tɩtɩ o ja, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o di-o mʋ nɩ o na bʋŋɩ te tɩn. O na kɩ kʋntʋ, o wʋ kɩ wo-lɔŋɔ.
46007037	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ o yɩ di o katɔgɔ kʋm yɩ o waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana, sɩ o daa yɩ di kaanɩ tɩn, o kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ.
46007038	Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋlʋ na di kaanɩ tɩn kɩ lanyɩranɩ. Wʋlʋ nan na wʋ di kaanɩ tɩn mʋ tiini o kɩ lanyɩranɩ o dwǝni.
46007039	Kaanɩ na jɩgɩ barʋ, yɩ o barʋ wʋm ta na ŋwɩ, o ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o yag-o. O barʋ wʋm nan na tɩga, o laan jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o zʋ o na lagɩ wʋlʋ tɩn. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o zʋ wʋlʋ dɩ na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn mʋ.
46007040	Amʋ nan bʋŋɩ nɩ o na je o yɩranɩ, oó ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo zanzan kʋ dwe o daa na zʋ barʋ. Wɛ Jorokʋm dɩ wʋ amʋ tee nɩ, yɩ a bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ-nɩ wʋbʋŋa yam kʋntʋ.
46008001	A laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ jwǝnǝ nwana taanɩ mʋ dɩ abam. Kʋ yɩ cɩga, dɩ́ maama jɩgɩ yǝno, nɩ abam na tɛ te tɩn. Nan taá ye-na nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ yǝno, kʋ pa-o kamunni mʋ. Nɔɔnʋ nan na jɩgɩ sono, kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ kʋ paɩ o ve yigǝ mʋ.
46008002	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ yǝno, kʋ brɩ nɩ o ta yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye tɩn mʋ.
46008003	Wʋlʋ nan na soe Wɛ tɩn, Wɛ ye kʋntʋ tu.
46008004	Kʋ na yɩ jwǝnǝ nwana yam dim taanɩ, dɩ́ ye nɩ jwǝnǝ ba ŋwɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra.
46008005	Balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn jɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩdonnǝ mʋ ba maa bǝ ba wa. Wǝǝnu dwi zanzan mʋ nɔɔna bǝ-tɩ nɩ ba wa dɩ ba yuu tiinǝ, kʋ na yɩ tɩga baŋa wǝǝnu dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu.
46008006	Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra. Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Ko wʋlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama, yɩ dɩntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ ŋwɩ. Dɩ́ ta ye nɩ, dɩbam Yuutu yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ Wɛ na tagɩ o ŋwaanɩ DƖ kɩ woŋo maama tɩn, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa.
46008007	Kʋ nan daɩ nɔɔnʋ maama mʋ ye nɩ jwǝnǝ ba jɩgɩ dam. Nɔɔna badaara dɛɛn ŋwɩ dɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm mʋ, yɩ ba laan ba ba sɛ Wɛ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ba kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ yɩ ba bʋŋɩ nɩ, ba na di jwǝni wʋdiu, kʋʋ́ ta nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba joori ba sɛ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm mʋ. Ba wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn, ba bʋŋɩ nɩ ba kɩ ba cɔgɩ mʋ.
46008008	Wʋdiu dim nan bá wanɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ twɛ Wɛ. Dɩ́ na culi wʋdiiru naa dɩ́ zɩ ba culǝ dɩ, kʋ ba zǝni dɩbam dɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ naa dɩ́ ga kʋlʋkʋlʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
46008009	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na ye nɩ á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á di kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, á nan cʋ-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á yɩ pa balʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn tusi.
46008010	Nmʋ wʋlʋ na paɩ n jɩgɩ yǝno tɩn na ve n zʋ jwǝni digǝ n tɔgɩ n di dɩ wʋdiu kʋm, yɩ n ko-bu wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn na nɛ-m, kʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ kʋ gan-o sɩ o dɩ vu o tɔgɩ o di.
46008011	Kʋntʋ, o na dɛ o di jwǝni wʋdiu kʋm, kʋ brɩ nɩ nmʋ mʋ mɛ n yǝno kʋm n ma n cɔgɩ n ko-bu wʋlʋ wʋbʋŋa ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ yɩ Zezi Krisi ya tɩ o dɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
46008012	Nmʋ na kɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ kʋm kʋntʋ doŋ n yagɩ n ko-bu yuu nɩ, yɩ n cɔgɩ o wʋbʋŋa o ta na wʋ bɩgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ n kɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ te.
46008013	Kʋntʋ, wʋdiu dim na lagɩ kʋ pa a ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ, a daa bá fɔgɩ a di wʋdiu kʋm kʋntʋ, a na ba lagɩ sɩ a pa a ko-bu tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46009001	Amʋ ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a kɩ a na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn na? Amʋ daɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ na? Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ a wʋ nɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi mʋ na? Abam mʋ yɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ a na tʋŋɩ a pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, á na dɛ amʋ jɩŋa á na vrɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46009002	Nɔɔna badaara na maŋɩ ba ba bʋŋɩ nɩ amʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga, abam bá wanɩ á vɩn nɩ amʋ daɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ. Abam na ŋwɩ dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn mʋ brɩ nɩ amʋ sɩɩnɩ a yɩ o tɩntʋŋnʋ mʋ.
46009003	Nɔɔna na lwɛ amʋ, a na wʋ́ lǝri-ba te tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ:
46009004	Abam bʋŋɩ nɩ, dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋna tɩn ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
46009005	Dɩbam ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ di kaana balʋ na sɛ Zezi tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ beerǝ, nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩntʋŋna babam bam dɩ o nyaana dɩ Pɩyɛɛrɩ na yǝni ba kɩ te tɩn na?
46009006	Amʋ dɩ Banabasɩ yɩranɩ nan mʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá tʋŋɩ dɩ́ lagɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ ni-wʋdiu na?
46009007	Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ pamaŋnʋ, o bá wanɩ o joori o ŋwɩ o tɩtɩ. Nɔɔnʋ jɩgɩ kara yɩ o ba di ka wǝǝnu na? Nɔɔnʋ jɩgɩ naanɩ o tɔga yɩ o ba di dɩ nayɩla na?
46009008	Kʋ daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa mɩmaŋa yantʋ yɩranɩ mʋ brɩ dɩbam cɩga kam kʋntʋ. Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm dɩ maŋɩ kʋ brɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
46009009	Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ Moyisitɩn tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ na jɩgɩ nabɩa n ma n nwanɩ wo-vaalʋ, yɩ kɩ tampɔgɔ ka ni nɩ.» Wɛ na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ nabɩa kam yɩranɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ na?
46009010	Aye, kʋ yɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na vagɩ dɩ wʋlʋ na wʋra o kɩ faa tɩn maama tɩɩnɩ nɩ baá na ba tǝri mʋ.
46009011	Dɩbam na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam dɩ abam tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ dɩ́ dugi Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ á bɩcara nɩ. Kʋ nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu abam tee nɩ na?
46009012	Abam na paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ ba ni-wʋdiu tɩn, kʋ ya wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩbam joŋi dɩ́ dwǝni bantʋ na? Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩbam wʋ bwe sɩ dɩ́ joŋi dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu abam tee nɩ, nɩ dɩ́ ya na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ te tɩn. Dɩ́ nan vɔgɩ dɩ́ wʋ mʋ woŋo maama baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ yɩ wanɩ kʋ cɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
46009013	Á tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye nɩ balʋ na tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa DƖ di-kamunu kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn yǝni ba joŋi ba ni-wʋdiu dáanɩ mʋ. Balʋ dɩ na joŋi vara ba ma kaanɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ joŋi ba tǝri kʋ wʋnɩ mʋ.
46009014	Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ balʋ dɩ na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi pɛ ni nɩ ba dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba joŋi ba ni-wʋdiu tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
46009015	Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, amʋ wʋ bwe sɩ a joŋi kʋlʋkʋlʋ abam tee nɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ sɩ a ma joŋi woŋo mʋ abam tee nɩ. Aá tɩ mʋ, sɩ a bá fɔgɩ a za a na yɩ te tɩn. A bá sɛ a pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ cwǝŋǝ sɩ o cɔgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ amʋ wʋpolo nyɩm tɩn.
46009016	A bá wanɩ a magɩ a nyɔɔnɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ yɩ fɩfɩʋn mʋ sɩ a kɩ. Amʋ ya na yagɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɔɔlɩm, kʋʋ́ ta yɩ lɛɛrʋ mʋ dɩ amʋ.
46009017	Amʋ tɩtɩ mʋ nan ya na lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, a ya wʋ́ ta tɩɩnɩ sɩ a joŋi ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ a tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ a kɩa, kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ kwe-ka DƖ kɩ amʋ jɩŋa nɩ.
46009018	Kʋntʋ, bɛɛ ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ amʋ wʋ́ joŋi? Amʋ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ yɩ a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam zaanɩ, yɩ a ba bwe sɩ a joŋi kʋlʋkʋlʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɩ a ya na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a kɩ te tɩn.
46009019	A te a tɩtɩ mʋ, a daɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gambaa. Amʋ tɩtɩ nan mʋ pɛ a ji gambaa nɔɔna maama tee nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi nɔɔna zanzan a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
46009020	Amʋ na wʋ Zwifǝbam tee nɩ, a yǝni a tɔgɩ a kɩ nɩ Zwifǝ bam na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ. Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na pɛ Zwifǝ bam tɩn ya ba tɔgɩ tɩ te amʋ. Amʋ nan na zʋʋrɩ dɩ Zwifǝ tɩn, a dɛ a sɛ-tɩ mʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a joŋi tɩ na te balʋ tɩn a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
46009021	Kʋ daarɩ, a na yǝni a wʋ dwi-gɛtiinǝ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn tee nɩ, a dɩ tɔgɩ a kɩ nɩ bantʋ na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a yigǝ tǝrǝ dɩdaanɩ Wɛ niǝ yam, kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi niǝ yam mʋ te amʋ.
46009022	Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na wʋ bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm tɩn, a yǝni a ji nɩ bantʋ dɩ mʋ te, sɩ a ma wanɩ a joŋi-ba a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ. Amʋ na wʋ nɔɔna balʋ maama tee nɩ, a yǝni a ji nɩ bantʋ mʋ te, yɩ a kwaanɩ a kɩ a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a ma joŋi ba badaara a kɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ.
46009023	Amʋ nan kɩ wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama sɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam mʋ wanɩ ka vu yigǝ, sɩ a dɩ tɔgɩ a na a pɛɛrɩ DƖ wo-laarʋ tɩm wʋnɩ.
46009024	Abam ye nɩ, nɔɔna na wʋra ba durǝ, nɔɔnʋ maama mʋ kwaanɩ sɩ o di yigǝ, yɩ ba dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ́ di o joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm. Nan kwaanɩ-na kʋntʋ doŋ, sɩ á wanɩ á di yigǝ sɩ á joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
46009025	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na lagɩ sɩ o duri tɩn yǝni o tiini o kwaanɩ mʋ o kɩ o tɩtɩ o kɩ daanɩ. Bantʋ nan yǝni ba kwaanɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba joŋi pɛɛrɩ mʋ, yɩ ba pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ bá daanɩ dɩ cɔgɩ. Kʋ daarɩ dɩbam pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ dɩ́ na lagɩ dɩ́ joŋi Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn bá fɔgɩ dɩ cɔgɩ maŋa dɩ maŋa.
46009026	Kʋntʋ, amʋ ba duri nɩ wʋlʋ na yǝri durim yɩ o duri yɔɔ yɔɔ te tɩn. A nan ba magɩ jara nɩ wʋlʋ na yǝri jara magɩm yɩ o magɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ te tɩn.
46009027	Amʋ nan kwaanɩ a tiini a fɩn a tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ a pa a yɩra yam lwarɩ nɩ amʋ mʋ te-ya. A kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ yɩ pa, a na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ tɩn, sɩ amʋ tɩtɩ laan ba a ga pɛɛrɩ mʋ DƖ tee nɩ.
46010001	A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ lagɩ sɩ á guli kʋlʋ dɛɛn na kɩ dɩ́ kwǝ nakwa balʋ na dɛ Moyisikwaga ba nuŋi Ezipinɩ tɩn woŋo mʋ. Wɛ dɛɛn pɛ kunkoŋo mʋ kwǝli ba maama, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pɔɔrɩ nɩnɩʋ kʋm na bam kuni bɩle DƖ daarɩ cwǝŋǝ, yɩ ba maama tɔgɩ da ba kɛ.
46010002	Kʋntʋ na kɩ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ bantʋ maama dɛɛn miisi na wʋnɩ mʋ, sɩ ba taa yɩ Moyisi karabiǝ, kunkoŋo kʋm na kwǝli-ba yɩ ba da nɩnɩʋ kʋm wʋ ba kɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46010003	Wɛ dɛɛn ma pa ba maama di wʋdiu dɩdʋa,
46010004	yɩ ba daarɩ ba nyɔ na bɩdwɩ. Na balʋ ba maama dɛɛn na nyɔgɩ tɩn nuŋi piu kʋdoŋ yɩra mʋ, yɩ piu kʋm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wo-kɩnkagɩlɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩa, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ mʋ tɔgɩ o wʋ ba tee nɩ.
46010005	Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, Wɛ wʋ dɛɛn wʋ poli dɩ nɔɔna zanzan ba wʋnɩ. DƖ dɛɛn ma pa ba zanzan tɩ ba maŋɩ kagʋa kam wʋnɩ.
46010006	Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama nan kɩ sɩ tɩ brɩ dɩbam mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ daa yɩ ta pa dɩ́ fra zʋʋrɩ wo-balwaarʋ nɩnɛɛnɩ bantʋ na kɩ te tɩn.
46010007	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á zuli jwǝnǝ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te tɩn. Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam dɛɛn jǝni ba di wʋdiu ba daarɩ ba nyɔ, yɩ ba laan zaŋɩ ba sa ba kwɛɛra.»
46010008	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á pa dɩ́ taá boorǝ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ ba nɔɔna mʋrr-fiinle-tɩtɔ (23.000) tɩ dɛ dɩdʋa wʋnɩ tɩn.
46010009	Á yɩ pa-na dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ dam dɩ́ nii, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ bɩsankwɩ dʋ-ba sɩ gʋ tɩn.
46010010	Á yɩ taá pʋʋnɩ dɩ Wɛ, nɩ bantʋ badaara dɛɛn na kɩ te yɩ tʋʋnɩ malɛka kam gʋ-ba tɩn.
46010011	Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama dɛɛn nan kɩ dɩ́ kwǝ nakwa bam, sɩ tɩ taa yɩ maana mʋ tɩ pa dɩbam. Tɩ nan pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ kaanɩ dɩbam balʋ ta na ŋwɩ yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tiim da yam batwarɩ tɩn mʋ.
46010012	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn nan fɔgɩ o yɩrɩ o tɩtɩ sɩ o yɩ tʋ.
46010013	Woŋo kʋlʋ maama na maŋɩ abam sɩ á tusi tɩn waɩ kʋ yi nɔɔnʋ maama. Wɛ nan yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, DƖ bá sɛ sɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ abam tɩn dwǝni abam dam. DƖ nan wʋ́ pa abam dam, sɩ á wanɩ á na cwǝŋǝ á nuŋi kʋ wʋnɩ maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ.
46010014	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a badon-sonnu-ba, lɩ-na á tɩtɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm wʋnɩ.
46010015	Amʋ nan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ abam nɩ swan tiinǝ mʋ te, sɩ á bʋŋɩ á nii a taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga mʋ naa vwan mʋ.
46010016	Dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ wʋra dɩ́ di Zezi Krisi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ kwe zʋŋa mʋ dɩ ka wʋ wo-nyɔɔrʋ yɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ nyɔ. Dɩ́ na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ dɩ́ sɛ nɩ Zezi Krisi jana kam nuŋi dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Dɩ́ daa ta na yǝni dɩ́ kwe dɩpɛ dɩm dɩ́ fɔ fɔ dɩ́ di tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ dɩ́ sɛ nɩ o yɩra yam cɔgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ na?
46010017	Dɩbam maama na fɔgɩ dɩpɛ dɩdʋa kam dɩ́ di tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama yɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ, dɩ́ ya zɩ maŋɩ dɩ́ daga te maama dɩ.
46010018	Nan bʋŋɩ-na Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam na yǝni ba ma wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba kaanɩ Wɛ yɩ ba daarɩ ba di tɩn woŋo. Balʋ maama na dɛ ba di tɩn dɩ tɔgɩ ba sɛ kaanɩm dɩm mʋ.
46010019	Amʋ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn brɩ bɛɛn? Kʋ brɩ nɩ wʋdiu kʋlʋ ba na mɛ ba kaanɩ jwǝnǝ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri mʋ na? Naa kʋ brɩ nɩ jwǝnǝ yam tɩtɩ mʋ jɩgɩ kuri?
46010020	Awo, kʋ daɩ kʋntʋ. Amʋ lagɩ a brɩ abam nɩ, jwǝ-kaana na kaanɩ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn, ba paɩ ciciri mʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ Wɛ. Amʋ nan ba lagɩ sɩ abam na wǝl-dɔnɔ dɩ ciciri.
46010021	Kʋ nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á nyɔ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm, sɩ á kwǝri á vu á nyɔ dɩ ciciri. Abam nan bá wanɩ á jǝni á di dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, sɩ á kwǝri á vu á da á di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa á taá ŋwɩ dɩ ciciri tɩn.
46010022	Á yɩ pa-na dɩ́ kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ zaŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ tɩn. Abam bʋŋɩ á paɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ dam dɩ́ dwe wʋntʋ mʋ na?
46010023	Abam badaara na tɛ á wɩ, á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa dɩbam. Kʋ ta daɩ nɩ woŋo maama mʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ.
46010024	Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o taa lagɩ o tɩtɩ zǝnǝ má. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ o zǝni o donnǝ dɩ mʋ.
46010025	Á jɩgɩ ni sɩ á yǝgi nwana yalʋ maama ba na jɩgɩ ba yǝgi yaga nɩ tɩn á di. Nan yɩ bwe-na á nii ya yɩ jwǝnǝ nwana mʋ na, sɩ kʋʋ́ pa liǝ ja abam kʋ ŋwaanɩ.
46010026	Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ kʋ wǝǝnu maama yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ nyɩm mʋ.»
46010027	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn na bǝŋi abam sɩ á vu o sɔŋɔ á di wʋdiu dɩd-o, yɩ á na sɛ á vu, o na kwe wʋdiu kʋlʋ maama o pa abam tɩn, sɩ á di. Á yɩ zaŋɩ-na á bwe kʋ kuri, sɩ kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ liǝ dɩ abam.
46010028	Nɔɔnʋ nan na tagɩ dɩ abam o wɩ, wʋdiu kʋntʋ yɩ ba mɛ ba kaanɩ jwǝni mʋ, sɩ á daa yɩ zaŋɩ á di, bɛŋwaanɩ liǝ wʋ́ zʋ nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ bɩcarɩ.
46010029	Kʋ daɩ nɩ á yagɩ kʋ dim liǝ na wʋ́ zʋ abam tɩtɩ bɩcarɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ liǝ na wʋ́ ja wʋlʋ na tagɩ o brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Dɛdoŋ abam waɩ á bwe amʋ á nii, bɛŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yagɩ dɩ́ na jɩgɩ ni sɩ dɩ́ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ liǝ na wʋ́ zʋ nɔɔna badonnǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ?
46010030	Abam daa ta waɩ á bwe amʋ nɩ, dɩ́ na kɩ Wɛ le wʋdiu kʋm ŋwaanɩ yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ di tɩn, nɔɔnʋ daa wʋ́ lwɛ dɩbam bɛɛ ŋwaanɩ mʋ?
46010031	Kʋ nan na yɩ te tɩn, woŋo kʋlʋ maama abam na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á na wʋ́ di naa á nyɔ naa kǝm dɩlʋ maama á na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá kɩ kʋlʋ maama na wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ kʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ.
46010032	Á yɩ taá kɩ-na kʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ nɔɔna wʋbʋŋa tɩn, kʋ ya zɩ yɩ Zwifǝ bam naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ naa Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm dɩ.
46010033	Taá kɩ-na nɩ amʋ na kɩ te tɩn. Woŋo kʋlʋ maama amʋ na kɩ tɩn, a kwaanɩ sɩ kʋ taa poli nɔɔna maama wʋ mʋ. Amʋ ba lagɩ a tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ. A lagɩ sɩ a zǝni nɔɔna maama mʋ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ pa Wɛ vrɩ-ba DƖ yagɩ.
46011001	Taá lwǝni-na amʋ, nɩ amʋ na lwǝni Zezi Krisi te tɩn.
46011002	Abam kɩ cɩga lanyɩranɩ dɩdaanɩ á na yǝni á guli amʋ gulǝ, yɩ á kwǝri á sɛ zaasɩm dɩlʋ maama a na brɩ abam tɩn.
46011003	Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ nɩ, Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ nɔɔnʋ maama yuutu. Kaanɩ dɩ yuutu maa yɩ o barʋ. Baŋa-Wɛ nan mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ yuutu.
46011004	Kʋntʋ tɩn, á na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á warɩ Wɛ, yɩ baarʋ na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ naa o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, yɩ o na mɛ woŋo o kwǝli o yuu, kʋntʋ tu yáalɩ o yuutu wʋm mʋ.
46011005	Kaanɩ dɩ nan na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ naa o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, yɩ o na wʋ mɛ woŋo o kwǝli o yuu, o dɩ yáalɩ o yuutu wʋm mʋ. O na kɩ kʋntʋ, o dɩ wʋlʋ na ceeri o yuu tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ.
46011006	Kaanɩ na wʋ sɛ sɩ o kwǝli o yuu, kʋ ya maŋɩ sɩ o cɔ-kʋ mʋ naa o ceeri-kʋ. Kʋ nan na jɩgɩ cavɩɩra sɩ kaanɩ kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa kwǝli-kʋ mʋ.
46011007	Baara nan ba jɩgɩ sɩ ba kwǝli ba yuni, bɛŋwaanɩ bantʋ jɩgɩ Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ, yɩ ba brɩ DƖ zulǝ na yɩ te. Kʋ nan na yɩ kaana, bantʋ mʋ brɩ baara zulǝ na yɩ te.
46011008	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mɛ baarʋ yɩra mʋ DƖ kɩ kaanɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ kaanɩ yɩra mʋ DƖ mɛ DƖ kɩ baarʋ.
46011009	Kʋntʋ, Wɛ wʋ kɩ baarʋ kaanɩ ŋwaanɩ, DƖ kɩ kaanɩ mʋ baarʋ ŋwaanɩ.
46011010	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ Wɛ malɛsɩsɩm ŋwaanɩ, kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kwǝli ba yuni, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba jɩgɩ ni sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
46011011	Kʋ daarɩ, dɩbam balʋ maama na wʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, kaanɩ ba te o tɩtɩ baarʋ tee nɩ, baarʋ dɩ nan ba te o tɩtɩ kaanɩ tee nɩ.
46011012	Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ ma baarʋ yɩra mʋ DƖ kɩ kaanɩ, yɩ kaanɩ dɩ nan mʋ lʋrɩ baarʋ. Woŋo maama nan nuŋi Wɛ te mʋ.
46011013	Abam tɩtɩ nan bʋŋɩ-na á nii. Kaanɩ na zaŋɩ sɩ o loori Wɛ, yɩ o na wʋ kwe woŋo o ma kwǝli o yuu, kʋ lamma na?
46011014	Nɔɔna maama ye nɩ, baarʋ yuuywe na tiini sɩ dwara, kʋ yɩ cavɩɩra mʋ kʋ paɩ o tɩtɩ.
46011015	Kʋ nan na yɩ kaanɩ, o yuuywe na tiini sɩ nuŋi sɩ daga, kʋ zul-o mʋ. Kʋ yɩ o dɩ Wɛ pɛɛrɩ mʋ, sɩ sɩ taa daga yɩ sɩ kwǝli o yuu.
46011016	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na wʋ sɛ amʋ zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ o magɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu taa ye nɩ dɩbam maama tɔgɩ kantʋ cwǝŋǝ kam mʋ, yɩ Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm je maama nɩ tɩn dɩ tɔgɩ kantʋ mʋ.
46011017	Woŋo kʋlʋ amʋ na lagɩ a ta dɩ abam tɩn, a ba lagɩ a tee abam nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ. Abam na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ tɩn, á cɔgɩm mʋ dwe á fɔgɩm.
46011018	Dayigǝ woŋo, amʋ ni nɩ á na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, á jɩgɩ kampwara mʋ daanɩ. Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋʋ́ ta yɩ cɩga mʋ.
46011019	Kʋ nan fɩn mʋ sɩ kampwara taa wʋ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ, sɩ kʋ brɩ balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ cɩga tɩn.
46011020	Abam na yǝni á jeeri daanɩ sɩ á di dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm tɩn, á ba kɩ nɩ á na maŋɩ sɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
46011021	Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ maama yǝni o lɔgɩrɩ o di o tɩtɩ wʋdiu kʋm mʋ. Abam nan na kɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ kana jɩgɩ badonnǝ, yɩ á badonnǝ nyɔ á su á ja gaalɩ.
46011022	Abam ya na lagɩ sɩ á di dim dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, á ya wʋ́ di á tɩtɩ sam nɩ mʋ. Abam lagɩ sɩ á cɔgɩ Wɛ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm yuu mʋ na? Abam lagɩ sɩ á pa cavɩɩra mʋ ja yinigǝ tiinǝ balʋ na wʋ á kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn na? Abam lagɩ sɩ amʋ ta bɛɛ mʋ dɩ abam? Nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ na? A bá wanɩ a ta nɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ kʋntʋ woŋo.
46011023	Cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na brɩ-nɩ o tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ a zaasɩ abam, kʋ yɩ sɩ tɩtɩɩ dɩlʋ ba na jaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn mʋ o kwe dɩpɛ,
46011024	yɩ o kɩ Wɛ le dɩ ŋwaanɩ o daarɩ o fɔ fɔ o pa o karabiǝ bam, yɩ o wɩ: «Amʋ yɩra yam mʋ tɩntʋ, ya na lagɩ ya cɔgɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Taá kɩ-na kʋntʋ doŋ sɩ á taá ma guli amʋ gulǝ.»
46011025	Ba na di ba ti tɩn, o daa ma kwe zʋŋa dɩ ka wʋ wo-nyɔɔrʋ yɩ o kɩ Wɛ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o wɩ: «Wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩntʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ goni ni-dʋʋrɩ mʋ dɩdaanɩ nabiinǝ amʋ jana kam ŋwaanɩ. Maŋa kalʋ maama á na lagɩ á nyɔ-tɩ tɩn, sɩ á kɩ-na kʋntʋ á taá ma guli amʋ gulǝ.»
46011026	Bɛŋwaanɩ, maŋa kalʋ maama á na di dɩpɛ dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ á nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, á kɩ á ma á brɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ dɩm na yɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi maŋa kam o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
46011027	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na di dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tʋʋnɩ gulim dɩpɛ dɩm naa o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm, yɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn, kʋntʋ tu kɩ kǝm-balɔrɔ mʋ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩra yam dɩ o jana kam.
46011028	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o da yigǝ o taa ye o tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ o laan di dɩpɛ dɩm o daarɩ o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm.
46011029	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na di dɩpɛ dɩm yɩ o kwǝri o nyɔ wo-nyɔɔrʋ tɩm dɩ goonǝ tɩn wʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩra yam mʋ, kʋntʋ tu vaŋɩ taanɩ mʋ o daŋɩ o tɩtɩ yuu nɩ.
46011030	Kʋntʋ nan mʋ paɩ á zanzan ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ, yɩ á badaara bwǝnǝ, yɩ á badonnǝ tʋa.
46011031	Dɩbam nan ya na yǝni dɩ́ da yigǝ dɩ́ bwe dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ́ nii yɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ dɩ́ na yɩ balʋ tɩn, Wɛ ya daa bá pa dɩ́ na cam.
46011032	Dɩ́ Yuutu Wɛ nan yǝni DƖ vaŋɩ dɩbam zwɛ sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ joori dɩ́ tʋ cwǝŋǝ nɩ mʋ, sɩ maŋa kalʋ DƖ na wʋ́ ba DƖ di nɔɔna maama taanɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ zaŋɩ dɩ́ ga bʋra DƖ tee nɩ, nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn te.
46011033	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a ko-biǝ-ba, á na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á di Zezi tʋʋnɩ gulim wʋdiu kʋm, sɩ á zuri á yɩra á cǝgi daanɩ.
46011034	Wʋlʋ kana na wɔɛ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu da yigǝ o di o sɔŋɔ nɩ, sɩ o laan daarɩ o ba, sɩ á yɩ vaŋɩ Wɛ sarɩya á daŋɩ á yuu nɩ maŋa kalʋ á na jeeri daanɩ tɩn. Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, amʋ na tuǝ, a laan wʋ́ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ kɩ te.
46012001	Kʋ daarɩ, a laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ Jorokʋm pɛɛra yam laŋa nɩ mʋ. A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ a pa á lwarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na tʋŋɩ te dɩ te tɩn mʋ.
46012002	Abam ye nɩ, maŋa kalʋ á dɛɛn ta na wʋ lwarɩ Wɛ tɩn, á dɛɛn tɔgɩ jwǝnǝ yalʋ na yɩ kafɛ tɩn mʋ, yɩ ya ganɩ abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ maama ya na lagɩ tɩn.
46012003	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a lagɩ a pa á lwarɩ nɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm bá ganɩ abam. Kʋntʋ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ Wɛ Joro dam tɩn bá wanɩ o twɩ Zezi. Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o ta nɩ, Zezi mʋ yɩ o Yuutu, yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm tǝri o tee nɩ.
46012004	Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛɛra yam yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, yɩ DƖ Joro kʋm dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ paɩ-ya DƖ nɔɔna.
46012005	Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam dɩ yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋlʋ dɩ́ na tʋŋɩ dɩ́ pa-o tɩn yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ.
46012006	Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam dam sɩ dɩ́ ma tʋŋɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa te tɩn dɩ yɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ. Wɛ nan yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ, yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩbam maama dam dɩm kʋntʋ maama.
46012007	Wɛ Joro kʋm nan pɛ nɔɔnʋ maama pɛɛrɩ sɩ o wanɩ o maa zǝni o donnǝ.
46012008	Wɛ Joro kʋm paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ swan taanɩ, yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ ta paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ yǝno taanɩ dɩ.
46012009	Wɛ Joro kʋm nan ta mʋ paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ dam sɩ ba taa tiini ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, yɩ kʋ ta paɩ badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ta maa paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ.
46012010	Kʋntʋ nan ta mʋ paɩ badonnǝ dam sɩ ba ta maa kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla, kʋ daarɩ sɩ badonnǝ taa waɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ. Kʋ daa ta maa paɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ waɩ ba pɔɔrɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm nyɩm dɩ kʋlʋ na daɩ kʋ nyɩm tɩn daanɩ. Kʋ ta paɩ badonnǝ waɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ badonnǝ dɩ waɩ ba lwarɩ ta-gɛ sɩm kʋntʋ kuri yɩ ba tɛ ba brɩ ba donnǝ.
46012011	Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm kʋntʋ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ jɩgɩ pɛɛra yam kʋntʋ dwi tǝri tǝri, yɩ kʋ paɩ nɔɔnʋ maama nɩ kʋ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
46012012	Nan bʋŋɩ-na á nii nabiinu yɩra na yɩ te tɩn. Ya yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, yɩ ya laan pɔɔrɩ je dwi tǝri tǝri. Ya pɔɔrɩm dɩm daga zanzan, yɩ ya maama laan yɩ yɩra dɩdʋa mʋ. Zezi Krisi dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm maama dɩ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
46012013	Dɩbam maama na pɛ ba miisi dɩbam na wʋnɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩdʋa dam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, dɩ́ laan jigi nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa mʋ. Kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ naa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ, naa gambɛ naa balʋ na te ba tɩtɩ tɩn maama, Wɛ Joro kʋm kʋntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ dɩbam maama tee nɩ.
46012014	Nabiinu yɩra pɔɔrɩ je tǝri tǝri mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ jǝgǝ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ.
46012015	Naga na tagɩ ka wɩ, kantʋ daɩ jɩŋa, kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ yɩra yam ba te-ka, kʋntʋ bá sɩɩnɩ kʋ pa ka taa tɔgɩ ka tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
46012016	Zwɛ dɩ nan na wɩ, dɩntʋ daɩ yi, sɩ yɩra yam ba te-dɩ, kʋntʋ bá sɩɩnɩ kʋ pa dɩ taa tɔgɩ dɩ tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ.
46012017	Yɩra yam maama nan ya na yɩ yi yɩranɩ mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya taa ni taanɩ? Ya nan ya na yɩ zwɛ yɩranɩ mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya taa ni lwǝm?
46012018	Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ mʋ kɩ je sɩm dwi tǝri tǝri DƖ kɩ yɩra yam wʋnɩ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
46012019	Ya maama nan ya na yɩ yɩra yam jǝgǝ dɩdʋa mʋ, yaá kɩ ta mʋ ya ji yɩra?
46012020	Kʋntʋ tɩn, je dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ wʋra, yɩ sɩ maama laan yɩ yɩra dɩdʋa.
46012021	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, yi bá wanɩ dɩ ta dɩ jɩŋa nɩ dɩ ba lagɩ-ka, naa yuu ta dɩ naga nɩ kʋ ba lagɩ-ka.
46012022	A lagɩ a ta cɩga mʋ dɩ abam nɩ, dɩbam yɩra yam je sɩlʋ dɩ́ na bʋŋɩ nɩ sɩ tiini sɩ bwǝnǝ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri zanzan.
46012023	Dɩ́ yɩra yam je sɩlʋ dɩ́ na bʋŋɩ nɩ sɩ ba tiini sɩ jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ zuli lanyɩranɩ. Je sɩlʋ na jɩgɩ cavɩɩra tɩn, mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ kwǝli-sɩ lanyɩranɩ.
46012024	Kʋ daarɩ ya je sɩlʋ na lana tɩn, dɩ́ daa ba fɔgɩ dɩ́ nii sɩ baŋa nɩ. Wɛ mʋ kɩ nabiinu yɩra yam je sɩm maama DƖ kɩ daanɩ, yɩ DƖ paɩ je sɩlʋ na gɛ zulǝ tɩn na zulǝ lanyɩranɩ.
46012025	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kampwara tǝri yɩra yam wʋnɩ. Ya je sɩm maama zǝni daanɩ mʋ.
46012026	Kʋ na cana yɩra yam daa kalʋ nɩ, yɩra yam maama wʋ́ tɔgɩ ya na cam dɩm kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ. Kʋ daarɩ daa kalʋ na nɛ zulǝ tɩn, yɩra yam maama dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ ya na wʋpolo mʋ.
46012027	Abam maama yɩ Zezi Krisi yɩra yam mʋ, yɩ á dɩdʋa dɩdʋa yɩ o je sɩm dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ.
46012028	Kʋntʋ tɩn, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, Wɛ kɩ nɔɔnʋ maama o jǝgǝ nɩ mʋ. Dayigǝ tɩn yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam o tɩtɩ na lɩ tɩn mʋ. Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam maa saŋɩ. Balʋ na kɩ bɩtɔ tɩn maa yɩ balʋ na brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn. Kʋ wǝli dɩ balʋ na kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla tɩn, dɩ balʋ Wɛ na pɛ-ba dam sɩ ba ta maa paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ tɩn, dɩ balʋ na zǝni nɔɔna tɩn, dɩ balʋ na nii Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam baŋa nɩ tɩn, dɩ balʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn.
46012029	Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna balʋ o tɩtɩ dɛɛn na lɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ yɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ waɩ dɩ́ kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla.
46012030	Kʋ nan daɩ dɩ́ maama mʋ Wɛ pɛ dam sɩ dɩ́ taá ma paɩ yawɩɩna naɩ yazurǝ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, naa dɩ́ maama mʋ waɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ sɩ kuri dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna.
46012031	Nan kwaanɩ-na sɩ á joŋi Wɛ-pɛɛra yalʋ na jɩgɩ kuri kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn. Kʋ daarɩ, a nan lagɩ a brɩ abam woŋo kʋlʋ na tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe dɩdɩ tɩn mʋ.
46013001	Amʋ na maŋɩ a waɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ nabiinǝ dwi tǝri tǝri taana, dɩ malɛsɩsɩm taanɩ dɩ, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ nyɩ dɩ sɔɔ mʋ a kɩa, nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na magɩ kwaŋa dɩ loŋini yɩ tɩ kɩ sɔɔ te tɩn.
46013002	Amʋ na maŋɩ a jɩgɩ Wɛ-pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ na paɩ a waɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn, yɩ a jɩgɩ yǝno maama, yɩ a kwǝri a ye cɩga kalʋ maama na sǝgi nabiinǝ yigǝ nɩ tɩn, yɩ a na maŋɩ a jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ sɩ a taa waɩ a paɩ pweeru zaŋɩ tɩ je nɩ tɩ ve tɩ tʋ mɛ a na lagɩ tɩn, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
46013003	Amʋ na maŋɩ a kwe a jɩjɩgɩrʋ maama a maŋɩ a pa yinigǝ tiinǝ, yɩ a ta kwǝri a sɛ sɩ ba kwe a yɩra yam ba dɩ mini nɩ, yɩ a na ba jɩgɩ sono, kʋ ta maŋɩ kʋ ba jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa-nɩ.
46013004	Sono tu jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru mʋ, yɩ o kɩ nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ. Sono tu ba jɩgɩ pu-sɩŋa naa o magɩ o nyɔɔnɩ, o nan ba jɩgɩ kamunni dɩ.
46013005	Sono tu ba kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn, o nan ba beeri o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ zǝnǝ má. O nan jɩgɩ ban-pʋnʋ. Nɔɔnʋ na kɩ-o lwarɩm, o ba kwe o kɩ o wʋnɩ.
46013006	Sono tu ba kɩ wʋpolo dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ balɔrɔ tɩn, o kɩ wʋpolo dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn mʋ.
46013007	Sono tu waɩ o vɔ o wʋ woŋo maama baŋa nɩ, yɩ o jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ tɩɩna dɩ wʋ-zuru woŋo maama baŋa nɩ.
46013008	Sono ba tiǝ. Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩlʋ nɔɔna na ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn wʋ́ ba sɩ kɛ. Wɛ-pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ nɔɔna na maa ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn dɩ wʋ́ ba dɩ kɛ. Yǝno dɩ wʋ́ ba kʋ kɛ.
46013009	Lele kʋntʋ yǝno kʋlʋ dɩbam na jɩgɩ tɩn yɩ cicoro mʋ. Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩlʋ dɩ́ na ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ cicwǝǝru mʋ.
46013010	Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba fɔgɩ wǝǝnu maama DƖ pa tɩ maŋɩ fasɩ tɩn, wo-cicwǝǝru tɩm maama laan wʋ́ je mʋ.
46013011	Maŋa kalʋ a na yɩ bu tɩn, a dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ biim mʋ, yɩ a kwǝri a bʋŋɩ nɩ bu te, yɩ a jeeli nɩ bu te. Lele kʋntʋ, a na kɩ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, a kwe busɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩm maama a yagɩ mʋ.
46013012	Lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ na lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn, kʋ taa nyɩ dɩ niu mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ dɩ́ nii kʋ wʋnɩ liirǝ liirǝ. Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kam kʋntʋ na yiǝ, dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ta naɩ jaja mʋ. Lele kʋntʋ yǝno kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ tɩn yɩ cicoro mʋ. Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ, a laan wʋ́ ta ye wǝǝnu maama kuri a tiǝ, nɩ Wɛ na ye amʋ DƖ ti te tɩn.
46013013	Kʋ daarɩ wǝǝnu tɩtɔ mʋ wʋ́ ta wʋra maŋa maama. Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ tɩɩna dɩ sono. Kʋlʋ nan na dwe tɩ maama tɩn mʋ yɩ sono.
46014001	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá jɩgɩ sono, sɩ á daarɩ á kwaanɩ á joŋi Wɛ-pɛɛra yalʋ DƖ Jorokʋm na paɩ nɔɔna tɩn á wǝli da, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ sɩ á wanɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ.
46014002	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm tɩn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ Wɛ mʋ, sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩ nabiinǝ, ba na ba ni o taanɩ dɩm kuri tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ paɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na sǝgi tɩn.
46014003	Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na waɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn ŋɔɔnɩ o brɩ nabiinǝ mʋ, sɩ kʋ kwe-ba kʋ daarɩ kʋ zǝni-ba sɩ ba taa fɔgɩ ba zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa.
46014004	Wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm tɩn, kʋ wǝli o tɩtɩ yɩranɩ mʋ. Wʋlʋ nan na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn, kʋ wǝli Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama mʋ.
46014005	Amʋ ya lagɩ sɩ abam maama taa waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm, a nan tiini a lagɩ sɩ á taá waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm mʋ á dwe dɩdɩ. Bɛŋwaanɩ wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ tɩn tiini o jɩgɩ zǝnǝ o dwe wʋlʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ tɩn, kʋ na daɩ nɩ nɔɔnʋ na wʋra sɩ o wanɩ o pipiri o taanɩ dɩm kuri sɩ kʋ zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama.
46014006	Kʋntʋ tɩn, a ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ na tu abam te, yɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ yɩranɩ mʋ dɩ abam, bɛɛ nyɔɔrɩ mʋ á lagɩ á na? Kʋlʋ na wʋ́ wǝli abam tɩn mʋ yɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa á na vɩɩrɩm, naa dɩ pa á na yǝno, naa a ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, naa a zaasɩ abam Wɛ cɩga kam.
46014007	Dɩ́ nan kwe duduurǝ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa tɩn dɩ́ ma maŋɩ dɩ́ nii: Nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ wuǝ o wui yɔɔ yɔɔ, naa o jɩgɩ kɔnɔ o magɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ, nɔɔna wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba ni kʋ ywǝǝni?
46014008	Nɔɔnʋ nan na jɩgɩ jara nabɔnɔ o wui yɔɔ yɔɔ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ nɩ jara mʋ wʋra sɩ o nuŋi o vu.
46014009	Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ n na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ warɩ sɩ kuri o pipiri, nɔɔna wʋ́ kɩ ta mʋ ba lwarɩ n na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri? Kʋntʋ nan brɩ nɩ n ŋɔɔnɩ n yagɩ gaa wʋnɩ mʋ.
46014010	Taana dwi zanzan mʋ wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, yɩ taan-taanɩ tǝrǝ dɩ na ba jɩgɩ kuri dɩ pa dɩ tiinǝ.
46014011	Nɔɔnʋ nan na ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ a na ba ni tɩn dɩ amʋ, kʋntʋ brɩ nɩ dɩbam maama bale yɩ vǝrǝ mʋ da-tee nɩ.
46014012	Kʋ nan yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ abam dɩ, abam na lagɩ sɩ á joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ tɩn, á nan kwaanɩ-na á joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ na wʋ́ zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm sɩ kʋ zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn.
46014013	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, abam wʋlʋ na waɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, sɩ o tiini o loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ pa o taa waɩ sɩ kuri dɩ o tɛa.
46014014	Amʋ na mɛ ta-gɛ sɩm a ma a warɩ Wɛ, kʋ yɩ a joro mʋ ŋɔɔna, sɩ amʋ tɩtɩ ba ni sɩ kuri.
46014015	Kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ a kɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ a warɩ Wɛ dɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ a joro maama, sɩ a daarɩ a taa leeni dɩ a wʋbʋŋa maama dɩ a joro maama a taa zuli Wɛ.
46014016	Kʋ nan na daɩ kʋntʋ, yɩ n na mɛ ta-gɛ sɩm n ma n zuli Wɛ, yɩ nɔn-gaa na je o cǝgǝ, o bá wanɩ o ni sɩ kuri. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, oó kɩ ta mʋ o tɔgɩ o sɛ nmʋ na zuli Wɛ te tɩn sɩ o dɩ ta nɩ «Amina»?
46014017	Nmʋ na zuli Wɛ te tɩn na maŋɩ kʋ lamma te, kʋ bá zǝni nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ.
46014018	Kʋ na yɩ amʋ, a kɩ Wɛ le dɩ DƖ na pɛ-nɩ dam sɩ a taa ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm a dwe abam maama tɩn.
46014019	Kʋ daarɩ, a na wʋ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ, a tiini a lagɩ sɩ a taa maɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ ba na ni tɩn mʋ a ma ŋɔɔnɩ a brɩ-ba. A na ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩnu má yɩranɩ, kʋ garɩ a na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm bɩtarbiǝ mʋrr-fugǝ yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ba ni sɩ kuri.
46014020	A ko-biǝ-ba, á yɩ taá jɩgɩ bu-balwa wʋbʋŋa. Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ lwarɩm jǝgǝ nɩ, sɩ á taá nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ bu-sɩsɩn na yǝri lwarɩm kǝm te tɩn, sɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
46014021	Kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Amʋ Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ tʋŋɩ vǝrǝ, sɩ ba ba ba ŋɔɔnɩ amʋ ni-taanɩ dɩm dɩ abam. Baá ŋɔɔnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ á na ba ni tɩn dɩ abam. Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, á ta bá sɛ a ni.»
46014022	Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ maɩ ta-gɛ DƖ maa brɩ DƖ dam balʋ na wʋ sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ. Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm mʋ brɩ DƖ dam balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ balʋ na wʋ sɛ-DƖ tɩn tee nɩ.
46014023	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm maama na jeeri daanɩ, yɩ á maama na wʋra á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na maŋɩ o wʋ ni-sɩ naa balʋ na wʋ sɛ Wɛ tɩn na tu ba zʋ á wʋnɩ yɩ ba ba ni sɩ kuri tɩn, ba bá ta nɩ á co mʋ na?
46014024	Abam maama nan na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ á brɩ daanɩ, yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋm kʋntʋ doŋ na tu o zʋ á wʋ, wʋntʋ wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ dam mʋ wʋ á tee nɩ. O na ni kʋlʋ maama tɩn wʋ́ pa o lwarɩ nɩ o ba jɩgɩ bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ o kwǝri o lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ lagɩ DƖ di o taanɩ.
46014025	Wʋbʋŋa yalʋ maama ya na sǝgi o wʋnɩ tɩn laan wʋ́ ba ya lwarɩ jaja mʋ, yɩ o laan wʋ́ kɩ o yuu tɩga nɩ o zuli Wɛ, yɩ o sɛ nɩ Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ wʋ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ.
46014026	A ko-biǝ-ba, abam na jeeri daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, á na maŋɩ sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: Abam dɩdʋa mʋ wʋ́ zaŋɩ o pa lǝŋǝ. Dɩdʋa dɩ ma zaŋɩ o brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam. Wʋdoŋ dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ta vɩɩrɩm dɩlʋ Wɛ na brɩ-o tɩn. Wʋwʋm dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ, yɩ wʋdoŋ dɩ ma zaŋɩ o ta ta-gɛ sɩm kuri o brɩ á kɔgɔ kʋm. Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama zǝni Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm sɩ kʋ fɔgɩ kʋ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
46014027	Abam badaara na lagɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá yɩ bale naa batɔ yɩranɩ mʋ. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá zaŋɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ á daarɩ á pa daanɩ mʋ, sɩ á dɩdʋa zaŋɩ o ta ŋwɛ sɩm kuri.
46014028	Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan na tǝri á wʋnɩ sɩ o wanɩ o ta ŋwɛ sɩm kuri, balʋ ya na lagɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba yagɩ mʋ, sɩ ba na wʋ ba yɩranɩ, sɩ ba taa ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ dɩ Wɛ.
46014029	Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ bale naa batɔ mʋ zaŋɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ dɩdʋa dɩdʋa, sɩ badaara bam taa cǝgǝ, sɩ ba laan bwɛ ba nii sɩ yɩ cɩga mʋ naa vwan mʋ.
46014030	Wɛ na vɩɩrɩ nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa DƖ cɩga kam balʋ na je ba cǝgi tɩn wʋnɩ sɩ o ta o brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ wʋlʋ na zɩgɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn mʋ pu o ni, sɩ o daarɩ sɩ wʋdoŋ wʋm ta-ka.
46014031	Kʋntʋ tɩn, abam maama waɩ á ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm dɩdʋa dɩdʋa, sɩ kʋ pa á zaasɩ Wɛ cɩga kam da-tee nɩ, sɩ á taá fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
46014032	Balʋ na joŋi dam Wɛ Jorokʋm tee nɩ sɩ ba taa ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm tɩn waɩ ba tɩtɩ ba jaana maŋa kalʋ ba na wʋra ba ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn.
46014033	Wɛ lagɩ sɩ woŋo maama taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ mʋ dɩ yazurǝ, sɩ DƖ ba lagɩ yɔɔ yɔɔ kǝm.
46014034	Abam na kikili daanɩ sɩ á zuli Wɛ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ kaana taa je cɩm mʋ sɩ ba taa cǝgǝ. Mʋ kʋ na yɩ te Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm jǝgǝ maama nɩ. Ba ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba da ba ŋɔɔnɩ. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ baara bam, nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm na maŋɩ tɩ brɩ te tɩn mʋ.
46014035	Ba na lagɩ sɩ ba lwarɩ woŋo kʋlʋ kuri, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba bwe ba banna mʋ sɔŋɔ nɩ, sɩ kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ kaanɩ zaŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ á kikilǝ kam wʋnɩ.
46014036	Abam bʋŋɩ á paɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm nuŋi abam te mʋ na? Mʋ naa á bʋŋɩ á paɩ abam yɩranɩ mʋ ye Wɛ taanɩ dɩm na?
46014037	Abam wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ nɩ o yɩ Wɛ nijoŋnu naa o joŋi Wɛ Joro kʋm pɛɛrɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye nɩ, amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ a pa abam tɩn yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ mʋ.
46014038	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na vɩn amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, Wɛ dɩ wʋ́ vɩn kʋntʋ tu.
46014039	Kʋntʋ, a ko-biǝ-ba, kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ yiyiu-ŋwɛ sɩm. Á nan yɩ zaŋɩ á cɩ balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ ta-gɛ sɩm Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ tɩn.
46014040	Nan taá kɩ-na woŋo maama sɩ kʋ taa tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
46015001	A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ a pa á guli Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a na maŋɩ a tɔɔlɩ dɩ abam tɩn mʋ. Abam maŋɩ á sɛ-ka, yɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
46015002	Amʋ na pɛ á lwarɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam te tɩn, á na wʋ joori ka kwaga nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ abam DƖ yagɩ kantʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, á na sɛ Zezi Krisi te tɩn yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
46015003	Wɛ cɩga kalʋ na dwe maama tɩn mʋ yɩ kalʋ amʋ na dɛ yigǝ a joŋi yɩ a laan daarɩ a brɩ abam tɩn. Kantʋ mʋ tɩntʋ: Zezi Krisi tɩgɩ dɩbam lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na maŋɩ kʋ ta te tɩn.
46015004	Ba ma kɩ-o bɔɔnɩ nɩ. Da yatɔ dɛ nɩ o ma joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na maŋɩ kʋ ta te tɩn.
46015005	O na bi tɩn, o ma pa Pɩyɛɛrɩ na-o, yɩ o tɩntʋŋna fugǝ-bale bam maama dɩ na-o.
46015006	Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, o ma brɩ o tɩtɩ o karabiǝ zanzan bɩdwɩ baŋa nɩ, bantʋ dwe nɩ nɔɔna biǝ yanu (500). Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ badaara zanzan ta ŋwɩ, ba fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ tɩga.
46015007	Zakɩ dɩ ma na-o, yɩ o daarɩ o pa o tɩntʋŋna bam maama na-o.
46015008	Kʋntʋ kwaga nɩ, o laan ma pa amʋ na nyɩ dɩ bu wʋlʋ ba na lʋga yɩ o lʋra maŋa ta wʋ yi tɩn dɩ na-o.
46015009	Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ tiini a muri Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam maama wʋnɩ. A ya brɩ a wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa bǝ-nɩ nɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋnʋ, a dɛɛn na bɛɛsɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
46015010	Wɛ nan na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo tɩn mʋ pɛ a yɩ a na yɩ wʋlʋ zɩm tɩn. DƖ na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo te tɩn daɩ kafɛ. Amʋ tiini a tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam a dwǝni DƖ tɩntʋŋna bam maama. Kʋ nan daɩ a tɩtɩ dam ŋwaanɩ mʋ a waɩ a tʋŋa. Kʋ yɩ Wɛ na kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo yɩ DƖ dam dɩm wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
46015011	Dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna tɩn maama yǝni dɩ́ brɩ cɩga dɩdʋa mʋ. Kʋ na yɩ amʋ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, naa bantʋ dɩ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga kalʋ abam na sɛ tɩn mʋ.
46015012	Dɩbam maama na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam te tɩn, dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna nɩ Zezi Krisi bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ. Bɛɛ nan mʋ yɩ abam badonnǝ tɛ á wɩ, twa biim tǝrǝ?
46015013	Kʋ ya na yɩ cɩga nɩ twa biim tǝrǝ, kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɩ wʋ bi mʋ.
