48005005	Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm nan wʋ dɩbam balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn tee nɩ, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna lanyɩranɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ.
48005006	Dɩ́ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, dɩ́ na goni dɩ́ bǝkǝri naa dɩ́ zɩ wʋ goni dɩ, kʋ daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Woŋo kʋlʋ nan na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ taá soe daanɩ lanyɩranɩ.
48005007	Abam dɛɛn yɔɔrɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ mʋ. Wɔɔ nan mʋ cɩgɩ á cwǝŋǝ sɩ á daa yɩ sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam?
48005008	Wʋlʋ na brɩ abam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn.
48005009	Kʋ nyɩ nɩ dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ tɛ te dɩ́ wɩ: «Dabɩlɩ fɩnfɩɩn na wʋ dɩpɛ mun-lɛɛrɩ wʋnɩ, kʋʋ́ pa dɩ maama fʋlɩ mʋ.»
48005010	Dɩbam maama na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn, amʋ ye nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdʋa mʋ. Wʋlʋ nan na jɩgɩ abam wʋbʋŋa o vugimi tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ kʋntʋ tu o kǝm-balɔrɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ, dɩ o na maŋɩ o yɩ te dɩ.
48005011	A ko-biǝ-ba, amʋ ba brɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ, o maŋɩ sɩ o go. A ya na brɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, nɔɔna bá bɛɛsɩ-nɩ a zaasɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ a na brɩ Zezi na tɩgɩ te tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn ya bá ta yɩ ta-lɔŋɔ dɩ nɔɔna.
48005012	Amʋ nan na bʋŋɩ te tɩn, kʋ yaá ta lana sɩ balʋ na jɩgɩ abam ba yaara dɩ gwǝŋǝ kam tɩn lɛ ba lwɩ ba tɩtɩ ba wǝli da, sɩ kʋ ta daɩ ba bǝkǝri gonim yɩranɩ.
48005013	A ko-biǝ-ba, Wɛ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ á laan taá te á tɩtɩ mʋ. Á nan na sɩɩnɩ á te á tɩtɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ á wʋ́ ta kɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ maama á wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn. Á nan taá tiini á zǝni daanɩ dɩ sono.
48005014	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ niǝ yam maama brɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, nɩ nɔɔnʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa soe o doŋ nɩ o na soe o tɩtɩ te tɩn.
48005015	Abam nan na jɩgɩ daanɩ nɩ vara na yǝni ba jɩgɩ daanɩ yɩ ba dʋnɩ daanɩ te tɩn, á taá ye sɩ á wʋ́ ba á cɔgɩ daanɩ dɩdʋa dɩdʋa á ti.
48005016	Nan cǝgi-na kʋlʋ kʋm a na lagɩ a ta tɩn. Pa-na Wɛ Joro kʋm taa vaɩ abam á ŋwɩa maama wʋnɩ, sɩ á yɩ taá sɛ á tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ á fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
48005017	Bɛŋwaanɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn ba jɩgɩ fra dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm. Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩ fra na zʋʋrɩ kʋlʋ tɩn dɩ nan ba jɩgɩ fra dɩ nabiinǝ. Kʋ maa brɩ nɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ tɩle wʋbʋŋa warɩ ya maŋɩ daanɩ. Kʋ ma pa á daa warɩ á wʋbʋŋa wǝǝnu á kɩ.
48005018	Wɛ Joro kʋm nan na vaŋɩ abam, cullu tɩm daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ tɩ taa te abam.
48005019	Nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ, tɩ yɩ jaja mʋ: kʋ yɩ boorim dwi maama, dɩ wo-digiru tɩtʋŋa, dɩ wo-zɔɔna kǝnǝ dwi maama,
48005020	dɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm, dɩ liri dim, dɩ ka culi daanɩ, dɩ ka ja daanɩ, dɩ wʋ-gʋʋ, dɩ ban-zɔŋɔ, dɩ ka beeri ka yɩratʋ zǝnǝ, dɩ ka yɩ sɛ daanɩ, dɩ ka pɔɔrɩ daanɩ,
48005021	dɩ wo-swǝnǝ, dɩ sa-nyɔrɩ, dɩ nɔn-kwǝlim, dɩ ka kɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩdonnǝ. A nan ta wʋ́ fɔgɩ a kaanɩ abam a wǝli da nɩ, balʋ na yǝni ba kɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ dwi tɩn, ba bá tɔgɩ ba zʋ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ.
48005022	Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na paɩ nɔɔna yɩ te tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: Kʋ paɩ nɔɔna jɩgɩ sono mʋ, dɩ wʋpolo, dɩ wʋ-zuru, dɩ ban-pʋnʋ, dɩ da-zulǝ, dɩ lanyɩranɩ kǝm, dɩ cɩga tɔgɩm,
48005023	dɩ wʋ-bono, dɩ ka ja n tɩtɩ. Culu nan tǝrǝ kʋ na vɩn wo-laarʋ tɩntʋ.
48005024	Kʋ na yɩ dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn, dɩ́ lɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋ-doorǝ yam dɩ́ yagɩ, yɩ ya daa ba te dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ dɩ́ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
48005025	Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa tɩn, dɩ́ pa-na kʋ taa vaŋɩ dɩbam dɩ́ ŋwɩa maama wʋnɩ.
48005026	Dɩ́ nan yɩ kɩ kamunni da-yɩranɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa da-wʋrʋ zaŋɩ naa dɩ́ taa jɩgɩ wʋ-gʋʋ daanɩ.
48006001	A ko-biǝ-ba, á na nɛ nɩ nɔɔnʋ kɩ kǝm o tusi, abam balʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm na vaŋɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ á zuri á yɩra mʋ á brɩ-o dɩ wʋ-bono, sɩ o joori o tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ. Á nan taá yɩrɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ kʋ yɩ zaŋɩ kʋ pa abam dɩ daa tusi.
48006002	Á taá zǝni daanɩ á cana wʋnɩ, sɩ á na kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ á sɛ Zezi Krisi ni dɩm o na pɛ tɩn.
48006003	Abam wʋlʋ na bʋŋɩ o paɩ o yɩ kamunu yɩ o yagɩ o daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu ganɩ o tɩtɩ mʋ.
48006004	Nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o taa nii o tɩtɩ tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn mʋ. Kʋntʋ tu nan na nɛ nɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam lana, o laan wʋ́ wanɩ o taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ o tɩtɩ na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn má, kʋ daɩ sɩ o kwe o maŋɩ dɩ o doŋ tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn.
48006005	Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ-o tɩn mʋ.
48006006	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ ba na zaas-o Wɛ taanɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o kɩ o na jɩgɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ o pa wʋlʋ na zaas-o tɩn.
48006007	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á ganɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o sǝgi o na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Nɔɔnʋ tɩtʋŋa na wʋ́ pa o na nyɔɔrɩ dɩlʋ tɩn nyɩ dɩ valʋ na dugi o kara yɩ o maŋɩ sɩ o joori o ba o zagɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ dwi o na dugi tɩn mʋ.
48006008	Nɔɔnʋ nan na tʋŋɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ o tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn, o nyɔɔrɩ mʋ wʋ́ ba taa yɩ tʋʋnɩ. Kʋ daarɩ nɔɔnʋ nan na tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ Wɛ Joro kʋm wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu nyɔɔrɩ mʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ na ba tiǝ DƖ Joro kʋm na wʋ́ pa-o tɩn.
48006009	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ nan yɩ pa yawɔrɔ zʋ dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ yagɩ lanyɩranɩ kǝm. Dɩ́ na fɔgɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na nyɔɔrɩ dɩlʋ na lana tɩn.
48006010	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ na nɛ pwǝlǝ maŋa dɩ maŋa, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ nɔɔna maama, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ dɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ dɩ na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn.
48006011	Nii-na, amʋ tɩtɩ laan mʋ mɛ a jɩŋa a pʋpʋnɩ pʋpʋn-bu-kamunǝ yantʋ sɩ a pa abam.
48006012	Kʋ na yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na kwaanɩ sɩ ba fɩn abam sɩ á taá gonǝ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn, bantʋ yɩ balʋ na lagɩ sɩ ba na yɩrɩ mʋ nɔɔna tee nɩ dɩ ba na kɩ ba tɩtɩ te tɩn. Ba nan ba lagɩ sɩ nɔɔna taa bɛɛsɩ-ba. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ ba bá sɛ sɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ-ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
48006013	Balʋ bam ba na sɛ sɩ ba taa goni tɩn tɩtɩ nan ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm cɩga cɩga. Ba nan lagɩ sɩ ba pa abam dɩ sɛ gwǝŋǝ kam mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa ba na cwǝŋǝ ba taa ŋɔɔnɩ ba magɩ ba nyɔɔna nɩ abam sɛ á go nɩ bantʋ te.
48006014	Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ, woŋo kʋlʋ yɩranɩ amʋ na wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ wʋpolo tɩn yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ o ma vrɩ nɔɔna te tɩn mʋ. Kʋ nan yɩ Zezi Krisi tʋʋn-dagara kam ŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ kʋntʋ wǝǝnu tɩm nyɩ nɩ tɩ tɩgɩ mʋ, tɩ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri dɩ amʋ, yɩ a dɩ nyɩ dɩ tʋ mʋ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩntʋ.
48006015	Nmʋ na gonǝ, naa n na wʋ goni dɩ, kʋntʋ daɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Woŋo kʋlʋ nan na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ n na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa Wɛ tee nɩ.
48006016	Kʋ nan na yɩ balʋ na sɛ kwiǝ yam kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ pa-ba wʋ-zuru yɩ DƖ duri ba ŋwaŋa lanyɩranɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ balʋ maama na yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna cɩga cɩga tɩn.
48006017	A daa ba lagɩ sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ joori o yaarɩ-nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ na maŋɩ a jɩgɩ ŋwandaala yalʋ a yɩra nɩ tɩn brɩ nɩ Zezi mʋ te-nɩ.
48006018	A ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo. Amina.
49001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ. A pʋpʋnɩ sɩ a pa abam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Efɛɛzɩ nɩ tɩn, abam balʋ na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn.
49001002	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
49001003	Dɩ́ zuli-na Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko tɩn. Dɩbam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ pɛ Wɛ kɩ dɩbam lanyɩranɩ. DƖ ma pa dɩbam wo-ŋʋnnʋ tɩlʋ maama na yɩ DƖ Joro kʋm nyɩm yɩ tɩ nuŋi DƖ sɔŋɔ kʋm nɩ tɩn.
49001004	Kʋ na loori sɩ Wɛ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn, DƖ maŋɩ DƖ da yigǝ DƖ kuri dɩbam mʋ sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo DƖ yigǝ nɩ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ tusi.
49001005	Wɛ na soe dɩbam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ wuuri DƖ kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa nɩ, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩ́ ji DƖ biǝ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
49001006	Kʋntʋ, dɩ́ zuli-na Wɛ, DƖ pɛɛrɩ dɩm na yɩ kamunu yɩ dɩ ba jɩgɩ doŋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. DƖ kwe-dɩ DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ, DƖ Bu-sono Zezi na vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
49001007	Kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi na tɩga yɩ o jana nuŋi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ o mɛ o ŋwɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm dɩm jɩnɩ, sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ yagɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ dɩbam. Mʋ Wɛ na kɩ te DƖ brɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm na tiini dɩ dagɩ te,
49001008	yɩ DƖ ma-dɩ DƖ zǝni dɩbam kʋ ja gaalɩ. DƖ ma pa dɩ́ na swan dwi maama dɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna lanyɩranɩ.
49001009	DƖ ma pa dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn na sǝgi tɩn. Mʋ woŋo kʋlʋ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ DƖ kɩ tɩn.
49001010	Wɛ nan bʋŋɩ sɩ, maŋa kam DƖ na lagɩ tɩn na yi ka ti, DƖ wʋ́ pa DƖ wʋbʋŋa sɩɩnɩ ya kɩ, sɩ wǝǝnu maama la daanɩ sɩ Zezi Krisi taa yɩ tɩ yuutu, kʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ wɛyuu nɩ dɩ tɩga baŋa nɩ tɩn maama.
49001011	Kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna. Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kʋlʋ Wɛ na maŋɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa nɩ sɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn. Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩlʋ na paɩ wǝǝnu maama sɩɩnɩ tɩ kɩ yɩ tɩ tɔgɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
49001012	Kʋ nan yɩ dɩbam balʋ na dɛ yigǝ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ Wɛ dɛɛn kuri, sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ te na wʋ́ pa DƖ na zulǝ DƖ zaanɩ kamunu kʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
49001013	Kʋntʋ, abam balʋ dɩ laan na tu á sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn, abam ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ na pɛ á na vrɩm lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi. Á na ŋwɩ dɩd-o kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ ma kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm á bɩcara nɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ go ni sɩ DƖ kɩ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ taa yɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋlʋ na brɩ nɩ á yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn.
49001014	Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn, kʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ laan wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na bʋŋɩ sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ taá cǝgi sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi maŋa kam Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ joŋi dɩbam balʋ maama na yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, yɩ kʋ maama wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ zanzan.
49001015	Wɛ na kɩ te maama DƖ pa abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, a kɩ DƖ le abam ŋwaanɩ maŋa maama. A ni abam ŋwa nɩ á tɔgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa, yɩ á kwǝri á soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama.
49001016	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a yǝni a kɩ Wɛ le, yɩ a kwǝri a loori-DƖ a pa abam.
49001017	A loori dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ tɩn, sɩ DƖ pa DƖ Joro kʋm zǝni abam sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna, sɩ DƖ vɩɩrɩ abam sɩ á wanɩ á lwarɩ DƖ na yɩ wʋlʋ tɩn.
49001018	Amʋ loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ pa á wʋ vɩɩrɩ, sɩ á wanɩ á lwarɩ DƖ na kuri abam sɩ á taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna yalʋ DƖ tee nɩ tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á lwarɩ DƖ wo-laarʋ tɩm na tiini tɩ daga yɩ tɩ ba jɩgɩ doŋ te. DƖ tiŋi-tɩ sɩ DƖ ba DƖ kwe DƖ pa balʋ na yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ.
49001019	Amʋ ta loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ pa á lwarɩ DƖ dam dɩm na daga dɩ ja gaalɩ te, yɩ DƖ ma-dɩ DƖ zǝni dɩbam balʋ maama na sɛ-DƖ tɩn. DƖ dam-fɔrɔ kʋm kʋntʋ mʋ DƖ mɛ DƖ tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-kamunǝ yam.
49001020	Dam dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ DƖ mɛ DƖ bi Zezi Krisi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ ma-dɩ DƖ zǝŋ-o DƖ pa o jǝni DƖ jazɩm nɩ DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ.
49001021	Kʋntʋ, Zezi Krisi laan mʋ te wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn. Kʋ na yɩ pwa dɩ dɩdɛɛra maama dɩ wɔnɔ tiinǝ maama, o dam dɩm dwe tɩ maama. Kʋ na yɩ zɩm wǝǝnu tɩm dam, naa jwa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lagɩ tɩ ba tɩn dɩ, Zezi yɩrɩ dɩm mʋ dwe yɩra yalʋ maama ba na bǝ tɩn.
49001022	Wɛ ma kwe wǝǝnu maama DƖ kɩ Zezi Krisi dam kuri nɩ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ tiŋ-o sɩ o taa yɩ o nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm yuutu, sɩ o taa te woŋo maama.
49001023	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm mʋ nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam, kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ ŋwɩ ba wʋnɩ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ woŋo maama wʋra wɛyuu dɩ tɩga baŋa je maama nɩ.
49002001	Abam dɛɛn yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na nuŋi Wɛ te, á na vɩn Wɛ ni yɩ á kɩ lwarɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49002002	Á dɛɛn ma tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ cwe tɩn, yɩ á daarɩ á tɔgɩ sʋtaana-pɛ wʋlʋ na te wɛyuu tɩlampolo ciciri sɩm tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sʋtaanɩ dɩlʋ laan na te balʋ na vɩn Wɛ ni tɩn.
49002003	Dɩbam maama dɛɛn tɔgɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ cwe sɩm mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ kɩ wo-zɔɔna yalʋ dɩ́ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn. Dɩ́ ma yǝni dɩ́ kɩ wo-zɔɔna nɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa dɩ dɩ́ yɩra na lagɩ te tɩn. Dɩbam dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn mʋ brɩ nɩ Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ya maŋɩ sɩ kʋ ba dɩbam baŋa, nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔna maama dɩ te.
49002004	Kʋ daarɩ Wɛ nan tiini DƖ jɩgɩ nɔɔna ŋwaŋa kʋ gaalɩ. DƖ maa soe dɩbam zanzan.
49002005	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ pɛ dɩbam maama DƖ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ na zǝni dɩbam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩbam dɛɛn na je dɩ́ lwarɩm dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ. Wɛ vrɩ dɩbam DƖ yagɩ zaanɩ mʋ.
49002006	Wɛ pɛ dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ bi dɩ́ na DƖ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ zǝŋi dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na jǝŋǝ je DƖ sɔŋɔ kʋm nɩ.
49002007	Wɛ na kɩ dɩbam lanyɩranɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ kʋ taa brɩ nɔɔna maŋa kalʋ na bɩɩnɩ tɩn nɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm tiini dɩ daga mʋ.
49002008	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ vrɩ abam lwarɩm wʋnɩ zaanɩ mʋ, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ daɩ abam tɩtɩ dam, kʋ yɩ Wɛ pɛɛrɩ mʋ.
49002009	Kʋ daɩ abam tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o ba o tee o tɩtɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
49002010	Wɛ mʋ mɔɔnɩ dɩbam. DƖ ma pa dɩbam DƖ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ tiŋi DƖ pa dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ kɩ tɩn.
49002011	Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á guli á dɛɛn na yɩ te yɩ Wɛ ya ta wʋ vrɩ abam lwarɩm wʋnɩ tɩn. Ba wʋ lʋgɩ abam Zwifǝ bam wʋnɩ. Á yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ mʋ, yɩ Zwifǝ bam na brɩ ba tɩtɩ nɩ ba yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ ba goni ba bǝkǝri tɩn mʋ yáalɩ abam dɩ á na yǝri á bǝkǝri gonim tɩn. Bantʋ na goni ba bǝkǝri te tɩn, kʋ yɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋlʋ nabiinǝ na kɩ tɩn mʋ.
49002012	Kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ, abam dɛɛn yǝri Zezi Krisi. Á dɛɛn tɔgɩ á tǝri Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tiinǝ balʋ Wɛ na kuri tɩn wʋnɩ. Abam yigǝ dɛɛn tɔgɩ ka tǝrǝ dɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na mɛ DƖ go ni dɩ DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn wʋnɩ. Á dɛɛn na ŋwɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, Wɛ tǝri á tee nɩ, yɩ á ba jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ.
49002013	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ na tɩgɩ yɩ o jana kam nuŋi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ á twɛ dɩ Baŋa-Wɛ, yɩ abam dɛɛn ya baŋwɛ dɩ DƖ.
49002014	Zezi Krisi mʋ pɛ dɩbam wʋ-zuru, yɩ o paɩ ywǝǝni wʋ dɩbam tɩtarɩ nɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ pɛ Zwifǝ bam dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam maama ji dwi dɩdʋa. O ma saarɩ sisǝni dɩlʋ ya na pwɛ-ba yɩ ba culi daanɩ tɩn.
49002015	O na sɛ o pa o tɩtɩ sɩ ba gʋ-o tɩn mʋ pɛ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm dɩ tɩ na brɩ kʋlʋ maama tɩn ji kafɛ. Kʋntʋ mʋ o fɔgɩ Zwifǝ bam dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ bam o kɩ daanɩ, sɩ ba maama ji dwi dɩdʋa ba na ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49002016	Ba maama laan na jigi dwi dɩdʋa kʋntʋ tɩn, o ma kwɛ ba dɩ Wɛ daanɩ, o na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. O tʋʋnɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ o pɛ ba daa ba culi daanɩ.
49002017	Zezi Krisi mʋ tu o tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam sɩ dɩbam maama dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ, kʋ na yɩ abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ balʋ dɛɛn na baŋwɛ dɩ DƖ tɩn, naa dɩbam Zwifǝ balʋ na maŋɩ dɩ́ batwarɩ dɩ DƖ tɩn.
49002018	Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩbam maama jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ twɛ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ te, Wɛ Joro kʋm na yɩ dɩdʋa yɩ kʋ wʋ dɩ́ maama tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49002019	Kʋntʋ, abam balʋ na yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ tɩn, á daa daɩ vǝrǝ, á nan daɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ daga. Abam laan yɩ dwi dɩdʋa mʋ dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam, yɩ á tɔgɩ á yɩ DƖ sɔŋɔ kʋm biǝ.
49002020	Abam tɔgɩ á yɩ Wɛ kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna mʋ, yɩ kɔgɔ kʋm kʋntʋ nyɩ dɩ digǝ mʋ te. Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam dɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam mʋ cwi digǝ kam kʋntʋ kuri. Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ kandwɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ digǝ kam zɩga lana tɩn.
49002021	O maa pa digǝ kam lɔɔm maama tɔgɩ daanɩ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ o pa ka puli ka daga, sɩ ka taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nyɩm o nɔɔna bam na wʋ́ ta zul-o da tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49002022	Abam dɩ tɔgɩ á wǝli Wɛ nɔɔna bam wʋnɩ mʋ á na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ, abam nyɩ dɩ Wɛ digǝ kalʋ DƖ na wʋra DƖ lɔa, sɩ DƖ taa zʋʋrɩ ka wʋnɩ dɩ DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn mʋ.
49003001	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ amʋ Pooli yǝni a loori Wɛ a pa abam. A na tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ abam dwi-gɛ tiinǝ tɩn mʋ pɛ ba kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ.
49003002	Abam nan ni nɩ, tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ-nɩ sɩ a tʋŋɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ a tɔɔlɩ DƖ zaanɩ kwǝrǝ kam mʋ a brɩ abam.
49003003	Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ vɩɩrɩ amʋ sɩ a wanɩ a lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kalʋ na sǝgi tɩn. Kʋntʋ mʋ amʋ maŋɩ a pʋpʋnɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ taanɩ fɩnfɩɩn a brɩ abam.
49003004	Abam nan na karɩmɩ amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, á wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ amʋ ni Zezi Krisi cɩga kalʋ na sǝgi tɩn kuri lanyɩranɩ.
49003005	Faŋa faŋa tɩn Wɛ wʋ pɛ nabiinǝ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam kʋntʋ. DƖ laan nan mɛ DƖ Joro kʋm mʋ DƖ vɩɩrɩ Zezi tɩntʋŋna bam dɩ DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam sɩ ba lwarɩ-ka.
49003006	Cɩga kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sɩ DƖ pa dwi-gɛ tiinǝ balʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn tɔgɩ ba na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na lagɩ DƖ pa Zwifǝ balʋ na sɛ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn, sɩ ba dɩ tɔgɩ ba ji dwi dɩdʋa dɩ Zwifǝ bam, sɩ ba laan joŋi kʋlʋ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn.
49003007	Kʋ yɩ yu-yoŋo mʋ yɩ Wɛ kuri-nɩ sɩ a ji DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩntʋŋnʋ, yɩ DƖ pa-nɩ dam DƖ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
49003008	Amʋ nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na tiini a muri Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ Wɛ daa ta pa-nɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋm dɩm kʋntʋ, sɩ a taa ve dwi-gɛ tiinǝ te a brɩ-ba DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, sɩ ba lwarɩ Zezi Krisi wo-laarʋ tɩm na tiini tɩ dagɩ te, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o lwarɩ-tɩ o ti.
49003009	Amʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ a pa nabiinǝ mʋ lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam na tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ tɩn. Kʋ na zɩgɩ pulim nɩ tɩn, Wɛ dɩlʋ na kɩ wǝǝnu maama tɩn mʋ pɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ sǝgi, kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm.
49003010	DƖ laan ma tɔgɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa dɩdɛɛra dɩ pwa balʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam wɛyuu tɩlampolo kʋm nɩ tɩn lwarɩ DƖ swan yam dwi tǝri tǝri na yɩ te.
49003011	Wɛ tagɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ kʋntʋ, nɩ DƖ na maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ DƖ kɩ kʋlʋ pulim nɩ tɩn.
49003012	Dɩ́ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, o maa paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ baarɩ yɩ o pa dɩbam cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ twɛ Wɛ te sɩ dɩ́ yɩ taá kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ, dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49003013	Abam nan yɩ pa á wʋrʋ cɔgɩ sɩ á ga baarɩ dɩ amʋ na yaarɩ te abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, sɩ kʋ yɩ abam yuu zǝŋim ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
49003014	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ amʋ yǝni a kuni doonǝ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ yigǝ nɩ a loori-DƖ abam ŋwaanɩ.
49003015	Kʋ na yɩ wɛyuu nɩ naa lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, balʋ maama nɔɔna na jɩgɩ-ba ba bǝ nɩ ba kwǝ tɩn kuri nuŋi Wɛ na yɩ dɩbam Ko tɩn te mʋ.
49003016	Amʋ yǝni a loori Wɛ mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa DƖ Joro kʋm pa á bɩcara na dam, DƖ paarɩ-zulǝ na dagɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ,
49003017	sɩ Zezi Krisi taa tigi á wʋbʋŋa nɩ, dɩ á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Amʋ ta loori-DƖ mʋ sɩ DƖ pa á taá ŋwɩ sono wʋnɩ, sɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ nɩ tiu nɛ na kwaarɩ tɩga nɩ te tɩn,
49003018	sɩ á wanɩ á wǝli dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama á lwarɩ Zezi Krisi sono kʋm na maɩ te tɩn. Zezi Krisi sono kʋm na tiini kʋ dagɩ te tɩn nyɩ dɩ woŋo na tiini kʋ yalma kʋ dwarma kʋ yɩ baŋa baŋa yɩ kʋ luunǝ zanzan tɩn mʋ.
49003019	O sono kʋm nan dwe sɩ nabiinǝ lwarɩ kʋ na yɩ te tɩn. Wɛ nan wʋ́ pa abam lwarɩ-kʋ, sɩ DƖ ŋwɩa kam laan su á bɩcara maama.
49003020	Pa-na dɩ́ zuli Wɛ dɩlʋ na waɩ woŋo maama DƖ kɩ tɩn, dɩ DƖ na yǝni DƖ zǝni dɩbam dɩ DƖ dam dɩm, yɩ kʋ tiini kʋ dwe kʋlʋ maama dɩbam na wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ bʋŋɩ naa dɩ́ loori-DƖ tɩn.
49003021	Baŋa-Wɛ maŋɩ sɩ DƖ na zulǝ DƖ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm maama tee nɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn. Amina.
49004001	Amʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn, a loori abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ cwǝ-laa sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ te tɩn.
49004002	Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á tu á tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-bono maŋa maama, sɩ á daarɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ á taá wǝli daanɩ dɩ sono.
49004003	Kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ nɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam te, sɩ á wǝli daanɩ sɩ yazurǝ taa wʋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ.
49004004	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yɩ dwi dɩdʋa mʋ, Wɛ Joro kʋm dɩ yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ, nɩ Wɛ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ-DƖ yɩ á jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ te tɩn.
49004005	Dɩbam maama jɩgɩ Yuutu dɩdʋa mʋ, dɩ́ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o te tɩn dɩ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ. Dɩ́ na miisi na wʋnɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ.
49004006	Wɛ yɩ dɩdʋa mʋ, DƖ maa yɩ dɩbam maama Ko. Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam maama Yuutu, yɩ DƖ wʋ dɩbam maama tee nɩ, yɩ DƖ kwǝri DƖ wʋ dɩbam maama wʋnɩ.
49004007	Dɩbam dɩdʋa dɩdʋa joŋi pɛɛrɩ dwi tǝri tǝri mʋ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi na lagɩ sɩ o pa dɩbam te tɩn,
49004008	nɩ kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «O na diini wɛyuu tɩn, o kalɩ o dʋna bam o pɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o maŋɩ o pɛɛra yam o pa nɔɔna.»
49004009	Kʋ na pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ, o diini tɩn, kʋ kuri mʋ bɛɛ? Kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ o dɛ yigǝ o tu tɩga baŋa yɩ o tu o kwaarɩ ka kuri mʋ.
49004010	Wʋlʋ na tu tɩga baŋa kʋntʋ tɩn daa ta mʋ diini wɛyuu, o kɛ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩm maama yigǝ, sɩ o pa wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na wʋra tɩn taa jɩgɩ kuri.
49004011	Kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ pɛ o nɔɔna bam pɛɛra dwi tǝri tǝri, o pɛ ba badaara yɩ o tɩntʋŋna, badaara maa yɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ, badonnǝ maa tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, babam maa nii o nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ, yɩ badonnǝ brɩ o nɔɔna bam Wɛ cɩga kam.
49004012	Zezi Krisi nan pɛ pɛɛra yam kʋntʋ, sɩ o nɔɔna bam wanɩ ba na dam mʋ ba taa tʋŋɩ ba zǝni daanɩ, sɩ kʋ pa o kɔgɔ kʋm maama fɔgɩ kʋ kɩ daanɩ sɩ kʋ puli,
49004013	sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ maama laan ji woŋo dɩdʋa dɩ́ na lwarɩ Wɛ Bu wʋm yɩ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa laan wʋ́ tiini ya bɩ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na maŋɩ fasɩ te tɩn.
49004014	Kʋntʋ, dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa laan wʋ́ bɩ, ya daa bá ta ve yigǝ dɩ kwaga nɩ bu-balwa wʋbʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ daa bá joŋi nɔɔna zaasɩm mwalɩ mwalɩ nɩ viu na fuli wǝǝnu kʋ yagɩ yigǝ dɩ kwaga te tɩn. Dɩ́ daa bá sɛ sɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ nɔɔna balʋ na kɩ sɩsɩɩna ba ganɩ ba donnǝ sɩ ba tusi tɩn.
49004015	Dɩ́ nan wʋ́ ta brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ sono mʋ, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ bɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Yuutu tɩn.
49004016	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ o yɩra mʋ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ o yɩra yam je sɩm maama tʋŋɩ sɩ wǝli daanɩ. Sɩ nan yɩ tǝri tǝri mʋ, yɩ sɩ maama wǝli daanɩ sɩ tʋŋa. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, wʋlʋ maama na yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔnʋ tɩn na tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ Zezi na pɛ-o tɩn, kʋʋ́ pa o kɔgɔ kʋm maama bɩ yɩ kʋ puli dɩ sono.
49004017	Amʋ nan lagɩ a kaanɩ abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á daa yɩ taá tɔgɩ cwe sɩlʋ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn na tɔgɩ dɩ ba wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ tɩm tɩn.
49004018	Bantʋ wʋbʋŋa yɩ lim mʋ, yɩ ba ŋwɩa kam ba tɔgɩ Wɛ ŋwɩa na yɩ te tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ ba wʋ lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam ba wʋbʋŋa na tɩgɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49004019	Ba maa ba kwarɩ cavɩɩra, yɩ ba tiini ba kɩ lwarɩm dwi maama dɩ digiru wo-zɔɔna kǝnǝ yalʋ maama ba wʋbʋŋa na zʋa kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49004020	Abam na lwarɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ á taá kɩ kikiǝ yantʋ doŋ.
49004021	Abam nan na ni Zezi taanɩ dɩm, yɩ ba sɩɩnɩ ba brɩ abam o cɩga kam tɩn,
49004022	ba brɩ abam sɩ á yagɩ á ŋwɩ-doŋǝ kam mʋ dɩ ka na pɛ á yɩ te tɩn. Á ŋwɩ-doŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ lagɩ ka cɔgɩ abam, dɩ ka na ganɩ abam sɩ á fra taa zʋʋrɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
49004023	Á wʋbʋŋa maama nan maŋɩ sɩ ya lǝni ya ji wʋbʋŋ-dʋʋra mʋ,
49004024	sɩ á daarɩ á taá ŋwɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ DƖ na pɛ abam tɩn. Ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam kʋntʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ ŋwɩa mʋ, yɩ ka paɩ á tɔgɩ cɩga dɩ wʋ-poŋo cwǝŋǝ.
49004025	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ yagɩ vwan fɔm, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá tɛ cɩga dɩ́ brɩ daanɩ, dɩ́ maama na yɩ dwi dɩdwɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49004026	Abam wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ ban-zɔŋɔ dɩ o doŋ, o yɩ sɛ sɩ kʋ pa o kɩ wo-balɔrɔ, sɩ o daarɩ o lɩ-kʋ o wʋnɩ lɩla kʋ loori wɛ na wʋ́ zʋ tɩn.
49004027	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á pa sʋtaanɩ na laŋa dɩ wanɩ abam.
49004028	Wʋlʋ ya na ŋɔnɩ tɩn daa yɩ taa ŋɔna. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa o tɩtɩ mʋ dɩ cɩga, sɩ o daarɩ o wanɩ o zǝni balʋ yinigǝ na jɩgɩ-ba tɩn dɩ.
49004029	Á yɩ pa á ni-taanɩ taa jɩgɩ lwarɩm. Nan taá ŋɔɔnɩ-na taanɩ dɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa nɔɔna na dam Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ dɩ daarɩ dɩ zǝni-ba lanyɩranɩ nɩ ba na lagɩ zǝnǝ te tɩn.
49004030	Á yɩ pa Wɛ Joro kʋm wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ á na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋlʋ Wɛ na pɛ abam sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ á yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, sɩ DƖ sarɩya dɛ dɩm na yiǝ, sɩ DƖ laan ba DƖ vrɩ abam lwarɩm dwi maama wʋnɩ.
49004031	Yagɩ-na pu-sɩŋa dɩ ka-culi-daanɩ dɩ ban-zɔŋɔ, sɩ á daarɩ á yagɩ kantɔgɔ dɩ trʋ dɩ wʋ-lʋŋʋ dwi maama.
49004032	Taá nɩgɩ-na daanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá jɩgɩ da-ŋwaŋa. Taá yagɩ-na á ma cɛ daanɩ, nɩ Wɛ na yagɩ DƖ ma cɛ abam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ te tɩn.
49005001	Abam na yɩ Wɛ bu-sonnu tɩn, á taá kɩ nɩ Wɛ na kɩ te tɩn.
49005002	Taá soe-na daanɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na soe dɩbam te tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ sɛ sɩ o lǝni dɩbam yuu nɩ o tɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ. O ma ma o tɩtɩ o kɩ kaanɩm dɩlʋ na poli Wɛ wʋ yɩ dɩ lwǝm ywǝmmǝ dɩ DƖ tɩn.
49005003	Abam yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ. Kʋntʋ, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á pa wo-zɔɔna kikiǝ dɩ boorim dwi maama taa wʋ á wʋnɩ, naa á taá yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩna. Á brɩ á yɩ pa ba ni wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ taanɩ abam tɩtarɩ nɩ.
49005004	Kʋ na yɩ cɔgɩm-ŋwɛ dɩ bɩtar-jwǝǝru dɩ bɩtar-digiru dwi maama, tɩntʋ wʋ maŋɩ dɩ abam. Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le mʋ maŋa maama.
49005005	Nan taá ye-na nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na kɩ wo-zɔɔna naa boorim, naa wʋlʋ na yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm tɩn, kʋntʋ tu bá fɔgɩ o na kʋlʋkʋlʋ Zezi Krisi dɩ Baŋa-Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ. Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ wo-swǝn-nyɩm, kʋ brɩ nɩ o pa tɩntʋ mʋ zulǝ, yɩ o daarɩ Wɛ o yagɩ.
49005006	Nan yɩ pa-na nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ. Kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ lagɩ tɩ pa Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm sɩɩnɩ kʋ ba kʋ cɔgɩ balʋ na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn.
49005007	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ ja-na á tɩtɩ dɩ balʋ na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn.
49005008	Abam dɛɛn ya yǝri Wɛ, yɩ kʋ pa á wʋ lim wʋnɩ. Abam nan na tu á ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn, kʋ pɛ pooni laan wʋ á tee nɩ. Á taá ŋwɩ-na sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ balʋ na ve pooni wʋnɩ tɩn na ŋwɩ te tɩn.
49005009	Bɛŋwaanɩ kǝnǝ yalʋ maama na yɩ pooni nyɩm tɩn mʋ yɩ lanyɩranɩ, dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ cɩga tɩn.
49005010	Á nan kwaanɩ sɩ á lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na sui dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋbʋŋa tɩn.
49005011	Ja-na á tɩtɩ sɩ á yɩ tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na yɩ lim nyɩm tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á pa nɔɔna lwarɩ jaja nɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ ba lana.
49005012	Bɛŋwaanɩ, wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ na yǝni ba sǝgi ba kɩ tɩn tiini tɩ jɩgɩ cavɩɩra sɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ-tɩ.
49005013	Abam nan na pɛ Wɛ pooni dɩm brɩ woŋo maama kuri jaja, nɔɔna laan wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ balɔrɔ.
49005014	Bɛŋwaanɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama kuri na lwarɩ jaja tɩn laan wʋ pooni yigǝ nɩ mʋ. Kʋntʋ mʋ kʋ tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ na dɔ tɩn zaŋɩ wɛɛnɩ, sɩ n bi n yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, sɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwɩa kam pooni taa wʋ nmʋ tee nɩ.»
49005015	Á nan fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ á na tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ tɩn, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna, sɩ á yɩ taá yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ balʋ na wʋ lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn te.
49005016	Dɩbam na ŋwɩ maŋa kalʋ wʋnɩ zɩm tɩn jɩgɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ zanzan. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, Wɛ na pɛ abam pwǝlǝ sɩ á tʋŋɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kɩ-na-kʋ lanyɩranɩ.
49005017	Á yɩ taá tɔgɩ-na jwǝrim cwǝŋǝ, á nan kwaanɩ á lwarɩ kʋlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na lagɩ sɩ á taá kɩ tɩn.
49005018	Yɩ taá yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na nyɔ sana ba su ba bugi tɩn, sɩ kʋntʋ paɩ á ŋwɩa cɔgɩ mʋ. Á nan za pa-na Wɛ Joro kʋm su á bɩcara lanyɩranɩ.
49005019	Á taá leeni Wɛ lǝŋ-ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ tiǝ le dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam le sɩlʋ tɩn á brɩ daanɩ. Taá leeni-na zulǝ le sɩm kʋntʋ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi dɩ á wʋ maama,
49005020	sɩ á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le maŋa maama dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama DƖ na pɛ abam tɩn dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ.
49005021	Á taá sɛ daanɩ á na kwarɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49005022	Kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa sɛ ba banna, nɩ ba na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn.
49005023	Bɛŋwaanɩ kaanɩ barʋ mʋ yɩ o yuutu, nɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na yɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm Yuutu te tɩn. O kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ o yɩra mʋ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ vrɩ-ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
49005024	Kʋntʋ, kaana dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ ba banna mʋ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, nɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam na sɛ o ni te tɩn.
49005025	Kʋ daarɩ abam banna-ba, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá soe á kaana, nɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na soe o kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam yɩ o sɛ o tɩ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn.
49005026	O nan tɩgɩ sɩ o pa ba taa yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ. O ma kwɛ-ba dɩ o taanɩ dɩm sɩ ba ji lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na zarɩ woŋo dɩ na te tɩn.
49005027	O fɔgɩ o kwɛ-ba kʋntʋ, sɩ o laan pa o kɔgɔ kʋm wanɩ kʋ ba kʋ zɩgɩ o yigǝ nɩ dɩ paarɩ-zulǝ mʋ, sɩ kʋ taa jɩgɩ lam, yɩ digiru dɩ cɔgɩm tǝri kʋ tee nɩ dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ. Kʋntʋ tɩn, o nɔɔna bam wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo o yigǝ nɩ, yɩ tusim tǝrǝ.
49005028	Kʋntʋ, kan-banna maŋɩ sɩ ba taa soe ba kaana, nɩnɛɛnɩ ba na soe ba tɩtɩ yɩra yam te tɩn. Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na soe o kaanɩ tɩn soe o tɩtɩ mʋ.
49005029	Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na vaɩ o yɩra kwɛɛm. O nan nii o yɩra yam baŋa nɩ mʋ, yɩ o di wʋdiu o ma kɔnɩ-ya. Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi na nii dɩbam balʋ na yɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm baŋa nɩ te tɩn,
49005030	dɩ́ na nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
49005031	Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm nan tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nɔɔnʋ na di kaanɩ, o maŋɩ sɩ o pɔɔrɩ o tɩtɩ o ko dɩ o nu tee nɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o jǝni dɩ o kaanɩ wʋm, sɩ ba laan ji nɔɔnʋ dɩdʋa.»
49005032	Taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ yɩ ta-ŋʋm mʋ, yɩ dɩ kuri ya sǝgi. Amʋ nan kwe-dɩ a ma maŋɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm woŋo mʋ.
49005033	Kʋ nan yɩ cɩga mʋ dɩ abam dɩ, kan-barʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o taa soe o kaanɩ nɩ o na soe o tɩtɩ te tɩn. Kaanɩ maama dɩ maŋɩ sɩ o taa zuli o barʋ mʋ.
49006001	Biǝ-ba, abam na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá sɛ á tiinǝ ni, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
49006002	«Ta n zuli n ko dɩ n nu.» Wɛ niǝ yam maama wʋnɩ, mʋ dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ DƖ na goni ni DƖ wǝli da DƖ wɩ:
49006003	«Nmʋ na zuli n ko dɩ n nu, nń na ywǝǝni dɩ mʋmwɛ-dɛɛrɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.»
49006004	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ biǝ kwǝ tɩn, sɩ á yɩ taá tiini á fɩ-ba á paɩ ba bana zaŋɩ. Nan taá kɔnɩ á biǝ bam lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá kwe-ba nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cɩga kam na brɩ te tɩn.
49006005	Kʋ na yɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ á tɔgɩ á yum tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa. Taá kwarɩ-na-ba sɩ á tʋŋɩ dɩ yawala, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na wʋ́ tʋŋɩ á pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi te tɩn.
49006006	Kʋ nan daɩ ba na zɩgɩ ba nii abam maŋa kalʋ tɩn yɩranɩ mʋ á wʋ́ ta tʋŋɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba tee abam. Taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ á wʋ maama, sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ gambɛ mʋ te.
49006007	Taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ wʋpolo nɩnɛɛnɩ á tʋŋɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ mʋ te, sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ.
49006008	Bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ nɔɔnʋ maama wʋ́ na ŋwɩɩrʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tee nɩ dɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama o na kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ gambaa naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na te o tɩtɩ tɩn dɩ.
49006009	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ sɩm yum tiinǝ tɩn, á taá kɩ á gambɛ sɩm lanyɩranɩ dɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, sɩ á yɩ taá fugi-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ á maama jɩgɩ Yuutu dɩdʋa mʋ o na wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ, yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ te abam dɩ á gambɛ sɩm maama. Wʋntʋ nan tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ, o ba kuri nɔɔna daanɩ.
49006010	Amʋ na lagɩ a ta kʋlʋ a ma a kweeli tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, sɩ á joŋi o dam-fɔrɔ kʋm.
49006011	Kwaanɩ-na á joŋi Wɛ zǝnǝ yam maama nɩnɛɛnɩ jara zɩla te, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ sʋtaanɩ yɩ wanɩ abam dɩ dɩ sɩsɩɩna yam maama.
49006012	Jara yam kʋntʋ nan daɩ dɩbam dɩ nabiinǝ jara. Kʋ yɩ dɩdaanɩ ciciri sɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam wɛyuu tɩlampolo nɩ tɩn mʋ. Sɩntʋ mʋ yɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa dɩdɛɛra, yɩ sɩ jɩgɩ dam lʋgʋ kʋntʋ na yɩ lim tɩn baŋa nɩ.
49006013	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, joŋi-na Wɛ zǝnǝ yam maama á ma fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ á wanɩ á vɩn sʋtaanɩ sɩ á zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ maŋa kalʋ na cana tɩn wʋnɩ, sɩ á na wanɩ jara yam, sɩ á ta taá zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ á zɩga kam je nɩ.
49006014	Nan fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ dɩ baarɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, nɩ á na vɔgɩ á gwaarʋ dɩ kili te tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ cɩ abam dɩ wo-lwaanʋ, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na zʋ luguru gwaarʋ á ma kwǝli á nyɔɔna jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
49006015	Á nan maŋɩ sɩ á kwaanɩ á tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ na paɩ nɔɔna dɩ Wɛ fɔgɩ daanɩ tɩn, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na zʋ natra sɩ kʋ zǝni á vǝŋǝ jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
49006016	Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ maŋa maama, nɩnɛɛnɩ á na ze tɔn-tɩʋ kʋm ba na ma kɔŋɩ cɩna tɩn, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ wo-lwaanʋ tu sʋtaanɩ cɩ-dɛɛra yam ya na jɩgɩ minǝ tɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á pa ya maama dwe.
49006017	Ma-na Wɛ na vrɩ abam ŋwɩa te tɩn á ma cɩ á tɩtɩ, nɩ luguru yu-kwǝli mʋ á pugǝ á yuu nɩ jara wʋnɩ te. Á ma-na Wɛ taanɩ dɩm á ma wǝli á tɩtɩ, nɩ sʋ-zɔɔ te, Wɛ Joro kʋm na kɩ abam jɩŋa nɩ tɩn.
49006018	Á kɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama dɩ Wɛ-loro sɩ Wɛ zǝni abam. Á taá warɩ Wɛ maŋa maama nɩ DƖ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam dam te tɩn. Taá jɩgɩ-na á tɩtɩ, sɩ á vɔ á wʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá loori Wɛ DƖ nɔɔna bam maama ŋwaanɩ.
49006019	Taá loori-na Wɛ á pa amʋ dɩ, sɩ a na puri a ni sɩ a ta taanɩ, sɩ DƖ pa-nɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ a na wʋ́ ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn, sɩ a daarɩ a na baarɩ a brɩ nɔɔna DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, sɩ a pa ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi tɩn.
49006020	Kʋ yɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa brɩ nɔɔna. Ba nan kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ a na brɩ-ka tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Nan taá loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ zǝni-nɩ, sɩ a taa waɩ a tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ baarɩ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ sɩ a taa kɩ te tɩn.
49006021	Amʋ nan lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ amʋ labaarɩ dɩ a na wʋra a kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ a lagɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-sono Tisiki sɩ o ba abam te, sɩ o fɔgɩ o ta amʋ labaarɩ maama dɩ abam. Wʋntʋ tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ yawala mʋ.
49006022	Amʋ lagɩ sɩ o pa abam lwarɩ dɩbam labaarɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ.
49006023	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama yazurǝ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ da-sono dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa.
49006024	Wɛ wʋ́ pa balʋ maama na jɩgɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sono kʋlʋ na ba ti tɩn yu-yoŋo.
50001001	Amʋ Pooli mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ yɩ Timoti wʋ a tee nɩ. Dɩbam yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna mʋ. Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ maama na wʋ Filipi nɩ yɩ á tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ á ji Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn, dɩ á kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ bam dɩ ba zǝnzǝnnǝ bam dɩ.
50001002	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
50001003	Maŋa maama amʋ na guli abam gulǝ, a yǝni a kɩ a Tu Wɛ le mʋ abam ŋwaanɩ.
50001004	Maŋa maama a na loori Wɛ a pa abam maama, a jɩgɩ wʋpolo mʋ,
50001005	dɩ abam na tɔgɩ á wǝli-nɩ dɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩtʋŋa yam kʋ zɩgɩ pulim nɩ kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm tɩn.
50001006	Amʋ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, Wɛ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ DƖ puli tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yam kʋntʋ abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn, dɩntʋ daa ta wʋ́ pa ya vu ya guri dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
50001007	Amʋ tiini a soe abam dɩ a bɩcarɩ maama. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ amʋ taa jɩgɩ á wʋbʋŋa a wʋnɩ kʋntʋ doŋ. Bɛŋwaanɩ abam maama tɔgɩ á na yu-yoŋo kʋm nɩ amʋ dɩ na nɛ te tɩn, lele kʋntʋ ba na kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, dɩ maŋa kalʋ a ya na kaagɩ a beeri je maama a ŋɔɔnɩ cɩga a pa Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
50001008	Abam fra jɩgɩ amʋ, nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ na soe abam te tɩn mʋ. Wɛ tɩtɩ ye nɩ a na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
50001009	A na loori Wɛ a pa abam kʋlʋ ŋwaanɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ abam sono kʋm mʋ fɔgɩ kʋ puli zanzan, kʋ wǝli dɩ yǝno sɩ kʋ pa á taá waɩ á lwarɩ kʋlʋ maama na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
50001010	Kʋntʋ mʋ á wʋ́ wanɩ á kuri kʋlʋ na lamma tɩn á kɩ, sɩ Zezi Krisi dɛ dɩm na yiǝ, sɩ digiru yɩ taa wʋ á bɩcara nɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o na á wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
50001011	Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, á pa á kǝm maama taa tɔgɩ cɩga lanyɩranɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na zǝni abam te tɩn. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa Wɛ na zulǝ dɩ tiǝ.
50001012	A ko-biǝ-ba, a lagɩ sɩ á lwarɩ nɩ yaara yalʋ na yi amʋ tɩn nan pɛ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jagɩ ka yi yigǝ mʋ.
50001013	Kʋ na kɩ amʋ te tɩn pɛ pamaŋna balʋ na nii pɛ wʋm sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩn dɩ balʋ maama na wʋra tɩn lwarɩ nɩ, kʋ yɩ amʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ ba kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ.
50001014	Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, amʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn pɛ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam zanzan tiini ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm, kʋ pa ba jɩgɩ baarɩ zanzan ba maa brɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm yɩ ba ba kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ.
50001015	Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ sɩ nɔɔna badaara tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam dɩ wʋ-gʋʋ dɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ amʋ ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ daarɩ badaara nan tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ ba wʋbʋŋ-laarʋ mʋ.
50001016	Bantʋ tɔɔlɩ dɩ sono mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni sɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ cɩga a pa DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ja kuri.
50001017	Badonnǝ bam nan tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam sɩ kʋ pa ba tɩtɩ mʋ kamunni, sɩ ba ba jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo. Ba nan bʋŋɩ sɩ ba pa amʋ yaara yam mʋ tiini ya puli, a na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50001018	Kʋ nan ba cɔga. A ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ ba maama na jɩgɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ kam ba tɔɔlɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna te tɩn. Ba na tɔɔlɩ-ka dɩ wʋbʋŋ-laarʋ naa wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ dɩ, kʋ yɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam mʋ ba tɔɔla. Amʋ nan ta tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo,
50001019	bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ joŋi-nɩ DƖ yagɩ, abam na loori-DƖ á pa-nɩ yɩ Zezi Krisi Joro kʋm dɩ zǝni-nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50001020	Amʋ nan tiini a jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ a bá kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na wʋ́ pa a na a cavɩɩra tɩn. Kʋ na yɩ lele kʋntʋ dɩ maŋa maama, aá ta jɩgɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ a na ŋwɩ naa a na tɩga, sɩ Zezi Krisi na zulǝ a ŋwɩa kam maama wʋnɩ.
50001021	Kʋ na yɩ amʋ, a ŋwɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ. A nan na tɩgɩ dɩ, kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ kʋ pa-nɩ.
50001022	Amʋ nan ta na ŋwɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, a tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ wǝli nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ. Kʋntʋ tɩn, a yǝri a na wʋ́ twǝri kʋlʋ sɩ a daarɩ kʋlʋ.
50001023	Wǝǝnu tɩntʋ tɩle mʋ jɩgɩ-nɩ tɩ pa a yǝri a na wʋ́ lɩ kʋlʋ tɩn. Kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ fra kʋ pa-nɩ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ a yagɩ lʋgʋ baŋa, sɩ a daarɩ a vu Zezi Krisi te a taa wʋra. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ tiini kʋ taa lana.
50001024	Kʋ daarɩ, a ta na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, kʋʋ́ ta jɩgɩ zǝnǝ zanzan kʋ pa abam.
50001025	A ye nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, yɩ kʋ pɛ a lwarɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ a ta wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ. Amʋ wʋ́ ta wʋ abam maama tee nɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á fɔgɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo ka ŋwaanɩ.
50001026	Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ na joori a ba a wʋ abam tee nɩ, kʋʋ́ pa á tiini á taá zuli Zezi Krisi dɩ wʋpolo amʋ yagɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
50001027	Woŋo kʋlʋ yɩranɩ na jɩgɩ kuri tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ á pa á tɩtʋŋa maama taa tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na brɩ te tɩn. Kʋntʋ, amʋ na nɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a ba abam te, naa a na wʋ nɛ, a ta wʋ́ lwarɩ nɩ abam zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ, yɩ á wǝli daanɩ á kwaana á tʋŋa, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
50001028	Á yɩ sɛ sɩ á dʋna bam pa fʋʋnɩ zʋ abam dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ. Á na jɩgɩ baarɩ, kʋʋ́ brɩ nɩ bantʋ wʋ́ ba ba cɔgɩ yɩ abam na vrɩm. Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ wʋ́ pa kʋ kɩ kʋntʋ.
50001029	Wɛ na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ á sɛ Zezi Krisi dɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa yɩranɩ má, kʋ yɩ sɩ á kwǝri á na yaara dɩ mʋ o ŋwaanɩ.
50001030	Abam dɛɛn nɛ amʋ na yǝni a yaarɩ te a tʋŋɩ Wɛ ŋwaanɩ, yɩ á ta kwǝri á ni nɩ kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ zɩm maama. Abam dɩ laan nan wǝli dɩ amʋ á wʋ yantʋ yaara yam wʋnɩ mʋ.
50002001	Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ paɩ á jɩgɩ baarɩ. O sono kʋm maa paɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru. Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ wʋ abam wʋnɩ, nɩ kʋ na wʋ Zezi nɔɔna bam maama wʋnɩ te tɩn. Á maa jɩgɩ da-ŋwaŋa dɩ sono.
50002002	Kʋ na sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, a loori abam sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ mʋ daanɩ dɩ sono dɩdʋa, sɩ á daarɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni-dɩdʋa dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa. Abam na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa a taa tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
50002003	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á kɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ kamunni sɩ kʋ pa á tɩtɩ na zulǝ. Nan tu-na á tɩtɩ á pa daanɩ, sɩ á taá nii nɩ nɔɔnʋ maama dwe abam.
50002004	Nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o bʋŋɩ o na wʋ́ zǝni o doŋ te tɩn mʋ, kʋ daɩ sɩ o taa beeri o tɩtɩ zǝnǝ yɩranɩ.
50002005	Á wʋbʋŋa yam maŋɩ sɩ ya taa yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ Zezi Krisi wʋbʋŋa yam mʋ.
50002006	Wʋntʋ nan maŋɩ o jɩgɩ Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ. O dɩdaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ, yɩ o wʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋntʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ o na maŋɩ sɩ o ja-kʋ kǝŋkǝŋ sɩ o dɩ Wɛ taa maɩ daanɩ tɩn.
50002007	O nan tiŋi wǝǝnu tɩntʋ maama daa nɩ mʋ, yɩ o daarɩ o ba o ji nabiinu. O yɩ tɩntʋŋnʋ.
50002008	O na tu o ŋwɩ dɩ nabiinǝ kʋntʋ tɩn, o dɛɛn tu o tɩtɩ yɩ o sɛ Wɛ ni o ba o tɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ tʋʋnɩ dɩ tʋʋnɩ, kʋ yɩ ba pag-o tʋʋn-dagara baŋa nɩ mʋ ba gʋ.
50002009	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ laan pɛ Zezi yuu tiini kʋ zaŋɩ wɛɛnɩ dɩ zulǝ, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa-o yɩrɩ dɩlʋ na dwe yɩra maama tɩn.
50002010	Mʋ kʋ kuri maŋa wʋ́ ba, yɩ balʋ maama na wʋ wɛyuu nɩ naa tɩga baŋa nɩ naa tɩga kuri nɩ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba kuni doonǝ ba zuli Zezi o yɩrɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
50002011	Ba maama wʋ́ ta dɩ ba niǝ jaja nɩ, Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ ba Yuutu. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa o Ko Wɛ na zulǝ lanyɩranɩ.
50002012	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, a cilon-sonnu-ba, abam dɛɛn na maŋɩ á sɛ amʋ zaasɩm dɩm maŋa kalʋ amʋ ya na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, á nan ta maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ á dwǝni lele kʋntʋ a daa na tǝri abam tee nɩ dɩ tɩn. Taá kwarɩ-na Wɛ lanyɩranɩ dɩ ya-sɩʋ, sɩ á kwaanɩ á tʋŋɩ á pa vrɩm dɩlʋ á na nɛ tɩn ja kuri.
50002013	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mʋ yǝni DƖ tʋŋɩ abam bɩcara nɩ, DƖ pa á beeri kǝnǝ yalʋ na wʋ́ poli DƖ wʋ, yɩ DƖ pa á wanɩ-ya á kɩ.
50002014	Woŋo kʋlʋ maama á na lagɩ á kɩ tɩn, sɩ á yɩ taá pʋʋna naa á magɩ kantɔgɔ kʋ baŋa nɩ.
50002015	Kʋntʋ mʋ á wʋ́ ta jɩgɩ cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ, yɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo. Á wʋ́ ta yɩ Wɛ biǝ balʋ na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ, yɩ á zʋʋrɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ wʋbʋŋa na ba tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ. Á wʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ pooni á pa lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna nɩ calɩcwɩ te,
50002016	dɩ á na ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩlʋ na paɩ ŋwɩa á brɩ nɔɔna tɩn. Á na kɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, kʋʋ́ brɩ nɩ a na cɛ a tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam abam ŋwaanɩ te tɩn wʋ jigi kafɛ, yɩ aá ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ abam dɛ dɩm Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
50002017	Abam na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa á sɛ Zezi tɩn nyɩ dɩ á kwe woŋo mʋ á ma kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ kʋ poli DƖ wʋ. Amʋ na maŋɩ a lagɩ a ga a ŋwɩa mʋ dɩ, aá sɛ sɩ ka wǝli abam kaanɩm dɩm nɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Dɩ kʋ dɩ, aá ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo, yɩ abam dɩ wʋ́ wǝli dɩ amʋ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
50002018	Kʋntʋ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ abam dɩ ta jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ, sɩ amʋ dɩ wǝli dɩ abam a kɩ wʋpolo.
50002019	Dɩbam Yuutu Zezi na sɛ, amʋ bʋŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋɩ Timoti sɩ o ba abam te lele. Kʋntʋ, o na joori o ba amʋ te, oó pa-nɩ abam labaarɩ sɩ a daa yɩ ta jɩgɩ liǝ.
50002020	Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa tǝri amʋ tee nɩ, o na jɩgɩ a wʋbʋŋa yam doŋ, sɩ o sɩɩnɩ o taa ye abam zǝnǝ ni nɩ, kʋ na daɩ Timoti yɩranɩ.
50002021	Balʋ maama na daarɩ tɩn beeri ba tɩtɩ wǝǝnu yɩranɩ mʋ, yɩ ba yigǝ tǝrǝ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi nyɩm tɩn.
50002022	Kʋ nan na yɩ Timoti, abam maŋɩ á ye o wʋ na tɔgɩ cɩga te tɩn. O dɛɛn tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ o tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, nɩnɛɛnɩ bu na tɔgɩ dɩ o ko o tʋŋɩ te tɩn.
50002023	Kʋntʋ mʋ a bʋŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋ-o abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ a na wʋ́ lwarɩ ba na wʋ́ di a taanɩ dɩm te tɩn.
50002024	Amʋ nan jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɩ baá pʋrɩ-nɩ ba yagɩ lele, yɩ a laan ba abam te.
50002025	Amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Epafroditi sɩ o joori o ba abam te. O tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa, yɩ dɩ́ kwǝri dɩ́ na cam ya baŋa nɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ abam tɩntʋŋnʋ wʋlʋ á na lɩ sɩ o ja zǝnǝ o ba o pa-nɩ a yaara yam wʋnɩ tɩn.
50002026	Abam fra maa jɩg-o yɩ o lagɩ sɩ o daa na abam. O wʋ ya cɔgɩ dɩ á na ni nɩ o ya ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ tɩn.
50002027	Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ o ya ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ, yɩ o ga fɩɩn sɩ o tɩ. Wɛ nan duri o ŋwaŋa. Kʋ nan daɩ wʋntʋ yɩranɩ ŋwaŋa mʋ DƖ duri. Wɛ duri amʋ dɩ ŋwaŋa, dɩ DƖ na pɛ o wǝri yɩ a wʋ daa wʋ cɔgɩ zanzan tɩn.
50002028	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tiini a kwaanɩ a lagɩ sɩ o yi abam te lɩla, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ á na wʋ́ joori á na-o tɩn, sɩ amʋ dɩ liǝ yam laan ti.
50002029	O na tuǝ, sɩ á jeer-o lanyɩranɩ dɩ wʋpolo zanzan, o na yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá zuli nɔɔna balʋ na nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ wʋntʋ te tɩn.
50002030	Bɛŋwaanɩ o ya gɛ fɩɩn mʋ sɩ o tɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ. O dɛɛn lagɩ o ga o ŋwɩa dɩ o na lǝni abam yuu nɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o wǝli-nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
50003001	A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ sɩ a ta a wǝli da tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn. A na maŋɩ a pʋpʋnɩ kʋlʋ a ma brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ ba camma sɩ a ta joori a brɩ-kʋ abam, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ cɩ abam wo-lwaanʋ wʋnɩ.
50003002	Fɔgɩ-na á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tiinǝ balʋ na kwaanɩ sɩ ba taa goni nɔɔna yɩra ba yagɩ tɩn. Bantʋ nyɩ dɩ kakuri mʋ.
50003003	Dɩbam nan mʋ yɩ balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna cɩga cɩga, yɩ kʋ daɩ nɩ dɩ́ na goni dɩ́ bǝkǝri tɩn ŋwaanɩ, nɩ bantʋ na brɩ te tɩn. Dɩbam maɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm dam mʋ dɩ́ zuli Wɛ, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ Zezi Krisi na kɩ kʋlʋ o pa dɩbam tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ bá tɩɩgɩ cullu tɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ nɔɔna yɩra gonim mʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa Wɛ tɩn.
50003004	Lʋgʋ baŋa cullu tɩm ya na jɩgɩ kuri, amʋ tɩtɩ ya wʋ́ wanɩ a tɩɩgɩ-tɩ. Nɔɔnʋ nan na bʋŋɩ nɩ o jɩgɩ bʋra sɩ o tɩɩgɩ lʋgʋ baŋa cullu tɩm, amʋ ya jɩgɩ bʋra a dwe.
50003005	Amʋ dɛɛn na yi da nana tɩn, mʋ ba goni-nɩ nɩ dɩbam Zwifǝ cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn. A yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tu mʋ, yɩ a nuŋi Bɛnzamɛn dwi dɩm wʋnɩ. Amʋ sɩɩnɩ a yɩ Zwifu mʋ. Zwifǝ bam mʋ lʋgɩ-nɩ. Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɔgɩm, amʋ dɛɛn wʋ Farizɩan tiinǝ kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ mʋ.
50003006	Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam laŋa nɩ, amʋ dɛɛn kwaanɩ a tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ a na bɛɛsɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna bam te tɩn. Kʋ nan daa na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm sɛɛm, a dɛɛn sɛ-tɩ dɩ cɩga yɩ tusim tǝrǝ.
50003007	A dɛɛn paɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama jɩgɩ kuri mʋ tɩ pa-nɩ. A laan nan bʋŋɩ a lwarɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ kafɛ mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, dɩ a na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50003008	Kʋ sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga, woŋo kʋlʋ maama a na jɩgɩ tɩn, a nii-kʋ nɩ kʋ yɩ kafɛ mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, a laan na lwarɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ a Yuutu tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ tiini kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa-nɩ kʋ dwe woŋo maama. Wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a kwe woŋo maama a yagɩ daa nɩ. A nii tɩ maama nɩ weeru mʋ a yigǝ nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a sɛ Zezi Krisi sɩ a taa tɔg-o dɩ a wʋ maama, sɩ kʋ pa a taa yɩ o nɔɔnʋ.
50003009	Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ wʋ́ na cɩga Wɛ tee nɩ a na kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ daa daɩ a tɩtɩ tɩtʋŋa dɩ a na tɔgɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ nan yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ paɩ a jɩgɩ cɩga dɩ a na kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50003010	Woŋo kʋlʋ amʋ na tiini a lagɩ tɩn yɩ sɩ a lwarɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ, sɩ a kwǝri a lwarɩ dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ Wɛ na mɛ DƖ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ a daarɩ a tɔgɩ a na o yaara yam doŋ, sɩ a taa nyɩ dɩd-o o na sɛ o tɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
50003011	Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ dɩ jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ Wɛ wʋ́ pa a bi a yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
50003012	Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a maŋɩ a yi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ a na lagɩ sɩ a yi tɩn. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ a bɩcarɩ fɔgɩ dɩ kwɛ fasɩ yɩ lwarɩm daa tǝrǝ. Amʋ nan kwaanɩ a jaŋɩ mʋ a ve yigǝ, sɩ a laan wanɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ Zezi Krisi tee nɩ. Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ o joŋi-nɩ sɩ a taa yɩ o nɔɔnʋ.
50003013	A ko-biǝ-ba, a ba bʋŋɩ nɩ a maŋɩ a yi sɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm. A nan na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, a yǝni a lɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na maŋɩ tɩ kɛ tɩn mʋ a wʋbʋŋa nɩ, yɩ a daarɩ a kwaanɩ sɩ a vu a yi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ a yigǝ nɩ tɩn.
50003014	Kʋntʋ, amʋ kwaana sɩ a yɔɔrɩ a duri a vu a yi kweelim je mʋ, sɩ a joŋi pɛɛrɩ dɩm Wɛ tee nɩ. Pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ Wɛ na bǝŋi-nɩ sɩ a ba a joŋi DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
50003015	Kʋ na yɩ dɩbam balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩbam maama sɛ nɩ amʋ na tagɩ te tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ. Abam badaara wʋbʋŋa nan na daɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, Wɛ wʋ́ pa á lwarɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
50003016	Dɩ kʋ dɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yɔɔrɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ ka yɩ cɩga tɩn mʋ.
50003017	A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá lwǝni amʋ na kɩ te tɩn mʋ, sɩ á fɔgɩ á nii balʋ na tɔgɩ cwǝ-laa nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ na brɩ abam sɩ á taá tɔgɩ te tɩn.
50003018	A lagɩ sɩ a joori a brɩ abam wǝǝnu tɩlʋ a na maŋɩ a ta dɩ abam kuni zanzan tɩn mʋ. Kʋ maa paɩ a yi-na nuŋǝ dɩ liǝ yalʋ a na jɩgɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋ yɩ nɩ nɔɔna zanzan mʋ wʋ abam wʋnɩ ba tɩtʋŋa na brɩ nɩ ba culi Zezi Krisi tʋʋn-dagara kam mʋ.
50003019	Ba yǝni ba lagɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ fra na jɩgɩ-ba tɩn mʋ kʋ dwe Wɛ. Ba maa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ ba cavɩɩra tɩn, yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ wʋbʋŋa jɩgɩ-ba. Ba kweelim je nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ba mʋ.
50003020	Kʋ nan na yɩ dɩbam, dɩ́ kugu je wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ mʋ. Dɩbam cǝgi dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi sɩ o nuŋi dáanɩ mʋ o ba. Wʋntʋ mʋ vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
50003021	O na tuǝ, o laan wʋ́ pa dɩbam lʋgʋ baŋa yɩra yalʋ na bwǝmmǝ tɩn lǝni ya taa nyɩ dɩ o tɩtɩ yɩra yam te. Yantʋ yɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nyɩm mʋ, yɩ ya jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ. Oó ma o dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ na paɩ o waɩ woŋo maama tɩn o ma kɩ kʋntʋ.
50004001	A ko-biǝ-ba, a soe abam lanyɩranɩ yɩ á fra jɩgɩ-nɩ. Abam paɩ a jɩgɩ wʋpolo, yɩ á ta wʋ́ pa a yuu zǝŋi Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. A cilon-sonnu-ba, kwaanɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ́ Yuutu tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ.
50004002	A nan loori Evodi dɩ Sintisi lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-dɩdwɩ á na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50004003	A loori nmʋ dɩ, wʋlʋ na yɩ a doŋ tɩntʋŋnʋ cɩga cɩga tɩn, sɩ n zǝni kaana bantʋ sɩ ba taa sɛ daanɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba dɛɛn tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ yɩ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, dɩ Klɩman dɩ balʋ maama na tɔgɩ dɩ amʋ ba tʋŋɩ tɩn. Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ pʋpʋnɩ bantʋ yɩra DƖ ŋwɩa tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ.
50004004	Taá kɩ-na wʋpolo maŋa maama á na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ. A ta lagɩ a joori a ta nɩ, á taá kɩ wʋpolo.
50004005	Pa-na nɔɔna maama lwarɩ á lanyɩranɩ wʋm ni nɩ, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm maa bɩɩnɩ lele.
50004006	Yɩ zaŋɩ-na á taá liǝ dɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Woŋo maama wʋnɩ sɩ á taá warɩ Wɛ, á brɩ-DƖ kʋlʋ á na lagɩ tɩn sɩ DƖ zǝni abam, sɩ á kwǝri á taá kɩ DƖ le maŋa maama.
50004007	Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ pa á bɩcara taa zurǝ, sɩ kʋ dwǝni nabiinǝ na wʋ́ wanɩ kʋlʋ ba lwarɩ tɩn. Kʋ maa pa kʋlʋkʋlʋ bá wanɩ kʋ cɔgɩ á bɩcara dɩ á wʋbʋŋa maama, abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
50004008	A ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ a na lagɩ a ma a guri tɩn, á taá jɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lana yɩ tɩ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ tɩn wʋbʋŋa: kʋ na yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama na yɩ cɩga tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ zulǝ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ tusim tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na poli nɔɔna wʋrʋ tɩn, naa woŋo kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ tiǝ nɔɔna tee nɩ tɩn, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ wʋbʋŋa.
50004009	Á taá kɩ-na wǝǝnu tɩlʋ amʋ na brɩ abam yɩ á sɛ-tɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á na ni kʋlʋ a na taga, yɩ á na kʋlʋ a na kɩ tɩn. Á na sɩɩnɩ á kɩ kʋntʋ, Wʋ-zuru Tu Baŋa-Wɛ wʋ́ ta wʋ á tee nɩ.
50004010	A na ŋwɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, amʋ tiini a jɩgɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ daanɩ zanzan yɩ abam daa wʋ guli a gulǝ sɩ á wǝli-nɩ, yɩ lele kʋntʋ á laan zǝni-nɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ abam ba jɩgɩ a wʋbʋŋa mʋ ya, kʋ yɩ á wʋ nɛ cwǝŋǝ mʋ sɩ á wǝli-nɩ.
50004011	A na tagɩ kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ a na gɛ woŋo tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Woŋo maama wʋnɩ, amʋ mɩ sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ tɩn.
50004012	Yinigǝ na jɩgɩ-nɩ, amʋ ye a na wʋ́ ja a tɩtɩ te. A jɩjɩgɩrʋ nan na daga dɩ, a ta ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te. Woŋo maama wʋnɩ, amʋ ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo. A na jɩgɩ a di a wʋbʋŋa naa kana na jɩgɩ-nɩ, a jɩjɩgɩrʋ na daga naa tɩ na muri, amʋ ta ye a na wʋ́ kɩ te sɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
50004013	Amʋ waɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama a kɩa, Zezi Krisi na pa-nɩ dam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
50004014	Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, á kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á na zǝni-nɩ a yaara yam wʋnɩ tɩn.
50004015	Abam Filipi tiinǝ tɩtɩ dɩ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, maŋa kalʋ a na puli a wʋra a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam a brɩ abam yɩ a laan nuŋi Masɩdʋanɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ abam yɩranɩ mʋ wǝli-nɩ. Zezi kɔgɔ kʋdoŋ daa tǝrǝ kʋ dɩ na pɛ amʋ woŋo, kʋ na daɩ abam yɩranɩ.
50004016	A dɛɛn na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ tɩn, abam tʋŋɩ a na lagɩ zǝnǝ yalʋ tɩn á pa-nɩ, yɩ kʋ daɩ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ.
50004017	Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ amʋ lagɩ sɩ a taa joŋi abam pɛɛra yam má mʋ, kʋ yɩ nyɔɔrɩ dɩlʋ abam na wʋ́ na Wɛ tee nɩ ya ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ a jɩgɩ wʋpolo.
50004018	Amʋ joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ maama abam na pɛ amʋ tɩn kʋ ja gaalɩ. A joŋi pɛɛra yalʋ á na kɩ Epafroditi jɩŋa nɩ sɩ o ja ba o pa-nɩ tɩn, yɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ daa wʋ muri-nɩ. Abam pɛɛra yam nyɩ dɩ woŋo kʋlʋ á na mɛ á kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ kʋ lwǝm ywǝmmǝ tɩn mʋ. Wɛ nan joŋi á kaanɩm dɩm dɩ wʋpolo.
50004019	Amʋ Tu Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam kʋlʋ maama á na gɛ tɩn Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, DƖ na jɩgɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ na tiini tɩ dagɩ yɩ tɩ jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ tɩn.
50004020	Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Ko tɩn maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ mʋ maŋa maama. Amina.
50004021	Jɔɔnɩ-na Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn maama á pa-nɩ. Dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
50004022	Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama jɔɔnɩ abam, kʋ na fɔgɩ kʋ dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Rom Pa-farʋ wʋm sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn.
50004023	Dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
51001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ Wɛ na kuri dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti tɔgɩ o wǝli-nɩ.
51001002	Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna yɩ á zʋʋrɩ Kolɔsɩ nɩ tɩn. Abam mʋ yɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn. Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
51001003	Maŋa maama dɩbam na yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ dɩ́ pa abam, dɩ́ taá kɩ DƖ le mʋ abam ŋwaanɩ. Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi Ko.
51001004	Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam ni abam na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi yɩ á kwǝri á soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama te tɩn.
51001005	Bɛŋwaanɩ, abam na dɛ yigǝ á ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn mʋ pɛ á jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ á wʋ́ na wǝǝnu tɩlʋ Wɛ na tiŋi DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kalʋ na sɩɩnɩ ka yɩ cɩga tɩn.
51001006	DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ laan jagɩ ka yi lʋgʋ baŋa je maama yɩ ka kwɛ nɔɔna lanyɩranɩ, nɩ ka na jagɩ ka yi abam te yɩ ka kwɛ abam te tɩn. Kʋ zɩgɩ maŋa kalʋ á na puli á ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam yɩ á lwarɩ Wɛ zaanɩ dɩm na sɩɩnɩ dɩ yɩ cɩga te tɩn.
51001007	Kʋ yɩ Epafrasɩ dɛɛn mʋ brɩ abam Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam ko-bu-sono, yɩ o tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ dɩ o wʋ maama o pa Zezi Krisi abam ŋwaanɩ.
51001008	Wʋntʋ ta mʋ tagɩ o brɩ dɩbam Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam jɩgɩ da-sono te tɩn.
51001009	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ warɩ Wɛ maŋa maama dɩ́ pa abam, kʋ na puli maŋa kam dɩ́ na ni á woŋo kʋntʋ tɩn. Dɩ́ loori-DƖ sɩ DƖ pa á taá ye DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, sɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa á na swan dɩ yǝno maama nɩ DƖ Joro kʋm na paɩ te tɩn.
51001010	Kʋntʋ, abam laan wʋ́ wanɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na lagɩ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa o wʋ poli á tɩtʋŋa maama ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ loori Wɛ sɩ DƖ wǝli abam sɩ á taá kɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi tǝri tǝri lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á fɔgɩ á lwarɩ Wɛ á wǝli da.
51001011	Dɩ́ nan ta loori Wɛ, sɩ DƖ ma DƖ dam-fɔrɔ kʋlʋ na dwe maama tɩn DƖ wǝli abam sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, sɩ á kwǝri á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ á taá kwaanɩ á ve yigǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
51001012	Á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le dɩ wʋpolo, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ pɛ abam cwǝŋǝ, sɩ á tɔgɩ á na wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ DƖ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn jǝgǝ kalʋ na yɩ pooni tɩn wʋnɩ.
51001013	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ mʋ lɩ dɩbam lim wʋnɩ, sɩ wo-lwaanʋ daa yɩ taa waɩ dɩbam. DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ zʋ DƖ tɩtɩ Bu-sono kʋm paarɩ dɩm wʋ.
51001014	Kʋ nan yɩ DƖ Bu Zezi mʋ kwe o ŋwɩa o ma ŋwɩ dɩ́ lwarɩm jɩnɩ, o pa Wɛ yagɩ-dɩ DƖ ma cɛ dɩbam.
51001015	Zezi yɩ Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na ba naɩ tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ mʋ. O yɩ Wɛ Bu-dʋa mʋ. Wʋntʋ maŋɩ o wʋra mʋ kʋ loori wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn.
51001016	Wɛ dɛ wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ wǝǝnu maama, wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na wʋ wɛyuu nɩ dɩ tɩga baŋa nɩ tɩn, tɩlʋ nɔɔna na naɩ dɩ tɩlʋ ba na warɩ ba naɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ malɛsɩ dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam yɩ tɩ di paarɩ nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn. Wɛ dɛ Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ tɩ maama, sɩ kʋ pa o na zulǝ tɩ baŋa nɩ.
51001017	Zezi maŋɩ o wʋra mʋ pulim nɩ yɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ daa ta tǝrǝ. Kʋ yɩ wʋntʋ mʋ paɩ woŋo maama zɩgɩ kʋ jǝgǝ nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
51001018	Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ o nɔɔna bam yuutu, yɩ ba kɔgɔ kʋm nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam. Wʋm mʋ puli o kɔgɔ kʋm kuri. Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ dɛ yigǝ o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ. Kʋ ma pa o yɩ yigǝ tu woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
51001019	Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ lagɩ sɩ DƖ Bu Zezi taa nyɩ dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ fasɩ.
51001020	Wɛ lɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ, sɩ DƖ da DƖ Bu wʋm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa wǝǝnu maama joori tɩ fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ DƖ. DƖ Bu Zezi na tɩgɩ tʋʋn-dagara kam baŋa nɩ yɩ o jana nuŋi tɩn mʋ pɛ wǝǝnu maama joori tɩ fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ Wɛ, kʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wǝǝnu dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama.
51001021	Kʋ nan na yɩ abam, abam dɛɛn baŋwɛ dɩ Wɛ, á yɩ Wɛ dʋna mʋ. Abam wʋbʋŋa dɩ á tɩtʋŋa maama dɛɛn lagɩ wo-lwaanʋ yɩranɩ mʋ sɩ á taá kɩa.
51001022	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, Wɛ laan pɛ á fɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ DƖ, DƖ Bu wʋm na jigi nabiinu yɩ o daarɩ o tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ á wanɩ á ba á zɩgɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ, sɩ á taá yɩ nɔn-ŋʋna balʋ na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ tɩn.
51001023	Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa, sɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ. Á wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa lǝni dɩ tɩɩna yalʋ á na jɩgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kwǝrǝ kalʋ abam na maŋɩ á ni yɩ ba tɔɔlɩ-ka ba brɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɔɔna maama tɩn. Amʋ Pooli nan yɩ Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ.
51001024	Amʋ jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na yaarɩ te abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋ na cɛ a yɩra nɩ te tɩn, kʋ nyɩ nɩ Zezi Krisi na yaarɩ te tɩn mʋ. A yaarɩ yaara yalʋ na daarɩ sɩ dɩ́ yaarɩ Zezi tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ, sɩ kʋ zǝni o nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm na nyɩ dɩ o yɩra yam tɩn lanyɩranɩ.
51001025	Wɛ tʋŋɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tʋŋa a pa-ba mʋ. Tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sɩ a kwaanɩ a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam maama a brɩ abam.
51001026	Kʋ na zɩgɩ pulim nɩ tɩn, Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ dɛɛn sǝgi mʋ nabiinǝ tee nɩ, yɩ Wɛ laan pa balʋ na yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn ba ba lwarɩ-ka.
51001027	Kʋ yɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa mʋ lagɩ sɩ DƖ pa ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam kʋntʋ. DƖ lagɩ sɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dwi maama tiinǝ mʋ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam na tiini ka jɩgɩ lam dɩ zulǝ te tɩn. Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɛɛn na sǝgi yɩ ka laan ba ka lwarɩ jaja tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ Zezi Krisi wʋ abam bɩcara nɩ, yɩ kʋ pa á jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ á wʋ́ na paarɩ-zulǝ Wɛ tee nɩ.
51001028	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩbam yǝni dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝrǝ mʋ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna maama, yɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ-ba dɩ swan yalʋ Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ pa ba maama laan wanɩ ba ba ba zɩgɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, nɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩga dɩ Zezi Krisi tɔgɩm dɩm tɩn.
51001029	Kʋntʋ mʋ amʋ nan tiini a kwaanɩ a tʋŋa. Kʋ nan yɩ Zezi dam-fɔrɔ kʋm o na pɛ-nɩ tɩn mʋ paɩ a jɩgɩ dam a ma a tʋŋɩ kʋntʋ.
51002001	Amʋ lagɩ sɩ abam lwarɩ a na tiini a tʋŋɩ te abam ŋwaanɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Lawodise nɩ, dɩ nɔɔna zanzan balʋ yi ta na wʋ nɛ amʋ tɩn dɩ ŋwaanɩ.
51002002	Amʋ tiini a kwaanɩ kʋntʋ, sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama wanɩ ba taa jɩgɩ baarɩ mʋ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa ŋwɩ daanɩ dɩ sono. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa ba zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ ba na tiini ba lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kam te tɩn, sɩ ba lwarɩ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi tɩn, yɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ.
51002003	Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna lwarɩ swan dɩ yǝno kʋlʋ maama na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm, tɩ na jɩgɩ kuri zanzan yɩ tɩ sǝgi tɩn.
51002004	A nan tagɩ kʋntʋ a brɩ abam, sɩ á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam, dɩ o na maŋɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ swan taanɩ te maama dɩ.
51002005	Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ na tǝri abam tee nɩ tɩn dɩ, a wʋbʋŋa maama wʋra dɩ abam. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ pɛ-nɩ wʋpolo dɩ a na lwarɩ nɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ yɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, á na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
51002006	Abam nan na sɛ sɩ Zezi Krisi taa yɩ abam Yuutu tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋwɩ dɩd-o mʋ.
51002007	Nan fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ nɩ tiu bʋnnʋ na zʋ tɩga te tɩn, sɩ á daarɩ á kwaanɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o nɩ ba na maŋɩ ba zaasɩ abam te tɩn, sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le zanzan maŋa maama.
51002008	Á nan cʋ á tɩtɩ, sɩ á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ o swan yalʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn. Yantʋ yɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa yalʋ na tɔgɩ ba nabaara mɩʋ tɩn mʋ. Ya yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm mʋ, sɩ ya daɩ Krisi nyɩm.
51002009	Bɛŋwaanɩ, Baŋa-Wɛ na yɩ tɩte maama tɩn, Zezi Krisi dɩ yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ fasɩ.
51002010	Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn, á maŋɩ á na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩm maama á joŋi o tee nɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ te woŋo kʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn.
51002011	Abam na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, o lɩ á wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ tɩm maama mʋ, sɩ tɩ daa yɩ taa jɩgɩ dam á baŋa nɩ. O na fɔgɩ o kwɛ abam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ ba na goni bǝkǝri te tɩn mʋ. Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ nabiinǝ na goni te tɩn, kʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
51002012	Bɛŋwaanɩ, ba na miisi abam na wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba ya kɩ abam dɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ Zezi Krisi na tɩgɩ yɩ ba kɩ-o te tɩn mʋ. Kʋ kwǝri kʋ brɩ nɩ á joori á bi á na Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam, bɛŋwaanɩ á jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ na mɛ DƖ dam dɩm DƖ bi Zezi DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn.
51002013	Abam dɛɛn ya ba jɩgɩ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ á na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Abam dɛɛn ya tɔgɩ á daɩ Wɛ nɔɔna á na daɩ Zwifǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ laan nan pɛ á na DƖ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam á na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ nan yagɩ dɩbam lwarɩm maama DƖ ma cɛ dɩbam.
51002014	Ba na pagɩ Zezi Krisi tʋʋn-dagara baŋa nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ ba pagɩ cullu tɔnɔ kʋlʋ na brɩ nɩ dɩbam kɩ dɩ́ cɔgɩ tɩn mʋ. Wɛ brɩ nɩ tɔnɔ kʋm kʋntʋ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri, yɩ dɩbam lwarɩm dɩm maama ti.
51002015	Zezi mʋ wanɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nabiinǝ baŋa nɩ tɩn, yɩ o cɔgɩ tɩ maama dam. O tʋʋnɩ dagara kam baŋa nɩ mʋ Wɛ mɛ DƖ brɩ nɔɔna jaja nɩ o jɩgɩ dam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama baŋa nɩ, nɩ nɔɔnʋ na wanɩ o dʋna yɩ o ja-ba o vɔ te tɩn.
51002016	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, abam yɩ sɛ sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ pa abam culu dɩ á na di kʋlʋ naa á na nyɔ kʋlʋ tɩn. Á yɩ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ lɩ da yalʋ sɩ ya taa yɩ candiǝ da naa can-dʋŋa dɛ naa siun dɛ ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
51002017	Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ daa ba jɩgɩ kuri. Tɩ dɛɛn yɩ luluŋu mʋ, sɩ tɩ brɩ cɩga kalʋ na lagɩ ka ba tɩn. Cɩga kam kʋntʋ nan mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi.
51002018	Á yɩ sɛ á pa nɔɔna balʋ na yaarɩ ba tɩtɩ yɩ ba zuli malɛsɩ dɩ vwan tu-n-tɩtɩ tɩn ganɩ abam. Ba yǝni ba tɛ ba wɩ, Wɛ mʋ brɩ-ba kʋntʋ woŋo, yɩ ba wʋbʋŋa nan daɩ Wɛ nyɩm. Kʋ yɩ ba zǝŋi-n-tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋ-kamunǝ mʋ ba jɩga, kʋ nan yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
51002019	Bantʋ nan daa ba ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Yuutu, yɩ dɩ́ ŋwɩ dɩd-o nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩra na toŋi dɩ o yuu te tɩn. Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ wǝli daanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋa, nɩ nɔɔnʋ yɩra na jɩgɩ pɔɔrɩm dwi tǝri tǝri yɩ ya tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩdʋa te tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ zǝni dɩbam yɩ dɩ́ ve yigǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn.
51002020	Abam na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɔgɩ dɩd-o á tɩ mʋ te. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wʋbʋŋ-yɔɔrʋ tɩm daa ba jɩgɩ dam abam baŋa nɩ. Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á nan ta kɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ á yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nyɩm mʋ te?
51002021	Bɛɛ mʋ yɩ á sɛ cullu tɩlʋ na brɩ nɩ yɩ kwe kʋntʋ naa yɩ ta n di kʋntʋ naa yɩ dwe kʋntʋ tɩn?
51002022	Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ nan wʋra wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ́ ba tɩ cɔgɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ. Cullu tɩlʋ ba na brɩ abam kʋntʋ doŋ tɩn yɩ nabiinǝ wʋbʋŋa mʋ. Tɩ wʋ nuŋi Wɛ te.
51002023	Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ nyɩ nɩ swan mʋ ba na maɩ ba tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa ba ma zuli-tɩ. Ba ma tu ba tɩtɩ yɩ ba bɛɛsɩ ba yɩra. Cullu tɩm kʋntʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ tɩ jɩgɩ kuri mʋ te, tɩ nan yɩ kafɛ mʋ. Tɩ warɩ tɩ wǝli nɔɔna sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ dɩ wo-zɔɔna yalʋ ba fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn.
51003001	Abam na nɛ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ á joori á bi á yagɩ tʋʋnɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wǝǝnu tɩm taa jɩgɩ fra dɩ abam, sɩ dáanɩ mʋ Zezi Krisi je Baŋa-Wɛ jazɩm nɩ.
51003002	Pa-na á wʋbʋŋa tiini ya zʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ wo-laarʋ tɩm, sɩ kʋ yɩ taa yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm.
51003003	Abam na yagɩ lwarɩm cwǝŋǝ tɩn, kʋ nyɩ dɩ á tɩgɩ mʋ te, yɩ á laan na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa dɩ Zezi Krisi, yɩ á ŋwɩa kam sǝgi Wɛ tee nɩ.
51003004	Abam ŋwɩa kam cɩga cɩga mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, o na joori o ba o brɩ o tɩtɩ jaja dɩ o paarɩ-zulǝ yam, abam dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o á na paarɩ-zulǝ.
51003005	Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á lɩ lʋgʋ baŋa wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ tɩm mʋ á bɩcara nɩ, sɩ á yɩ zaŋɩ á sɛ-tɩ. Kʋ na yɩ boorim naa wo-zɔɔna kikiǝ naa ka-laga, naa kʋ na yɩ á fra na zʋʋrɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ tɩn, naa á na pa á yi sui wǝǝnu tɩlʋ tɩn, á yɩ sɛ wʋbʋŋa yam kʋntʋ doŋ. Nmʋ na paɩ n yi sui wǝǝnu, kʋ brɩ nɩ n paɩ tɩntʋ mʋ zulǝ yɩ n daarɩ Wɛ n yagɩ.
51003006	Wo-balwaarʋ tɩntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ banɩ wʋ́ zaŋɩ [dɩ nabiinǝ balʋ maama na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn].
51003007	Abam dɩ ŋwɩa kam maama dɛɛn yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
51003008	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, á maŋɩ sɩ á lɩ wo-balwaarʋ tɩm kʋntʋ maama mʋ á bɩcara nɩ. Kʋ na yɩ ban-zɔŋɔ dɩ ka-culi-daanɩ dɩ pu-sɩŋa. Á yɩ taá twɩ nɔɔna. Á yɩ taá maɩ á niǝ á ŋɔɔnɩ wo-zɔɔna ŋwɛ.
51003009	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á fɔ vwan á pa daanɩ. Bɛŋwaanɩ abam yagɩ á ŋwɩ-doŋǝ kam dɩ ka kikiǝ maama,
51003010	yɩ á laan daarɩ á jɩgɩ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa mʋ. Wɛ mʋ pɛ abam ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam kʋntʋ. DƖ maa kwɛ-ka sɩ ka taa nyɩ dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ ŋwɩa, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á lwarɩ DƖ na yɩ te tɩn.
51003011	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, balʋ na jɩgɩ Wɛ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kam tɩn, kampwara daa tǝri ba wʋnɩ. Zwifǝ dɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ. Balʋ na goni ba bǝkǝri dɩ balʋ na wʋ goni tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ. Balʋ yi na wʋ pʋʋrɩ dɩ balʋ ba na ba nɩgɩ tɩn, kʋ wǝli dɩ gambɛ dɩ balʋ na te ba tɩtɩ tɩn maama yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ. Ba maama wʋra Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ, yɩ o ŋwɩ dɩ ba maama.
51003012	Wɛ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, yɩ DƖ soe abam. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, taá jɩgɩ-na da-ŋwaŋa, sɩ á taá kɩ-da lanyɩranɩ. Taá tu-na á tɩtɩ da-tee nɩ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-bono dɩ wʋ-zuru.
51003013	Á taá jɩgɩ-na wʋ-zuru da-ŋwaanɩ. Abam wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ jʋʋ dɩ o doŋ, sɩ á yagɩ á ma cɛ daanɩ, nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na yagɩ á lwarɩm o ma cɛ abam te tɩn.
51003014	Kʋlʋ na dwe maama tɩn, taá soe-na daanɩ, sɩ kʋ pa á wanɩ á taá jɩgɩ ni dɩdʋa lanyɩranɩ.
51003015	Pa-na wʋ-zuru kʋlʋ Zezi Krisi na pɛ abam tɩn taa te á wʋbʋŋa maama. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ kuri abam sɩ á ji woŋo dɩdʋa mʋ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru kʋntʋ doŋ. Maŋa maama sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le.
51003016	Pa-na Zezi Krisi taanɩ dɩm tiini dɩ zʋ á bɩcara, sɩ á taá maɩ swan yalʋ Wɛ na pɛ abam tɩn á kwe daanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kaanɩ daanɩ. Taá leeni-na Wɛ lǝŋ-ŋwɩ dɩ Wɛ tiǝ le dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ abam le sɩlʋ tɩn. Á taá leeni kʋntʋ á zuli Wɛ, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le.
51003017	Woŋo kʋlʋ maama abam na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn, kʋ na yɩ á ni-ŋwaŋa naa á jɩŋa tɩtʋŋɩ, sɩ á pa kʋ taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ le Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
51003018	Kaana-ba, á maŋɩ sɩ á taá sɛ á banna, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋntʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋbʋŋa tɩn mʋ.
51003019	Kʋ daarɩ kan-banna-ba, á dɩ maŋɩ sɩ á taá soe á kaana, sɩ á yɩ taá kɩ cɩa dɩ ba.
51003020	Biǝ-ba, á na sɛ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ á sɛ á tiinǝ ni woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na poli Wɛ wʋ tɩn.
51003021	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ biǝ kwǝ tɩn, á yɩ taá tiini á fɩ-ba, sɩ kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa ba wʋrʋ cɔgɩ yɩ ba ga baarɩ.
51003022	Kʋ na yɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ á tɔgɩ á yum tiinǝ wʋbʋŋa woŋo maama wʋnɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ ba na zɩgɩ ba nii abam maŋa kalʋ yɩranɩ tɩn mʋ á wʋ́ kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ ba tee abam. Nan taá tʋŋɩ-na dɩ á wʋ maama, á na kwarɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
51003023	Woŋo kʋlʋ maama á na wʋ́ tʋŋɩ tɩn, á taá tʋŋɩ dɩ á wʋ maama. Pa-na á na kɩ te tɩn taa yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ kʋ taa daɩ nabiinǝ ŋwaanɩ.
51003024	Bɛŋwaanɩ abam ye nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ o na tiŋi sɩ o pa o nɔɔna bam Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ á yuutu wʋlʋ á na tʋŋɩ á pa-o tɩn.
51003025	Kʋ daarɩ wʋlʋ maama na kɩ balɔrɔ tɩn wʋ́ joŋi balɔrɔ ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ, sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam na yɩ te tɩn. Wɛ nan tɔgɩ cɩga mʋ DƖ maɩ DƖ di nabiinǝ taanɩ, sɩ DƖ ba kuri nɔɔna daanɩ.
51004001	Kʋ daarɩ abam balʋ na yɩ gambɛ sɩm yum tiinǝ tɩn, á taá kɩ cɩga dɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn dɩ ba. Á nan taá ye nɩ abam dɩ jɩgɩ yuutu o na te abam Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ.
51004002	Á tiini á kwaanɩ á taá loori Wɛ, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le.
51004003	Á nan taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam dɩ, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ na cwǝŋǝ dɩ́ taá tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kalʋ na sǝgi tɩn kwǝrǝ dɩ́ brɩ nɔɔna. Kʋ nan yɩ amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Zezi kwǝrǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ pɛ a wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ.
51004004	Loori-na Wɛ á pa-nɩ, sɩ a wanɩ a pa nɔɔna lwarɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ maama fasɩ. Mʋ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ amʋ sɩ a tʋŋɩ tɩn.
51004005	Á cʋ-na á tɩtɩ dɩ á na ŋwɩ te dɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ, á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ sɩ ba yɩ na á wo-lɔŋɔ. Wɛ na pɛ abam pwǝlǝ sɩ á kɩ kʋlʋ, sɩ á pa kʋ ja kuri lanyɩranɩ.
51004006	Pa-na á ni-taanɩ taa lana, sɩ dɩ taa jɩgɩ ywǝǝni, sɩ á daarɩ á taá ye á na wʋ́ lǝri nɔɔnʋ maama taanɩ te tɩn.
51004007	A lagɩ a tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-sono Tisiki sɩ o ba abam te. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na tʋŋɩ o pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ cɩga tɩn. Dɩbam maama wǝli daanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ paɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm.
51004008	Amʋ yɔɔrɩ a tʋŋ-o sɩ o ba o ta amʋ labaarɩ maama na yɩ te tɩn o brɩ abam, sɩ á bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ dɩ á na wʋ́ lwarɩ dɩbam woŋo na yɩ te tɩn.
51004009	Dɩbam ko-bu-sono Onisim dɩ wʋ́ tɔgɩ o ba. Wʋntʋ nuŋi abam kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ cɩga. Bantʋ bale mʋ wʋ́ ta woŋo kʋlʋ maama na wʋra kʋ kɩ yo seeni tɩn ba brɩ abam.
51004010	Arisarɩkɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ o wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ dɩ amʋ tɩn jɔɔnɩ abam. Marɩkɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ Banabasɩ cʋrʋ tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam. Abam maŋɩ á joŋi ni nɩ, o na tuǝ, á wʋ́ jeer-o lanyɩranɩ.
51004011	Zusitu wʋlʋ yɩrɩ dɩdoŋ na yɩ Zezi tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam. Kʋ na yɩ Zwifǝ balʋ na tu ba sɛ Zezi tɩn, nɔɔna bantʋ batɔ yɩranɩ mʋ yɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ ba tʋŋɩ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm tɩtʋŋa ba wǝli amʋ tɩn. Ba tiini ba paɩ a wʋ zurǝ.
51004012	Epafrasɩ wʋlʋ na nuŋi abam kɔgɔ kʋm wʋnɩ yɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Zezi Krisi tɩn dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam. O kwaanɩ o loori Wɛ mʋ maŋa maama o pa abam, sɩ á wanɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ baarɩ, sɩ á wʋbʋŋa bɩ dɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm, sɩ á taá kɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ kʋlʋ maama tɩn.
51004013	Amʋ tɩtɩ wʋ́ wanɩ a ta a brɩ abam nɩ o sɩɩnɩ o tiini o tʋŋɩ o wǝli abam, kʋ wǝli dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na zʋʋrɩ Lawodise dɩ Yɩrapolisi nɩ tɩn.
51004014	Dɩbam badoŋ-sono Luki wʋlʋ na yɩ dɔgɩta tu tɩn dɩdaanɩ Demasɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ abam.
51004015	Jɔɔnɩ-na dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na tɔgɩ Zezi yɩ ba zʋʋrɩ Lawodise nɩ tɩn á pa dɩbam, kʋ wǝli dɩ Nimfa dɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na yǝni kʋ jeeri daanɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn.
51004016	Abam na joŋi amʋ tɔnɔ kʋm yɩ á na karɩmɩ á ti, sɩ á laan pa-kʋ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na zʋʋrɩ Lawodise nɩ tɩn, sɩ ba dɩ karɩmɩ. Kʋ daarɩ sɩ abam dɩ joŋi amʋ tɔnɔ kʋdoŋ bantʋ dɩ tee nɩ á dɩ karɩmɩ.
51004017	Ta-na á brɩ Arisipi sɩ o kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na pɛ-o sɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩn o ti.
51004018	Amʋ Pooli mʋ jɔɔnɩ abam. A tɩtɩ laan mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ dɩ a jɩŋa. Á yɩ zaŋɩ á swe a na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn ni nɩ. Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
52001001	Amʋ Pooli dɩdaanɩ Silasɩ dɩ Timoti mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ yɩ á yɩ dɩ́ Ko Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn. Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
52001002	Maŋa maama dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le mʋ abam maama ŋwaanɩ, yɩ dɩ́ kwǝri dɩ́ loori-DƖ dɩ́ pa abam.
52001003	Dɩ́ na wʋ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ guli abam na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi yɩ kʋ paɩ á tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ te tɩn mʋ, dɩ́ guli abam sono kʋm na paɩ á tiini á tʋŋɩ te tɩn. Á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ paɩ á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
52001004	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ soe abam yɩ DƖ kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna.
52001005	Bɛŋwaanɩ, dɩbam dɛɛn na tu dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ ni-taanɩ má. Wɛ dam dɩm mʋ wʋ dɩbam tee nɩ dɩ DƖ Joro kʋm, yɩ dɩ́ brɩ Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ dɩ́ wʋ maama. Dɩbam dɛɛn na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, á nɛ dɩbam na yɩ tɩte sɩ kʋ ma zǝni abam.
52001006	Abam lwǝni dɩbam dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na kɩ te tɩn. Á na joŋi Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn, kʋ pɛ á na yaara zanzan. Á nan ta joŋi-ka dɩ wʋpolo Wɛ Joro kʋm na zǝni abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52001007	Kʋ ma pa á jɩgɩ nyɩnyʋgʋ kʋlʋ na lamma tɩn, sɩ Zezi nɔɔna balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Masɩdʋanɩ tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ dɩ Akayi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn dɩ lwǝni abam.
52001008	Bɛŋwaanɩ, abam na tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ kam á brɩ nɔɔna te tɩn, ka jagɩ Masɩdʋanɩ dɩ Akayi nɩ ka gaalɩ ka kɛ ka yi je maama, yɩ nɔɔna maama lwarɩ á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te. Mʋ kʋ kuri kʋ daa daɩ fɩfɩʋn sɩ dɩ́ ta kʋlʋkʋlʋ kantʋ laŋa nɩ.
52001009	Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna bam maama tɛ á na jeeri dɩbam lanyɩranɩ te maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na tu abam te tɩn, dɩ á na yagɩ jwǝnǝ kaanɩm yɩ á daarɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ, sɩ á laan taá tʋŋɩ á pa Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tu dɩ ŋwɩa tu te tɩn,
52001010	yɩ á kwǝri á cǝgi DƖ Bu wʋm tum dɩm. Wɛ bi-o DƖ pa o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ oó zɩgɩ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ o ba lʋgʋ baŋa. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi wʋlʋ na wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ ba nɔɔna baŋa nɩ ba lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋnɩ.
52002001	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam tɩtɩ ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ, dɩ́ na tu abam te tɩn, kʋ daɩ kafɛ.
52002002	Abam ye ba na maŋɩ ba bɛɛsɩ dɩbam yɩ ba twɩ dɩbam te Filipi nɩ yɩ dɩ́ laan ba abam te tɩn. Nɔɔna dɛɛn kwaanɩ sɩ ba cɩ dɩbam cwǝŋǝ. Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩ́ Tu Wɛ pɛ dɩbam pu-dɩa sɩ dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam dɩ baarɩ.
52002003	Kwiǝ yalʋ dɩ́ na yǝni dɩ́ kwe abam tɩn, kʋ daɩ dɩ tusim, naa dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ. Kʋ nan daɩ swan mʋ dɩ́ kɩa, sɩ dɩ́ ma dɩ́ ganɩ abam.
52002004	Awo. Dɩbam yǝni dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ kuri dɩbam yɩ DƖ kwe DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam DƖ kɩ dɩ́ jɩŋa nɩ. Dɩbam na ŋɔɔnɩ te tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ ma dɩ́ poli nabiinǝ wʋrʋ, kʋ yɩ sɩ dɩ́ pa Wɛ dɩlʋ na maŋɩ dɩbam bɩcara DƖ nii tɩn wʋ mʋ poli.
52002005	Á ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ tu dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ ni-sʋŋɩ ŋwaŋa dɩ abam. Dɩ́ nan wʋ ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtar-kamunǝ sɩ dɩ́ ma pri nɔɔna swan, sɩ dɩ́ joŋi wǝǝnu ba tee nɩ. Wɛ ye nɩ dɩbam na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ.
52002006	Kʋ na yɩ abam naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama dɩ, dɩ́ wʋ kɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa nɩ sɩ nabiinǝ taa zuli dɩbam.
52002007	Dɩ́ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋna tɩn, dɩ́ ya jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ pa á taá nii dɩbam nɩ nɔn-kamunǝ te. Dɩ́ nan wʋ kɩ kʋntʋ. Dɩ́ dɛɛn tu dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ nɩ biǝ te, yɩ dɩ́ laan nii abam lanyɩranɩ nɩ kaanɩ na jɩgɩ o biǝ o nii te tɩn.
52002008	Dɩ́ na tiini dɩ́ soe abam tɩn, dɩ́ sɛ sɩ dɩ́ kwe Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam, yɩ dɩ́ kwe dɩ́ ŋwɩa maama dɩ mʋ dɩ́ wǝli da dɩ́ pa abam, á na tiini á tigi dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52002009	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam wʋ́ wanɩ á guli dɩbam dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ dɩ́ bwǝni zanzan abam ŋwaanɩ te maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na wʋra dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn. Dɩ́ dɛɛn ba lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ yaarɩ abam dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ ta yǝni dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ maama sɩ dɩ́ ma na dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu.
52002010	Dɩ́ dɛɛn tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ mʋ dɩ wʋ-poŋo abam balʋ na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa maama jɩgɩ cɩga, yɩ dɩ́ wʋ jaanɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ́ cɔgɩ. Abam wʋ́ wanɩ á ta nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ. Wɛ dɩ nan ye nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
52002011	Á ye nɩ dɩ́ dɛɛn jɩgɩ abam maama dɩ jɩ sɩle mʋ, nɩ ko na yǝni o jɩgɩ o biǝ te tɩn.
52002012	Dɩ́ kwe abam dɩ kwiǝ yalʋ na paɩ á bɩcara zurǝ tɩn mʋ. Dɩ́ ma daarɩ dɩ́ tiini dɩ́ kaanɩ abam, sɩ á taá tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ mʋ kuri abam sɩ á zʋ DƖ paarɩ dɩm wʋ sɩ á na paarɩ-zulǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
52002013	Dɩ́ na jaanɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ ba dɩ́ tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, á sɛ yɩ á joŋi-ka lanyɩranɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ. Á sɛ nɩ kʋ yɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ mʋ sɩ kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ nyɩm. Kʋ yɩ cɩga, kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam sɩɩnɩ ka yɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ mʋ, yɩ ka zǝni abam balʋ na sɛ Zezi tɩn wʋbʋŋa dɩ dam.
52002014	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam na nɛ yaara yalʋ tɩn, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na wʋ Zude tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn dɩ nɛ yaara yantʋ doŋ mʋ. Abam dwi tiinǝ bam yaarɩ abam nɩnɛɛnɩ Zwifǝ bam dɩ na yaarɩ Zwifǝ balʋ na sɛ Zezi te tɩn mʋ.
52002015	Kʋ nan yɩ Zwifǝ bam kʋntʋ mʋ gʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɩ faŋa faŋa Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam, yɩ ba kwǝri ba bɛɛsɩ dɩbam dɩ. Ba maa paɩ Wɛ wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ ba, yɩ ba yɩ nɔɔna maama dʋna.
52002016	Ba dɛɛn kwaanɩ sɩ ba cɩ dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam dɩ́ brɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ sɩ ba na vrɩm ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ. Ba na vɩn Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ ma pa ba na kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ maŋa maama tɩn fɔgɩ tɩ puli tɩ wǝli da. Wɛ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm laan nan tu ba baŋa.
52002017	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ na pɔɔrɩ dɩ abam maŋa fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa mʋ pɔɔrɩ daanɩ, kʋ yɩ dɩ́ yiǝ na warɩ ya na daanɩ tɩn mʋ. Abam fra tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ sɩ dɩ́ joori dɩ́ na abam.
52002018	Dɩ́ ma lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ ba abam te. Amʋ Pooli ya kwaanɩ sɩ a ba abam te, kʋ daɩ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ. Kʋ nan yɩ sʋtaanɩ mʋ cɩgɩ dɩbam.
52002019	Kʋ yɩ abam wʋbʋŋa mʋ tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam. Kʋ yɩ abam ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ wʋpolo. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na joori o ba, dɩ́ wʋ́ taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ́ na wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ brɩ nɩ abam dɛ dɩbam jɩŋa á na vrɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52002020	Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, abam mʋ sɩɩnɩ á paɩ dɩbam na zulǝ dɩ wʋpolo.
52003001	-
52003002	Dɩbam na warɩ sɩ dɩ́ na daanɩ yɩ abam fra tiini ya jɩgɩ dɩbam kʋ ja gaalɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ dɩbam lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti sɩ o ba abam te, sɩ dɩbam tɩtɩ daarɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ Atɛɛnɩ nɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam o tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam yɩ o tɔɔlɩ Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn. Dɩ́ tʋŋ-o abam tee nɩ sɩ o ba o wǝli abam, sɩ á na dam dɩ baarɩ á taá tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama,
52003003	sɩ yaara yalʋ á na nɛ tɩn yɩ pa á wʋlʋwʋlʋ joori kwaga. Abam tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye nɩ dɩbam maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ na yaara yam kʋntʋ doŋ mʋ.
52003004	Dɩbam dɛɛn ta na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ ta dɩ́ brɩ abam nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ bɛɛsɩ dɩbam. Kʋ nan sɩɩnɩ kʋ kɩ nɩ abam na maŋɩ á ye kʋ ni nɩ te tɩn.
52003005	Abam liǝ na tiini ya jɩgɩ-nɩ tɩn mʋ pɛ a tʋŋɩ Timoti abam tee nɩ, sɩ o ba o nii á daa ta tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama na, a na kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ sɩ sʋtaanɩ wʋ́ zɩgɩ dɩ ba dɩ ganɩ abam sɩ á ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ nɩ sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa yam maama ji kafɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52003006	Lele kʋntʋ, Timoti laan joori o ba dɩbam te, yɩ o pa dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa pǝni tɩga nɩ. O tagɩ o wɩ, á ta tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama dɩ sono. O daa ta tagɩ o wɩ, á tiini á jɩgɩ dɩbam wʋbʋŋa dɩ wʋpolo, yɩ á lagɩ sɩ á na dɩbam nɩ dɩbam dɩ na lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ na abam te tɩn.
52003007	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ na ni nɩ á tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama tɩn, kʋ pɛ dɩ́ bɩcara pǝni tɩga nɩ, yɩ dɩ́ na baarɩ dɩ́ yaara dɩ dɩ́ cana yam maama wʋnɩ.
52003008	Lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ laan ŋwɩ dɩ wʋpolo á na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɔgɩm dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52003009	Dɩ́ bá wanɩ dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ Tu Wɛ le dɩ́ ti abam ŋwaanɩ, dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ na nɛ wʋpolo kʋlʋ zanzan DƖ yigǝ nɩ abam ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
52003010	Maŋa maama wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ loori Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ wʋ maama mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na daanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ brɩ kʋlʋ daa ta na muri abam tɩn, sɩ á wanɩ á fɔgɩ á taá tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ á wʋ maama.
52003011	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi nan wʋ́ pa dɩbam cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ na abam.
52003012	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa á sono kʋm puli zanzan kʋ ja gaalɩ, sɩ á taá soe á donnǝ dɩ nɔɔna maama lanyɩranɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na soe abam te tɩn.
52003013	Kʋntʋ, oó pa á bɩcara kɩ dam, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo fasɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ yigǝ nɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba dɩ o kɔgɔ kʋm maama tɩn.
52004001	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, dɩ́ loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi ŋwaanɩ sɩ á da cwǝŋǝ sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ. Dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam cwǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ, yɩ á tɔgɩ-ka dɩ zɩm maama. Dɩ́ nan ta tiini dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á kwaanɩ sɩ kʋ dwǝni á na maŋɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
52004002	Abam ye wǝǝnu tɩlʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam yɩ tɩ yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi nyɩm tɩn.
52004003	Wɛ na lagɩ sɩ á taá yɩ te tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ: DƖ lagɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ, sɩ á yɩ taá boorǝ.
52004004	Abam nɔɔnʋ maama maŋɩ sɩ o lwarɩ, o na wʋ́ ja o tɩtɩ te sɩ o ma di o kaanɩ sɩ kʋ taa jɩgɩ zulǝ yɩ digiru tǝri kʋ wʋnɩ tɩn.
52004005	Á nan yɩ pa boorim wʋbʋŋa wanɩ abam, nɩ nɔɔna balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn.
52004006	Kadiri laŋa nɩ, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o kɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ o ko-bu wʋ tɩn, naa o joŋi kʋlʋ na yɩ o ko-bu nyɩm tɩn. Dɩ́ maŋɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ abam lanyɩranɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na kɩ wo-zɔɔna yantʋ doŋ, dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa o na cam.
52004007	Wɛ na kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ-DƖ tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá kɩ wo-zɔɔna. DƖ nan kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ.
52004008	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na vɩn dɩ́ na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nabiinǝ mʋ o vɩa, kʋ yɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na kɩ DƖ Joro kʋm abam bɩcara nɩ tɩn mʋ o vɩa.
52004009	Kʋ nan na yɩ á na wʋ́ ta soe á ko-biǝ te tɩn, kʋ daa daɩ fɩfɩʋn sɩ dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam. Wɛ tɩtɩ maŋɩ DƖ brɩ abam á na wʋ́ ta soe daanɩ te.
52004010	Kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, á sɩɩnɩ á soe á ko-biǝ balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Masɩdʋanɩ tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn. Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ nan ta loori abam sɩ á tiini á taá soe daanɩ kʋ dwǝni faŋa.
52004011	Kwaanɩ-na sɩ á taá zʋʋrɩ daanɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru. Á taá nii á tɩtɩ baŋa nɩ. Nɔɔnʋ maama kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ sɩ o na o ni-wʋdiu, nɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ ta abam te tɩn.
52004012	Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa balʋ na daɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nɔɔna tɩn taa nɩgɩ abam lanyɩranɩ, yɩ kʋʋ́ pa á daa bá tɩɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ.
52004013	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋ na yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɩgɩ tɩn, dɩ́ lagɩ sɩ á lwarɩ cɩga mʋ sɩ á daa yɩ taá bwɛa, sɩ á wʋ daa yɩ cɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ ŋwaanɩ, nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn na ba jɩgɩ tɩɩna te tɩn.
52004014	Dɩbam sɛ nɩ Zezi tɩgɩ mʋ, yɩ o laan joori o bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kʋ na yɩ balʋ na sɛ-o yɩ ba tɩ tɩn, dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ pa ba taa wʋ Zezi tee nɩ.
52004015	Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ na brɩ abam kʋlʋ tɩn yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝrǝ mʋ. Dɛ dɩm dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn, dɩbam balʋ na daarɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ yɩ dɩ́ ta ŋwɩ tɩn bá loori balʋ na maŋɩ ba tɩ tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
52004016	Dɩ́ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ ni kwǝrǝ na bagɩ wɛyuu nɩ, dɩ malɛsɩ pɛ wʋm kwǝrǝ, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ nabɔn-zɔŋɔ kʋm wum, yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩtɩ zɩgɩ wɛyuu nɩ o tu. Balʋ na sɛ Zezi Krisi yɩ ba tɩ tɩn wʋ́ da yigǝ ba bi ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ.
52004017	Wɛ laan wʋ́ pa dɩbam balʋ na daarɩ yɩ dɩ́ daa ta ŋwɩ tɩn la daanɩ dɩ bantʋ, yɩ DƖ zǝŋi dɩbam kunkwǝǝnu wʋnɩ sɩ dɩ́ vu dɩ́ jeeri dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wɛyuu nɩ. Kʋntʋ, dɩ́ wʋ́ ta wʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tee nɩ maŋa maama.
52004018	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á taá maɩ cɩga kam kʋntʋ á kwe daanɩ, sɩ á bɩcara taa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa.
52005001	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam daa ba taá lagɩ sɩ dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ ta dɩ́ brɩ abam maŋa kalʋ wǝǝnu tɩntʋ na wʋ́ kɩ tɩn.
52005002	Bɛŋwaanɩ abam tɩtɩ maŋɩ á ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm lagɩ dɩ ba dɩ darɩ nɔɔna mʋ, nɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ na yǝni o ba tɩtɩɩ nɩ te tɩn.
52005003	Maŋa kalʋ nɔɔna na tɛ ba wɩ yazurǝ wʋra yɩ ywǝǝni wʋra tɩn, kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ mʋ cam wʋ́ da dɩ ba ba baŋa, yɩ ba bá lu. Kʋʋ́ ta nyɩ dɩ kaanɩ pugǝ na dɛ ka vri yɩ ka wɔɛ te tɩn mʋ.
52005004	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam nan daa tǝri lim wʋnɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm bá ba dɩ darɩ abam nɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ te.
52005005	Abam maama wʋ Wɛ pooni wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ á tɩtʋŋa maama kɩ wɩa nɩ jaja. Dɩbam daɩ tɩtɩɩ nɔɔna, dɩ́ tɩtʋŋa dɩ nan daɩ lim tɩtʋŋa.
52005006	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ yɩ pa dɔɔm taa jɩgɩ dɩbam nɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ tɩn. Pa-na dɩ́ fɔgɩ dɩ́ cɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ sɩ dɩ́ yiǝ waarɩ.
52005007	Tɩtɩɩ nɩ mʋ nɔɔna yǝni ba dɔa, yɩ badonnǝ nyɔ ba bugǝ.
52005008	Dɩbam nan yɩ wɩa nɔɔna mʋ. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá cʋ dɩ́ tɩtɩ. Pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi, sɩ dɩ́ taá soe daanɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ cɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ, nɩ nɔɔnʋ na maa ve jara yɩ o kwe luguru gɔrɔ o lɛ o ma cɩ o nyɔɔnɩ te tɩn. Pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ vrɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa, nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ na kwe luguru yu-kwǝli o pu sɩ o ma kwǝli o yuu jara wʋnɩ te tɩn.
52005009	Wɛ na kuri dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, kʋ daɩ sɩ DƖ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ba kʋ cɔgɩ dɩbam. Kʋ nan yɩ sɩ DƖ vrɩ dɩbam ŋwɩa mʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
52005010	Wʋntʋ mʋ tɩgɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ. O na joori o ba, yɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ naa dɩ́ na tɩga, dɩ́ ta wʋ́ na ŋwɩa dɩd-o Wɛ tee nɩ.
52005011	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, á taá kwe daanɩ sɩ kʋ pa á bɩcara taa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa, sɩ á fɔgɩ á zǝni daanɩ dɩ baarɩ nɩ á na maŋɩ á kɩ te tɩn.
52005012	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ nan loori abam sɩ á taá nɩgɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tʋŋɩ dɩ abam yɩ ba nii abam baŋa nɩ yɩ ba kwe abam dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn.
52005013	Á taá zuli-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono ba tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ. Á pa ywǝǝni ta wʋ á tɩtarɩ nɩ.
52005014	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á taá kaanɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna, sɩ á pa balʋ na kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ tɩn na baarɩ, sɩ á taá zǝni nabwǝnǝ, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ nɔɔna maama.
52005015	Á taá yɩrɩ á tɩtɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ ma lwarɩm o joori o ma o ŋwɩ o doŋ lwarɩm. Maŋa maama sɩ á kwaanɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ á ko-biǝ dɩ nɔɔna maama.
