52005016	Á taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo maŋa maama.
52005017	Á taá loori Wɛ maŋa maama.
52005018	Kʋlʋ maama na kɩa, sɩ á taá kɩ Wɛ le. Mʋ Wɛ na lagɩ sɩ á taá kɩ te, á na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
52005019	Yɩ cʋ-na Wɛ Joro kʋm tɩtʋŋa.
52005020	Wɛ Joro kʋm na pɛ nɔɔnʋ ŋɔɔnɩ yiyiu-ŋwɛ, á yɩ zaŋɩ á gooni-sɩ.
52005021	Á nan maanɩ-na woŋo maama á nii. Kʋlʋ na lana tɩn sɩ á sɛ-kʋ.
52005022	Á nan fɔgɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ wo-balwaarʋ dwi maama.
52005023	Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ nɔɔna wʋ-zuru tɩn wʋ́ pa á taá yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna, sɩ á taá jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo fasɩ, sɩ á ŋwɩa maama taa jɩgɩ cɩga, kʋ na yɩ á yɩra dɩ á jwǝǝru dɩ á wʋbʋŋa maama. Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na tuǝ, á bá ta jɩgɩ digiru Wɛ yigǝ nɩ dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ.
52005024	Wɛ dɩlʋ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn yɩ cɩga tu mʋ. DƖ nan wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ DƖ zǝni abam kʋntʋ mʋ.
52005025	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, á taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam dɩ.
52005026	Jɔɔnɩ-na dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama lanyɩranɩ dɩ sono.
52005027	A nan lagɩ a loori abam dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ sɩ á karɩmɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ á brɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama.
52005028	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
53001001	Amʋ Pooli dɩdaanɩ Silasɩ dɩ Timoti mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ dɩ́ pa abam Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ Tesaloniki nɩ yɩ á yɩ dɩ́ Ko Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi nɔɔna tɩn.
53001002	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
53001003	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ á kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi kʋ ja gaalɩ, yɩ á maama tiini á soe daanɩ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ á sono kʋm wʋra kʋ puli zanzan.
53001004	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ tɛ á taanɩ dɩ́ brɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm na wʋ jǝgǝ kalʋ maama nɩ tɩn, yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ wʋpolo abam ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ tɛ dɩ ba nɩ, nɔɔna bɛɛsɩ abam yɩ ba yaarɩ abam zanzan, yɩ á daa ta zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ pu-dɩa, yɩ á kwǝri á tɔgɩ Zezi dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa.
53001005	Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ jaja nɩ, Wɛ wʋ́ di nabiinǝ sarɩya dɩ cɩga mʋ. DƖ wʋ́ pa á na cɩga, yɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á tɔgɩ á wǝli DƖ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ abam sɩɩnɩ á na yaara Wɛ paarɩ dɩm kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
53001006	Wɛ nan wʋ́ kɩ abam cɩga, yɩ DƖ wʋ́ pa balʋ na yaarɩ abam tɩn joori ba na cam.
53001007	DƖ ma wʋ́ daarɩ DƖ pa abam balʋ na yaarɩ tɩn dɩ dɩbam maama na siun, maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba sɩ nabiinǝ maama na-o tɩn. Wʋntʋ wʋ́ nuŋi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ dɩ o malɛsɩ dɩdɛɛra bam,
53001008	yɩ min-vwɩ zaŋɩ sɩ kaagɩ-ba. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa balʋ na vɩn Wɛ yɩ ba wʋ sɛ wʋm kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn na cam.
53001009	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋ́ na cam nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba te tɩn. Baá na lɛɛrʋ tɩlʋ na ba ti tɩn. Baá pɔɔrɩ-ba ba yɩra, yɩ ba taa baŋwɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm, yɩ ba daa bá na o paarɩ dam-fɔrɔ zulǝ yam.
53001010	Kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba kʋ kɩ maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn. Dɛ dɩm kʋntʋ nɩ, oó na zulǝ o tɩtɩ nɔɔna bam tee nɩ. Balʋ maama na kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o tɩn wʋ́ pa-o tiǝ zanzan. Abam nan wʋ́ ta wʋ bantʋ wʋnɩ dɩ á na sɛ Wɛ cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
53001011	Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ yǝni dɩ́ loori dɩ́ Tu Wɛ maŋa maama dɩ́ pa abam, sɩ DƖ pa á maŋɩ dɩ DƖ cwǝŋǝ kam tɔgɩm, nɩ DƖ na kuri abam sɩ á taá yɩ te tɩn. Dɩ́ loori-DƖ sɩ DƖ pa abam dam, sɩ á wanɩ á kɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ á wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn maama, sɩ á taá kɩ tɩtʋŋa yalʋ maama na lana tɩn, á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
53001012	Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi taa naɩ zulǝ abam tee nɩ, yɩ abam dɩ wʋ́ na zulǝ, dɩ́ Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi na pɛ abam yu-yoŋo tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
53002001	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, á ye nɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ joori o ba, yɩ Wɛ wʋ́ la dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá wʋ o tee nɩ. Dɩ́ nan lagɩ dɩ́ loori abam sɩ á yɩ pa á bɩcara taa di kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
53002002	Á yɩ zaŋɩ á pa á wʋbʋŋa vugimi, dɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɛ ba wɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi dɛ dɩm maŋɩ dɩ yi tɩn. Nɔɔna na tɛ dɩ abam ba wɩ, Wɛ Joro kʋm mʋ brɩ kʋntʋ, naa ba na wɩ kʋ yɩ dɩbam taanɩ mʋ, naa ba na pɛ abam tɔnɔ yɩ ba wɩ kʋ nuŋi dɩbam tee mʋ,
53002003	sɩ á yɩ sɛ á pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ ganɩ abam dɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ dwi. Bɛŋwaanɩ maŋa kalʋ nɔɔna zanzan na wʋ́ ba ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn wʋ́ da yigǝ kʋ kɩ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm dɛ dɩm laan ba dɩ yi. Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm wʋ́ da yigǝ mʋ o ba. Wʋntʋ gurim je nan wʋ́ ta yɩ cɔgɩm mʋ.
53002004	Oó brɩ nɩ wʋm dwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama nɔɔna na zuli dɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na bǝ nɩ ba wa tɩn, yɩ oó dʋnɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama. O ma wʋ́ vu o zʋ o jǝni Baŋa-Wɛ tɩtɩ digǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ o brɩ nɩ wʋm tɩtɩ mʋ yɩ Wɛ.
53002005	A ya na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, a maŋɩ a brɩ abam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ. Á nan wʋ guli-tɩ na?
53002006	Woŋo kʋdoŋ nan mʋ cɩgɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ cwǝŋǝ sɩ tɩ ta yɩ kɩ lele, yɩ á ye kʋ ni nɩ. Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kam na sɩɩnɩ ka yi, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm laan wʋ́ ba sɩ nabiinǝ lwar-o jaja.
53002007	Kǝm-lwaanʋ dam dɩlʋ na sǝgi nɔɔna yiǝ nɩ tɩn maŋɩ dɩ wʋra dɩ cɔgɩ nabiinǝ. Kʋ nan na yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋra o cʋ kǝm-lwaanʋ tɩm cwǝŋǝ lele sɩ tɩ yɩ kɩ tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ́ ba o viiri.
53002008	Maŋa kam kʋntʋ nɩ mʋ, kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm laan wʋ́ brɩ o tɩtɩ jaja. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o laan wʋ́ ma o ni-viu o cɔgɩ wʋntʋ fasɩ. Zezi na wʋ́ joori o ba dɩ dam-fɔrɔ tɩn, mʋ o laan wʋ́ cɔgɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm.
53002009	Maŋa kam kǝm-balwaarʋ tu wʋm na wʋ́ ba tɩn, oó joŋi dam-fɔrɔ sʋtaanɩ tee nɩ o ma kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla dwi tǝri tǝri ya na daɩ cɩga tɩn.
53002010	O ma wʋ́ kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ dwi maama o ma ganɩ balʋ na wʋ́ ga ba ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn. Kʋʋ́ kɩ-ba kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba ba sɛ sɩ ba joŋi Wɛ cɩga kam dɩ sono, sɩ kʋ pa DƖ vrɩ-ba ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.
53002011	Ba na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ, DƖ laan wʋ́ pa ba wʋbʋŋa daa yǝri cɩga, yɩ ba sɛ ba tɔgɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ vwan tɩn.
53002012	Balʋ maama na wʋ sɛ DƖ cɩga kam yɩ ba daarɩ ba soe kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ di ba taanɩ yɩ ba na cam.
53002013	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ Wɛ le maŋa maama abam ŋwaanɩ, á na yɩ balʋ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm na soe tɩn. Kʋ zɩgɩ pulim nɩ mʋ Wɛ kuri abam sɩ DƖ vrɩ abam DƖ yagɩ. DƖ mɛ DƖ Joro kʋm dam mʋ DƖ pa á ji DƖ tɩtɩ nɔɔna, dɩ á na kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ cɩga kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
53002014	Wɛ na bǝŋi abam sɩ á taá yɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ dɛ dɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩ́ na tɔɔlɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa á tɔgɩ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi á na zulǝ.
53002015	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, fɔgɩ-na á zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, sɩ á yɩ yagɩ cɩga kalʋ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, kʋ na yɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ wʋ abam tee nɩ yɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, dɩ dɩ́ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋlʋ dɩ́ pa abam tɩn dɩ.
53002016	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi dɩdaanɩ dɩ́ Ko Wɛ soe dɩbam yɩ DƖ pa dɩbam yu-yoŋo, dɩ DƖ na pɛ dɩ́ jɩgɩ baarɩ dɩlʋ na bá fɔgɩ dɩ ti tɩn, dɩdaanɩ tɩɩna yalʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
53002017	Dɩntʋ wʋ́ zǝni abam dɩ wʋbʋŋ-ŋʋna sɩ á taá jɩgɩ dam, sɩ á wanɩ á taá kɩ lanyɩranɩ á tɩtʋŋa dɩ á ni-taanɩ maama wʋnɩ.
53003001	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, kʋlʋ na daarɩ tɩn, á taá loori Wɛ á pa dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam jagɩ ka yi je maama, sɩ nɔɔna sɛ-ka lanyɩranɩ nɩ abam dɩ na sɛ-ka te tɩn.
53003002	Loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ joŋi dɩbam nɔn-balwaarʋ jɩa nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ daɩ nɔɔna bam maama mʋ sɛ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam.
53003003	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, oó wǝli abam dɩ dam, yɩ o cɩ abam sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ dɩ yɩ cɔgɩ abam.
53003004	Á na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn mʋ dɩ́ jɩgɩ abam cɩga sɩ á tɔgɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam kʋlʋ tɩn, yɩ á ta wʋ́ ta kɩ kʋntʋ nɩ dɩ́ na maŋɩ dɩ́ ta te tɩn.
53003005	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ pa á wʋbʋŋa tiini ya zʋ Wɛ sono kʋm, yɩ o daarɩ o pa á zɩgɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ pu-dɩa nɩ Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ na zɩgɩ te tɩn.
53003006	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, dɩ́ kaanɩ abam dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ mʋ, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩ á ko-bu wʋlʋ maama na yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩm yɩ o ba tɔgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ dɩ́ na brɩ abam tɩn.
53003007	Abam nan ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á lwǝni dɩbam tɩtʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn mʋ. Dɩ́ dɛɛn na wʋ á tee nɩ tɩn, dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ yawɔrɔ.
53003008	Dɩ́ wʋ joŋi wʋdiu nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tee nɩ kafɛ. Dɩ́ nan tiini dɩ́ tʋŋɩ mʋ yɩ kʋ cɛ dɩ́ yɩra wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ yaarɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ wʋdiu ŋwaanɩ.
53003009	Kʋ nan daɩ nɩ dɩ́ ya ba jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ dɩ́ joŋi zǝnǝ abam tee nɩ. Dɩ́ dɛɛn nan kɩ kʋntʋ sɩ kʋ pa á wanɩ á lwǝni dɩbam na kɩ te tɩn mʋ.
53003010	Dɩ́ na wʋ abam tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, dɩ́ pɛ abam ni nɩ, nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na ba lagɩ tɩtʋŋa tɩn, kʋntʋ tu wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o di wʋdiu dɩ.
53003011	Dɩ́ tagɩ kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ ni nɩ abam badonnǝ yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna mʋ. Ba ba lagɩ tɩtʋŋa, yɩ ba karɩ je maama ba kɩkarɩ ba donnǝ yiǝ.
53003012	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi yɩrɩ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩ́ tɛ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ cɩm ba tʋŋɩ, sɩ ba wanɩ ba nii ba tɩtɩ baŋa nɩ dɩ ba ni-wʋdiu.
53003013	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ-ba, abam tɩtɩ nan yɩ zaŋɩ á bwǝni dɩ lanyɩranɩ kǝm.
53003014	Abam wʋlʋ na wʋ sɛ dɩ́ na pʋpʋnɩ te tɔnɔ kʋntʋ wʋnɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam tɩn, sɩ á taá ye kʋntʋ tu, sɩ á wanɩ á ja á tɩtɩ dɩd-o, sɩ kʋ pa cavɩɩra ja-o.
53003015	Á nan yɩ pa o ji á dʋm. Á taá kaan-o nɩ á ko-bu te.
53003016	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm yɩ wʋ-zuru tu mʋ, yɩ oó pa abam taá jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru maŋa maama woŋo maama wʋnɩ. Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ ta wʋra dɩ abam maama.
53003017	Amʋ Pooli mʋ jɔɔnɩ abam. A tɩtɩ laan mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ dɩ a jɩŋa. A yǝni a kɩ kʋntʋ mʋ a twaanʋ tɩm maama wʋnɩ, sɩ á lwarɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ amʋ mʋ pʋpʋnɩ. A yǝni a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ mʋ.
53003018	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
54001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ a pa nmʋ Timoti. Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ dɩbam na jɩgɩ o tɩɩna tɩn mʋ pɛ-nɩ ni sɩ a taa yɩ o tɩntʋŋnʋ.
54001002	Nmʋ yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ bu mʋ te, n na sɛ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo, yɩ o daarɩ o duri nmʋ ŋwaŋa.
54001003	Maŋa kam amʋ dɛɛn na maa ve Masɩdʋanɩ tɩn, a loori nmʋ sɩ n maŋɩ Efɛɛzɩ nɩ sɩ n kaanɩ nɔɔna balʋ na brɩ kʋlʋ na daɩ cɩga tɩn sɩ ba yagɩ.
54001004	Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ta-ba sɩ ba yagɩ ba wʋbʋŋa sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na daɩ cɩga tɩn, sɩ ba daarɩ ba yagɩ ba kwǝ dwi natɔga kalʋ na ba jɩgɩ gurim je tɩn. Bɛŋwaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ paɩ nɔɔna magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ kafɛ. Tɩ ba wǝli nɔɔna sɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ-DƖ.
54001005	Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n kaanɩ-ba mʋ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ sɩ ba yagɩ-tɩ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ sono kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga cɩga na nuŋi bɩcarɩ-ŋʋna wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ ba na kɩ kʋlʋ maama ba na ye nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn, yɩ ba na sɩɩnɩ ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, kʋʋ́ pa ba taa jɩgɩ sono kʋm kʋntʋ.
54001006	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ nan ywǝri cɩga kam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
54001007	Ba lagɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm karanyɩna tiinǝ mʋ. Ba tɩtɩ nan ba ni ba na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn kuri, yɩ ba yǝri ba na ŋɔɔnɩ kʋlʋ dɩ ba wʋ maama tɩn dɩ.
54001008	Dɩ́ ye nɩ Wɛ cullu tɩm lana dɩ wʋlʋ na ni tɩ kuri nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
54001009	Dɩbam nan ye nɩ, Wɛ na pɛ DƖ cullu tɩm tɩn, DƖ wʋ pɛ-tɩ nɔn-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ. DƖ nan pɛ-tɩ balʋ na yɩ cullu cɔgɩna tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ, dɩdaanɩ vɩnvɩɩna dɩ balʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ DƖ tɩn, dɩ wo-lwaanʋ kǝrǝ dɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ, dɩ balʋ na ba nɩgɩ-DƖ tɩn, dɩ balʋ dɩ na gʋ ba kwǝ naa ba niinǝ naa ba donnǝ tɩn mʋ,
54001010	dɩ balʋ na boori tɩn, dɩ baara balʋ na maɩ ba donnǝ ba jiri kaana tɩn, dɩdaanɩ balʋ na cʋ ba jaanɩ nɔɔna dɩ dam ba yǝgi tɩn, dɩdaanɩ balʋ na fɔ vwan tɩn, dɩ balʋ na du dɩ Wɛ yɩ kʋ yagɩ kʋ daɩ cɩga tɩn. DƖ nan pɛ DƖ cullu tɩm balʋ maama na cɔgɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ tɔgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam na brɩ te tɩn dɩ mʋ.
54001011	Kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ nuŋi Wʋpolo Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ na jɩgɩ paarɩ-zulǝ tɩn te mʋ, yɩ dɩntʋ kɩ-ka amʋ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ a taa tɛa.
54001012	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi mʋ pɛ amʋ dam sɩ a taa tʋŋɩ a pa-o. A kɩ o le dɩdaanɩ o na nɛ nɩ amʋ jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa yɩ o lɩ-nɩ sɩ a taa tʋŋɩ a pa-o tɩn.
54001013	Faŋa tɩn, a dɛɛn yǝni a ŋɔɔnɩ a cɔgɩ Zezi yɩrɩ, yɩ a kwǝri a twɩ-o, yɩ a ta yaarɩ o nɔɔna bam. Dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o nan ta duri a ŋwaŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ya wʋ sɛ-o yɩ kʋ pa a yǝri woŋo kʋlʋ a na jɩgɩ a kɩ tɩn.
54001014	Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ kɩ-nɩ yu-yoŋo zanzan kʋ ja gaalɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o pa a taa jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩd-o dɩ sono, a na ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
54001015	Taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna maama sɛ-dɩ mʋ: «Zezi Krisi tu lʋgʋ baŋa sɩ o vrɩ nɔn-cɩcɔgɩrʋ mʋ ba lwarɩm wʋnɩ.» Amʋ nan mʋ kɩ lwarɩm a dwǝni nɔɔna maama,
54001016	yɩ Wɛ ta duri a ŋwaŋa sɩ kʋ pa Zezi Krisi brɩ o wʋ-zuru kʋm na yɩ te dɩ amʋ. O na tiini o kɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ amʋ wʋlʋ na yɩ nɔn-cɩcɔgɩrʋ tɩm yigǝ tu tɩn, kʋ yɩ maana mʋ kʋ paɩ nɔɔna balʋ na wʋ́ da a kwaga ba ba ba sɛ-o, sɩ ba daarɩ ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
54001017	Baŋa-Wɛ yɩ pɛ wʋlʋ paarɩ na bá ti maŋa dɩ maŋa tɩn mʋ. DƖ yɩ ŋwɩa tu mʋ, ba ba na-DƖ dɩ yiǝ, yɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ doŋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ zulǝ dɩ tiǝ taa wʋ DƖ tee nɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn. Amina.
54001018	A bu Timoti, a lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ sɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ n pa Wɛ, nɩ Wɛ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na tagɩ nmʋ taanɩ te tɩn. Kʋntʋ tɩn, kwaanɩ n guli ba na tagɩ te tɩn sɩ n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ n na lagɩ n magɩ jara cɩga cɩga te tɩn.
54001019	Ta n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, sɩ n daarɩ n ta n kɩ kʋlʋ maama n na ye n bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn. Nɔɔna badonnǝ wʋra, ba ba sɛ sɩ ba taa kɩ kʋlʋ ba na ye nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn. Kʋntʋ ma pa ba daa warɩ ba da Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam.
54001020	Yimene dɩ Alɛsandrɩ mʋ tɔgɩ ba wʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ. Amʋ nan yagɩ-ba sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ sɩ ba na cam, sɩ ba daa yɩ ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ.
54002001	Woŋo kʋlʋ a na lagɩ a da yigǝ a ta tɩn mʋ tɩntʋ. Á maŋɩ sɩ á taá loori Wɛ á pa nɔɔna maama. Loori-na Wɛ sɩ DƖ taa nii ba baŋa nɩ, sɩ á daarɩ á taá kɩ DƖ le ba ŋwaanɩ.
54002002	Á taá loori Wɛ á paɩ pwa dɩdaanɩ dɩdɛɛra balʋ maama na jɩgɩ dam nɔɔna baŋa nɩ tɩn, sɩ kʋ pa dɩ́ taá zʋʋrɩ dɩ yazurǝ dɩ ni-ywǝm, sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá ŋwɩ nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn.
54002003	Kʋntʋ mʋ yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na lamma yɩ kʋ poli Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn wʋ.
54002004	Dɩntʋ mʋ lagɩ sɩ nɔɔna maama na vrɩm, sɩ ba kwǝri ba lwarɩ kʋlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn.
54002005	Wɛ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ wʋra. Wʋlʋ dɩ na fɔgɩ nabiinǝ dɩ Wɛ daanɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi Krisi wʋlʋ na yɩ nabiinu tɩn.
54002006	Wʋm mʋ sɛ o tɩ o ma ŋwɩ nɔɔna maama lwarɩm jɩnɩ, yɩ ba pa o maana maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lɩ tɩn.
54002007	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ pɛ a ji DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ, sɩ a tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝrǝ kam a brɩ nɔɔna. Cɩga mʋ a ŋɔɔna, sɩ kʋ daɩ vwan. Wɛ sɩɩnɩ DƖ tʋŋɩ-nɩ mʋ sɩ a taa brɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ, sɩ ba sɛ DƖ cɩga kam ba kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ.
54002008	Amʋ lagɩ sɩ jǝgǝ maama baara taa warɩ Wɛ. Ba na zǝŋi ba jɩa wɛɛnɩ sɩ ba warɩ Wɛ, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo mʋ, sɩ ba yɩ taa jɩgɩ ban-zɔŋɔ naa kantɔgɔ dɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ.
54002009	Amʋ nan ta lagɩ sɩ kaana dɩ ja ba tɩtɩ dɩ ba gwaarʋ vɔɔm, sɩ ba taa kwarɩ cavɩɩra ba zʋʋrɩ gwaarʋ tɩlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ ba tɩn. Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tiini ba kwɛ ba yum ba ja gaalɩ, naa ba zuli ba tɩtɩ dɩ nɩnwaŋa wǝǝnu, kʋ na yɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa naa kandwa-ŋʋna naa gwaarʋ tɩlʋ sǝbiǝ na damma tɩn.
54002010	Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba yɩ kaana balʋ na sɛ Wɛ cɩga cɩga tɩn.
54002011	Kaana maŋɩ sɩ ba taa je cɩm mʋ ba cǝgi balʋ na brɩ-ba Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa sɛ-ba.
54002012	Amʋ wʋ sɛ sɩ kaana taa brɩ baara naa ba taa te-ba. Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa je cɩm mʋ.
54002013	Bɛŋwaanɩ, Wɛ dɛɛn na kɩ nabiinǝ tɩn, DƖ kɩ Adam mʋ yigǝ, yɩ DƖ laan daarɩ DƖ kɩ Awa.
54002014	Kʋ dɛɛn daɩ Adam mʋ sʋtaanɩ ganɩ, kʋ yɩ kaanɩ wʋm mʋ dɩ ganɩ dɩ pa o vɩn Wɛ ni.
54002015	Kʋntʋ mʋ te kaana lʋrɩ dɩ cam, Wɛ nan wʋ́ vrɩ-ba, dɩ ba na sɛ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-poŋo yɩ ba jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ tɩn.
54003001	Taanɩ dɩntʋ sɩɩnɩ dɩ yɩ cɩga mʋ: «Nɔɔnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o ji Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu, kʋntʋ tu lagɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋm mʋ.»
54003002	Kʋntʋ, Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm mʋ nɔɔna maama tee nɩ. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ. O ta maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩrɩ o tɩtɩ, sɩ o taa waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana nɩ kʋ na maŋɩ te tɩn. O maŋɩ sɩ o taa jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ o sɔŋɔ nɩ. O maŋɩ sɩ o taa ye nɔɔna zaasɩm.
54003003	O nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ sa-nyɔrʋ naa najajarʋ naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ banɩ na lʋmma tɩn. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-yoŋo mʋ dɩ nɔɔnʋ maama. O nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ sǝbu-swǝn-nyɩm.
54003004	O maŋɩ sɩ o taa waɩ o nii o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ baŋa nɩ mʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o pa o biǝ sɛ-o dɩ zulǝ yalʋ na maŋɩ tɩn.
54003005	Bɛŋwaanɩ, nɔɔnʋ na warɩ o nii o tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ tiinǝ baŋa nɩ, oó kɩ ta mʋ o nii Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm baŋa nɩ?
54003006	Kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ nɔn-dʋʋrʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ o yɩ zaŋɩ o ba o zǝŋi o tɩtɩ, sɩ Wɛ di o taanɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ na di sʋtaanɩ taanɩ te tɩn.
54003007	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ tu maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm mʋ dɩ balʋ na ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ. Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ, nɔɔna wʋ́ goon-o yɩ o na cavɩɩra, yɩ o tʋ sʋtaanɩ cɩgɩrʋ tɩm wʋnɩ.
54003008	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnǝ bam dɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ tɩn mʋ. Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩ niǝ yale yale tiinǝ, naa ba taa yɩ sa-nyɔra, naa ba taa kɩ kampinǝ sɩ ba ma na wǝǝnu.
54003009	Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ ya na sǝgi yɩ Wɛ laan vɩɩrɩ-ba DƖ taanɩ dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn, ba na ye ba bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
54003010	Nɔɔnʋ na lagɩ sɩ o ji Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnu, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba da yigǝ ba maan-o mʋ ba nii, o na ba jɩgɩ wo-lɔŋɔ, sɩ ba laan pa o puli o tɩtʋŋa.
54003011	Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba kaana dɩ taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ tɩn mʋ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna. Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa yɩrɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔna taa jɩgɩ ba cɩga woŋo maama baŋa nɩ.
54003012	Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm zǝnzǝnnu maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ, sɩ o daarɩ o taa waɩ o nii o biǝ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ.
54003013	Bɛŋwaanɩ zǝnzǝnnu wʋlʋ maama na tʋŋɩ o tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ tɩn wʋ́ na zulǝ zanzan nɔɔna tee nɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o na baarɩ dɩ wʋpolo o na kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
54003014	Amʋ bʋŋɩ sɩ a ba nmʋ te lele. A nan pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ sɩ,
54003015	a na daanɩ fɩnfɩɩn, sɩ n wanɩ n lwarɩ n na wʋ́ ja Baŋa-Wɛ nɔɔna bam te. Bantʋ mʋ yɩ Zezi nɔɔna yɩ ba tɔgɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ. Bantʋ mʋ yɩ balʋ na kwaanɩ ba wǝli ba nii zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn baŋa nɩ, nɩnɛɛnɩ ywǝ na wǝli digǝ sɩ ka yɩ vi te tɩn.
54003016	Dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔgɩm yɩ wo-kamunu mʋ. Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ dɛɛn ya sǝgi mʋ, yɩ DƖ laan pa dɩ́ lwarɩ wʋlʋ wʋm DƖ na tʋŋɩ tɩn: Wʋntʋ mʋ jigi nabiinu o ba lʋgʋ baŋa. Wɛ Joro kʋm ma brɩ nɩ o yɩ cɩga tu. Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm ma na o zulǝ. Nɔɔna ma ja o kwǝrǝ ba zʋ dwi maama wʋ ba tɔɔlɩ. Lʋgʋ baŋa nabiinǝ ma sɛ-o. O ma zaŋɩ dɩ zulǝ o di Wɛ-sɔŋɔ.
54004001	-
54004002	Wɛ Joro kʋm brɩ dɩbam fasɩ nɩ, maŋa tiim nɩ nɔɔna badaara wʋ́ zaŋɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm. Pipiri-nyɩna balʋ na fɔ vwan tɩn mʋ wʋ́ ganɩ-ba ba pa ba yagɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn. Bantʋ wʋbʋŋa mʋ tɩga, kʋ pa ba yǝri nɩ ba na kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn ba lamma. Baá pa nɔɔna sɛ vwan yam ciciri na fɔɛ tɩn, yɩ ba daarɩ ba taa tɔgɩ sʋtaanɩ zaasɩm na yɩ te tɩn.
54004003	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ mʋ yǝni ba brɩ nɩ kʋ culǝ sɩ baarʋ di kaanɩ naa kaanɩ zʋ barʋ. Wʋdiiru tɩdonnǝ dɩ maa wʋra ba na brɩ nɩ kʋ culǝ sɩ nɔɔna di-tɩ. Nmʋ nan ye nɩ Wɛ mʋ kɩ wʋdiiru tɩm kʋntʋ, sɩ dɩbam balʋ na tɔgɩ-DƖ yɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam tɩn taá kɩ DƖ le tɩ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá di-tɩ.
54004004	Bɛŋwaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ tɩn lamma. Woŋo kʋlʋ Wɛ na pɛ dɩbam tɩn, dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kɩ DƖ le mʋ kʋ ŋwaanɩ, dɩ́ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ culi-kʋ.
54004005	Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ dɩbam Wɛ-loro kʋm mʋ kwɛ woŋo maama kʋ pa kʋ lana Wɛ yigǝ nɩ.
54004006	Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n ta wǝǝnu tɩntʋ mʋ n brɩ n ko-biǝ bam. N na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa n ta n yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋ-ŋʋm. N na sɩɩnɩ n sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam taanɩ dɩm dɩ zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga yɩ n maŋɩ n tɔgɩ-dɩ tɩn, nń bɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
54004007	Yɩ zaŋɩ n cǝgi sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri yɩ sɩ ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn. Nan tiini n kwaanɩ n ta n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ.
54004008	Dɩ́ ye nɩ, n na waarɩ n yɩra, kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ fɩnfɩɩn. Kʋ daarɩ, n nan na kwaanɩ n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ, kʋntʋ mʋ tiini kʋ jɩgɩ zǝnǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ. Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋʋ́ pa n na zǝnǝ zɩm ŋwɩa kam wʋnɩ, yɩ n daarɩ n na ŋwɩa kalʋ na lagɩ ka ba tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
54004009	Taanɩ dɩntʋ yɩ cɩga yɩ dɩ maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna sɛ-dɩ mʋ.
54004010	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Baŋa-Wɛ. Dɩntʋ mʋ yɩ nɔɔna maama Vɩrnʋ, kʋ na fɔgɩ kʋ dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na sɛ-DƖ tɩn.
54004011	Ta n brɩ nɔɔna bam wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ sɩ n zaasɩ-ba.
54004012	Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gooni-m n na yɩ bu tɩn ŋwaanɩ. N maŋɩ sɩ n ma n tɩtɩ mʋ n brɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam ba na wʋ́ ta kɩ te. Kʋ na yɩ nmʋ ni-ŋwaŋa dɩ n tɩtʋŋ-naga, dɩ n sono dɩ n na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, dɩ n wʋ-poŋo maama mʋ n maŋɩ sɩ n ma n brɩ-ba.
54004013	Ta n kwaanɩ n karɩmɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dɩ nɔɔna bam, sɩ n daarɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kam, sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kam a na wʋ́ ba tɩn.
54004014	Yɩ zaŋɩ n yagɩ pɛɛrɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na pɛ nmʋ, maŋa kalʋ DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam dɛɛn na tagɩ nmʋ taanɩ te yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa bam dɩ daŋɩ ba jɩa nmʋ baŋa nɩ ba warɩ Wɛ n ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
54004015	Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ n tiini n kwaanɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ n wʋ maama mʋ. Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔna maama taa naɩ nmʋ na ve yigǝ te tɩn.
54004016	Ta n yɩrɩ n tɩtɩ, sɩ n daarɩ n ta n yɩrɩ n zaasɩm dɩm na yɩ te tɩn dɩ. Kwaanɩ n zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ wʋnɩ, sɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ wʋ́ na vrɩm, yɩ n ta wʋ́ pa balʋ na cǝgi-m tɩn dɩ na vrɩm.
54005001	Yɩ zaŋɩ n bagɩ nankwɩan dɩ baarɩ. N maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-o nɩ n ko mʋ te. Kʋ na yɩ nɔn-dʋnnʋ, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n nyaana mʋ te.
54005002	Kʋ na yɩ kazɩna, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n niinǝ mʋ te. Kʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ, n maŋɩ sɩ n kwe-ba nɩ n nakwa mʋ te dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
54005003	Ta n zuli kadǝnǝ balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba ba jɩgɩ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, sɩ n ta n nii ba baŋa nɩ.
54005004	Kʋ daarɩ, kadǝm na jɩgɩ biǝ naa naarʋ, bantʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa nii-o, ba na yɩ o tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ tiinǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Mʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ zaasɩm dɩm na yɩ te tɩn. Kadǝm biǝ na zǝn-o kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa ba joori ba ŋwɩ ba tiinǝ jɩnɩ dɩ ba na yaarɩ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn. Kʋntʋ nan mʋ poli Wɛ wʋ.
54005005	Kaanɩ wʋlʋ na sɩɩnɩ o yɩ kadǝm yɩ o ba jɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ sɩ o taa nii o baŋa nɩ tɩn tiŋi o tɩɩna Wɛ baŋa nɩ mʋ. Tɩtɩɩ dɩ wɩa maama o tiini o warɩ Wɛ mʋ yɩ o loori zǝnǝ DƖ tee nɩ.
54005006	Kʋ daarɩ kadǝm wʋlʋ na lagɩ sɩ o taa ŋwɩ paweeni wʋnɩ tɩn maŋɩ o tɩ mʋ yɩ o ta beerǝ.
54005007	Nan pa ba maama lwarɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ ni nɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o na ba wo-lɔŋɔ o ta.
54005008	Nɔɔnʋ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ, kʋ na tiini kʋ dwe dɩdɩ dɩ o tɩtɩ digǝ tiinǝ, kʋntʋ tu yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ mʋ. O nan tiini o yɩ nɔn-balɔrɔ o dwe balʋ na maŋɩ ba ba tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn dɩ.
54005009	Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa ba pʋpʋnɩ kadǝm wʋlʋ na wʋ yi bɩna fusɩrdʋ tɩn n kɩ kadǝnǝ bam tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ. Wʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ o wǝli da tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o ban-zʋrɩ taa yɩ bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ mʋ.
54005010	O maŋɩ sɩ nɔɔna taa ye o tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ni nɩ lanyɩranɩ. O na nii o biǝ baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ, naa o na jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ, naa o na tu o tɩtɩ o zarɩ Wɛ nɔɔna bam nɛ, naa o na zǝni balʋ na wʋ cam wʋnɩ tɩn, yɩ o na kwaanɩ o tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama, abam waɩ á gar-o á wǝli da.
54005011	Kʋ daarɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn, abam wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á ga-ba á wǝli da. Bɛŋwaanɩ, bantʋ wʋbʋŋa daa na lǝni yɩ ba warɩ ba tɩtɩ ba ja, baá yagɩ ni dɩlʋ ba na goni dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn, yɩ ba daarɩ ba daa zʋ banna.
54005012	Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, ba bá na bʋra, bɛŋwaanɩ ba cɔgɩ ba dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ ba na goni dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn mʋ.
54005013	Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, á na pʋpʋnɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn á wǝli da, baá ji yawɔrɩ-nyɩna yɩ ba ta tʋlɩ sam. Kʋ nan daɩ kʋntʋ yɩranɩ, baá ji bɩbarɩ-nyɩna dɩ ŋwaŋ-yɔɔrʋ tiinǝ, yɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daɩ sɩ ba ya ŋɔɔnɩ tɩn.
54005014	Mʋ kʋ kuri amʋ bʋŋɩ nɩ kʋʋ́ ta lamma sɩ kadǝnǝ balʋ na yɩ ka-bwǝnǝ tɩn taa zʋʋrɩ banna sɩ ba lʋ biǝ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa nii ba tɩtɩ sam baŋa nɩ. Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ pa dɩbam dʋna daa bá na cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba ŋɔɔnɩ wo-lwaanʋ ba pa dɩbam.
54005015	Bɛŋwaanɩ kadǝnǝ badaara maŋɩ ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ, yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ sʋtaanɩ.
54005016	Baarʋ naa kaanɩ wʋlʋ na tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ yɩ kadǝnǝ wʋ o sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn, wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa nii ba baŋa nɩ. Kʋ daɩ sɩ o yagɩ-ba o pa Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm. O na yagɩ-ba kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ yaarɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam kʋ pa ba daa bá wanɩ ba nii kadǝnǝ balʋ na ba jɩgɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tɩn baŋa nɩ.
54005017	Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa balʋ na yɩ yigǝ tiinǝ yɩ ba nii Zezi nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn, ba maŋɩ sɩ ba na zulǝ kuni bɩle mʋ, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ balʋ na kwaanɩ ba tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ yɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn.
54005018	Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ wʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Nmʋ na jɩgɩ nabɩa n ma n nwanɩ wo-vaalʋ, yɩ kɩ tampɔgɔ ka ni nɩ.» Kʋ ta tagɩ kʋ wɩ: «Tɩntʋŋnʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa joŋi o ŋwɩɩrʋ mʋ.»
54005019	Nɔɔnʋ na tagɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋm nakwa bam wʋ nɔɔnʋ bɩtar-lwaŋa dɩ nmʋ, yɩ zaŋɩ n sɛ, kʋ na daɩ nɩ nɔɔna bale naa batɔ yi mʋ nɛ o kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩm.
54005020	Kʋ daarɩ nakwa balʋ na sɩɩnɩ ba kɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩn, sɩ n kaanɩ-ba ba maama yigǝ nɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa fʋʋnɩ ja badaara bam dɩ.
54005021	A nan lagɩ a kaanɩ-m mʋ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi yigǝ nɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtɩ malɛsɩ sɩm yigǝ nɩ, sɩ n yɔɔrɩ n sɛ kʋlʋ a na tagɩ tɩn. Yɩ kuri nɔɔna daanɩ, kɩ nɔɔnʋ maama te na maŋɩ tɩn.
54005022	Yɩ lɔgɩrɩ n daŋɩ n jɩa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ baŋa nɩ sɩ n pa o ji Wɛ tɩntʋŋnʋ. Yɩ zaŋɩ n pa nɔɔna kǝm-lwaanʋ loŋi-m. Fɔgɩ n ja n tɩtɩ dɩ wʋ-poŋo.
54005023	A lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ sɩ, n wʋ kʋm na yǝni kʋ wɔɛ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n ta n nyɔ sana fɩnfɩɩn sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ zǝni-m, sɩ n yɩ ta n nyɔ na yɩranɩ.
54005024	Nɔɔna badaara wo-lwaanʋ tiini tɩ naɩ dɩ yi mʋ jaja, yɩ ba daa ta wʋ di bantʋ taanɩ. Kʋ daarɩ babam wo-lwaanʋ nan wʋ́ ba tɩ na kʋ kwaga nɩ mʋ.
54005025	Kʋ nan ta yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ kǝm-laarʋ dɩ. Tɩ dɩ yɔɔrɩ tɩ naɩ dɩ yi mʋ jaja. Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, tɩlʋ na ba naɩ lanyɩranɩ tɩn dɩ bá wanɩ tɩ sǝgi.
54006001	Balʋ maama na yɩ gambɛ yɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ ba taa paɩ ba yum tiinǝ bam zulǝ zanzan mʋ. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o ŋɔɔnɩ o cɔgɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ dɩdaanɩ dɩbam zaasɩm dɩm.
54006002	Gambɛ sɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ ba paɩ ba yum tiinǝ balʋ dɩ na tɔgɩ Wɛ tɩn, kʋ wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa gooni-ba ba na yɩ ba ko-biǝ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ mʋ ba pa-ba, bɛŋwaanɩ ba yum tiinǝ balʋ ba na tʋŋɩ ba paɩ tɩn dɩ yɩ ba ko-bu-sonnu mʋ ba na tɔgɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ ba nii ba baŋa nɩ lanyɩranɩ. Nii wǝǝnu tɩlʋ n na maŋɩ sɩ n brɩ nɔɔna bam sɩ ba taa kɩ tɩn.
54006003	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ maama na brɩ zaasɩm dɩdoŋ, yɩ o wʋ sɛ sɩ o tɔgɩ dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam dɩdaanɩ Wɛ cwǝ-laa zaasɩm dɩm,
54006004	kʋntʋ tu kɩ fɔŋɔ mʋ yɩ o yǝri kʋlʋkʋlʋ. Wʋntʋ doŋ tiini o lagɩ sɩ o taa magɩ kantɔgɔ mʋ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn baŋa nɩ. Kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ dwi mʋ pa nɔɔna wʋrʋ gwɩɩna dɩ ba donnǝ, yɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna jaanɩ daanɩ yɩ ba twɩ daanɩ, yɩ ba ta bʋŋɩ lwarɩm ba pa daanɩ,
54006005	yɩ ba niǝ dɩ ba maŋɩ daanɩ. Ba yǝni ba kɩ kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ, yɩ ba daa ba tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ. Kʋ maa paɩ ba bʋŋɩ nɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm yɩ woŋo kʋlʋ ba na wʋ́ na nadunni ka wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
54006006	Kʋ nan sɩɩnɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm jɩgɩ nadunni zanzan kʋ paɩ balʋ na kɩ wʋpolo dɩ kʋlʋ ba na jɩgɩ tɩn.
54006007	Ba na lʋgɩ dɩbam tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ jaanɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ́ ba lʋgʋ baŋa. Dɩ́ nan ta bá wanɩ dɩ́ ja kʋlʋkʋlʋ dɩ dɩ́ viiri.
54006008	Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ na jɩgɩ dɩ́ ni-wʋdiu dɩ́ di yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ gwaarʋ dɩ́ zʋʋra, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo sɩ tɩntʋ maŋɩ dɩbam.
54006009	Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na lagɩ sɩ ba ji nadunǝ tɩn, sǝbu-laga mʋ yǝni ka ganɩ-ba kʋ pa ba tʋ maŋɩm wʋnɩ. Kʋ maa paɩ ba fra zʋʋrɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ zanzan tɩlʋ na wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ba tɩn. Kǝm dɩm kʋntʋ mʋ yǝni kʋ paɩ ba yáalɩ ba cɔgɩ.
54006010	Bɛŋwaanɩ sǝbu-swǝnǝ mʋ yɩ lwarɩm dwi maama pulim je. Nɔɔna badaara wʋra ba na pɛ ba wʋbʋŋa zʋ sǝbu-lagɩ yɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, kʋ pa ba jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ ba yaarɩ zanzan.
54006011	Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ Timoti na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔnʋ tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n ja n tɩtɩ mʋ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ. Kɩ n tɩtɩ n kɩ daanɩ sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga, sɩ n sɛ Wɛ ni, sɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ, sɩ n ta n jɩgɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa dɩ wʋ-bono.
54006012	Pʋʋrɩ n yɩra n ta n tɔgɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ nmʋ wʋ́ joŋi ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ. Ŋwɩa kam kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ bǝŋi-m sɩ n ba n joŋi, dɩ nmʋ dɛɛn na zaŋɩ n zɩgɩ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm yigǝ nɩ n pa ba lwarɩ nɩ nmʋ tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam tɩn.
54006013	Zezi Krisi tɩtɩ dɛɛn zɩgɩ Pɔnsɩ Pilatɩ yigǝ nɩ o pa o lwarɩ nɩ wʋm tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam mʋ. A nan lagɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ Zezi yigǝ nɩ, dɩdaanɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na paɩ woŋo dwi maama ŋwɩa tɩn yigǝ nɩ,
54006014	nɩ n maŋɩ sɩ n sɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ sɩ n yɩ yagɩ-ka dɩ fɩnfɩɩn dɩ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o na n wo-lɔŋɔ o ta, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi dɛ dɩm dɩbam Yuutu Zezi Krisi na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
54006015	Maŋa kalʋ na maŋɩ tɩn na yiǝ, Wʋpolo Tu Baŋa-Wɛ dɩlʋ yɩranɩ na yɩ dam-fɔrɔ tu tɩn laan wʋ́ pa Zezi Krisi joori o ba. Wɛ mʋ yɩ pwa maama Pɛ dɩ yum tiinǝ maama Yuutu.
54006016	Dɩntʋ yɩranɩ mʋ ŋwɩ maŋa kalʋ na ba jɩgɩ pulim dɩ gurim tɩn. DƖ nan zʋʋrɩ pooni dɩlʋ na tiini dɩ daga tɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ bá wanɩ o twɛ da. Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ tǝrǝ o na nɛ-DƖ, yɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan daa ta bá wanɩ o na-DƖ. Dɩntʋ mʋ maŋɩ tiǝ dɩ zulǝ dɩ dam dɩlʋ na ba ti tɩn. Amina.
54006017	Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na yɩ nadunǝ lʋgʋ kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba yɩ taa bʋŋɩ kamunni ba pa ba tɩtɩ. Ba wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tɩɩgɩ ba jɩjɩgɩrʋ tɩm, bɛŋwaanɩ tɩ nyɩ dɩ viu mʋ. Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba kwe ba wʋbʋŋa maama ba pa Wɛ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ dɩntʋ mʋ yǝni DƖ pa dɩbam woŋo maama yɩ kʋ yi dɩbam, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ wʋpolo dɩ́ di ywǝǝni.
54006018	Kaanɩ-ba sɩ ba taa kɩ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ ba tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ji ba nadunni, sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-yoŋo sɩ ba taa ma ba wǝǝnu tɩm ba zǝni daanɩ.
54006019	Ba na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba tiŋi ba nadunni cɩga cɩga mʋ ba pa ba tɩtɩ jwa ŋwaanɩ, yɩ kʋʋ́ pa ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
54006020	A bu Timoti, fɔgɩ n ta n nii kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ. Ja n tɩtɩ dɩdaanɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ nɔɔna na bʋŋɩ nɩ tɩ yɩ yi-pʋrʋ yɩ tɩ daɩ tɩn. Tɩntʋ mʋ yɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn dɩdaanɩ taana yalʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
54006021	Nɔɔna badaara mʋ wʋra ba na paɩ ba jɩgɩ yi-pʋrʋ kʋm kʋntʋ, yɩ kʋ laan pa ba ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ. Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
55001001	Amʋ Pooli na yɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ Timoti. Wɛ tɩtɩ mʋ kuri-nɩ dɩ DƖ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a taa yɩ DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ, sɩ a pa nɔɔna lwarɩ nɩ Wɛ goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba ŋwɩa, ba na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
55001002	Nmʋ Timoti yɩ a bu-sono mʋ. Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ duri nmʋ ŋwaŋa.
55001003	Amʋ nan kɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ a na tʋŋɩ a pa-DƖ yɩ a ye a bɩcarɩ nɩ nɩ kʋ lamma tɩn le, nɩ a nabaara bam dɩ dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ ba pa-DƖ te tɩn. A maa yǝni a loori-DƖ maŋa maama wɩa dɩ tɩtɩɩ, yɩ a guli nmʋ gulǝ a Wɛ-loro kʋm wʋnɩ.
55001004	A guli nmʋ yi-na bam woŋo dɩbam na pwɛ da-tee nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a tiini a lagɩ sɩ a joori a ba a na nmʋ, sɩ a wanɩ a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ.
55001005	Amʋ wʋ swe nɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi cɩga cɩga, nɩ n nu-nakwɩ Loyisi dɩ n nu Yunisi dɩ dɛɛn na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi te tɩn. A ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ nmʋ dɩ yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ.
55001006	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a lagɩ sɩ n guli a dɛɛn na daŋɩ a jɩa nmʋ baŋa nɩ yɩ Wɛ pa nmʋ zǝnǝ yalʋ tɩn. Nan fɔgɩ n nii pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ baŋa nɩ, sɩ n ta n ma n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam lanyɩranɩ.
55001007	Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩ́ daa bá ta kwarɩ fʋʋnɩ, Wɛ na zǝni dɩbam dɩ DƖ Joro kʋm tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ paɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ baarɩ dɩ sono, yɩ dɩ́ waɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ dɩ́ jaana.
55001008	Yɩ ta n kwarɩ cavɩɩra sɩ n ta dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi cɩga kam n brɩ nɔɔna. Yɩ pa fʋʋnɩ zʋ-m dɩ ba na kɩ amʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ n dɩ sɛ yaara mʋ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam zaasɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ wʋ́ pa-m baarɩ yaara yam wʋnɩ.
55001009	Dɩntʋ mʋ vrɩ dɩbam yɩ DƖ bǝŋi dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ DƖ nɔɔna, sɩ kʋ daɩ dɩbam tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ yɩ DƖ tɩtɩ mʋ maŋɩ DƖ lɩ wʋbʋŋa kʋ loori lʋgʋ pulim, sɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ dɩ́ na vrɩm zaanɩ.
55001010	Wɛ laan mʋ nan pɛ dɩ́ na DƖ zaanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi na tu lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ cɔgɩ tʋʋnɩ dam, yɩ o daarɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ o pa dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kalʋ na bá ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
55001011	Wɛ nan mʋ pɛ a ji DƖ tɩntʋŋnʋ sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ DƖ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ, sɩ a brɩ nɔɔna DƖ cɩga kam.
55001012	Kʋ yɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a nɛ yaara yam kʋntʋ. A nan ba kwarɩ cavɩɩra. Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ye nɩ a kɩ a wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi mʋ, yɩ a ye nɩ wʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o nii kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ a jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ taa ve dɛ dɩm o na wʋ́ joori o ba tɩn.
55001013	Nan fɔgɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ a na maŋɩ a brɩ nmʋ tɩn sɩ n ma n zaasɩ nɔɔna, sɩ n kwǝri n ta n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono n na ŋwɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
55001014	Fɔgɩ n ta n nii cɩga kalʋ Wɛ na kwe DƖ kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn baŋa nɩ dɩ Wɛ Joro kʋlʋ na ŋwɩ dɩbam wʋnɩ tɩn dam, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ cɔgɩ-ka.
55001015	Nmʋ maŋɩ n ye nɩ Wɛ nɔɔna balʋ maama na zʋʋrɩ Azi tɩɩnɩ dɩm nɩ tɩn joori amʋ kwaga nɩ, kʋ wǝli dɩ Fizɛɛlɩ dɩ Ɛrmɔzɛnɩ.
55001016	Wɛ nan wʋ́ duri Onisifɔɔrɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama ŋwaŋa, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋntʋ mʋ yǝni o paɩ a jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru. Ba na kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, o wʋ kwarɩ cavɩɩra sɩ o zǝni-nɩ.
55001017	O nan na tu o yi Rom maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o tiini o kwaanɩ o beeri amʋ je mʋ taan, yɩ o laan ba o na-nɩ.
55001018	Wɛ nan wʋ́ duri o ŋwaŋa sarɩya dɛ dɩm nɩ. Nmʋ maŋɩ n ye lanyɩranɩ Onisifɔɔrɩ na tiini o zǝni amʋ te Efɛɛzɩ nɩ tɩn.
55002001	A bu Timoti, ta n zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ Zezi Krisi na pɛ nmʋ yu-yoŋo yɩ n ŋwɩ dɩd-o tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
55002002	Cɩga kalʋ maama a na yǝni a brɩ nmʋ nɔn-kɔgɔ kʋm maama yigǝ nɩ tɩn, n dɩ ma-ka n brɩ nɔɔna balʋ na tɔgɩ cɩga tɩn, sɩ ba dɩ daa wanɩ ba maa brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ ba wǝli da.
55002003	Nmʋ na tʋŋɩ n pa Zezi Krisi tɩn, n maŋɩ sɩ n dɩ sɛ yaara mʋ, nɩnɛɛnɩ pamaŋ-ŋʋm na sɛ yaara te tɩn.
55002004	Nɔɔnʋ na yɩ pamaŋnʋ yɩ o lagɩ sɩ o poli o yuutu wʋ, o daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daɩ pamaŋna tɩtʋŋa tɩn.
55002005	Kʋ ta nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ na kwaanɩ o duri o di yigǝ te tɩn mʋ. O na maŋɩ o duri o di yɩ o wʋ dɛ durim dɩm cwǝŋǝ cɩga cɩga, ba bá pa-o yigǝ tu pɛɛrɩ dɩm.
55002006	Kʋ ta nyɩ dɩ nɔɔnʋ na yɩ valʋ yɩ o tiini o tʋŋɩ te tɩn mʋ. Wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ sɩ o da yigǝ o na o wo-vaalʋ tɩm biǝ.
55002007	Bʋŋɩ n nii a na tɛ kʋlʋ tɩn. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi wʋ́ pa n lwarɩ woŋo maama kuri n ti.
55002008	Ta n guli Zezi Krisi na yɩ Pɛ Davidi dwi tu tɩn gulǝ. Wʋntʋ mʋ bi o yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, nɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kalʋ a na yǝni a tɔɔlɩ tɩn na brɩ te tɩn.
55002009	Amʋ na tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn mʋ pɛ a wʋ yaara wʋnɩ, yɩ ba vɔ-nɩ dɩ capʋnnʋ nɩ a yɩ ŋwɩɩnʋ mʋ te. Ba nan bá wanɩ ba cɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam sɩ ka yɩ jagɩ.
55002010	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ a sɛ yaara dwi maama, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ wǝli nɔɔna balʋ Wɛ na kuri sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn, sɩ ba tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ ba na vrɩm dɩ zulǝ yalʋ na bá ti tɩn.
55002011	Taanɩ dɩlʋ a na lagɩ a ta tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ: Dɩ́ na tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi dɩ́ tɩ, dɩ́ ta wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ na ŋwɩa.
55002012	Dɩ́ na fɔgɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ cam wʋnɩ, dɩ́ wʋ́ tɔgɩ dɩd-o dɩ́ di paarɩ. Dɩ́ nan na vɩ-o, o dɩ wʋ́ vɩn dɩbam mʋ.
55002013	Dɩbam nan na maŋɩ dɩ́ ba jɩgɩ cɩga, wʋntʋ ta yɩ cɩga tu mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋm ba joori o kwanɩ o ni.
55002014	Ta n guli amʋ zaasɩm dɩm n brɩ Zezi nɔɔna bam, sɩ n daarɩ n kaanɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ Wɛ yɩrɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa magɩ kantɔgɔ kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn bɩtarɩ baŋa nɩ, sɩ kʋ cɔgɩ balʋ dɩ na cǝgi tɩn wʋbʋŋa mʋ.
55002015	Kwaanɩ n tʋŋɩ dɩ yawala sɩ kʋ poli Wɛ wʋ, sɩ cavɩɩra yɩ ja-m DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ kʋlʋ n na tʋŋɩ tɩn, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ta n brɩ nɔɔna Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ.
55002016	Ja n tɩtɩ dɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ na ba wǝli Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɩn. Balʋ na ŋɔɔnɩ-sɩ tɩn paɩ nɔɔna fɔgɩ ba joori ba maŋɩ kwaga nɩ mʋ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
55002017	Ba na karɩ ba brɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn, tɩ wʋ́ loŋi tɩ jagɩ je maama, nɩnɛɛnɩ nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ nasɩncɔgɔ yɩ kʋ woori kʋ wǝli da te tɩn. Yimene dɩ Filɛtɩ mʋ tɔgɩ ba wʋ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋnɩ.
55002018	Ba tusi cɩga cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ yɩ ba tɛ ba wɩ, Wɛ daa bá bi nɔɔna DƖ pa ba yagɩ tʋʋnɩ, sɩ twa biim maŋɩ kʋ kɛ. Ba zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ ma pa balʋ na sɛ Wɛ tɩn badonnǝ wʋbʋŋa joori ya lǝni.
55002019	Kʋ daarɩ balʋ na yɔɔrɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn wʋbʋŋa ba zaɩ. Bantʋ nyɩ dɩ digǝ kuri mʋ Wɛ na fɔgɩ DƖ cwi lanyɩranɩ. Kuri dɩm kʋntʋ ba gɔɛ, yɩ kʋ pʋpʋnɩ da kʋ wɩ: «Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ye balʋ na yɩ o nɔɔna tɩn.» Kʋ ta pʋpʋnɩ kʋ wɩ: «Wʋlʋ maama na sɛ nɩ o yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔnʋ tɩn maŋɩ sɩ o yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ mʋ.»
55002020	Kʋ nyɩ dɩ sɔ-fɔrɔ wʋnɩ kabǝli dɩ zwɩ dwi tǝri tǝri na wʋra te tɩn mʋ. Sɩdonnǝ yɩ can-na mʋ ba mɛ ba kɩ, dɩ sǝbu-sɩŋa. Sɩntʋ yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm mʋ. Sɩdonnǝ maa yɩ dɛ naa dɔgɔ mʋ ba mɛ ba kɩ, yɩ ba maɩ sɩntʋ mʋ ba tʋŋa.
55002021	Kʋ brɩ nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na jɩgɩ o tɩtɩ dɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm kʋntʋ, kʋ tu wʋ́ ta yɩ lʋnnɩ nyɩm mʋ Wɛ tee nɩ. O yɩ wʋlʋ na kwe o tɩtɩ o kɩ o yuutu wʋm jɩŋa nɩ yɩ o jɩgɩ kuri o pa-o tɩn mʋ. O maŋɩ sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ maama o yuutu wʋm na lagɩ tɩn mʋ.
55002022	Kʋntʋ tɩn, cʋ n tɩtɩ dɩ kǝm-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ nɔn-dʋnnʋ wʋbʋŋa na yǝni ya zʋʋrɩ tɩn, sɩ n daarɩ n kwaanɩ n tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ wʋ-zuru, sɩ n ta n tɔgɩ dɩ balʋ bɩcara na lana yɩ ba sɛ nɩ ba yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nɔɔna tɩn.
55002023	Fɔgɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ jwǝri kantɔgɔ kʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn. Bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye nɩ kʋ tui kʋ guri dɩ najara mʋ.
55002024	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ nan na yɩ dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ najajarʋ. O maŋɩ sɩ o taa nɩgɩ nɔɔna maama lanyɩranɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o brɩ-ba cɩga dɩ wʋ-zuru.
55002025	O nan maŋɩ sɩ o zaasɩ balʋ na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn dɩ wʋ-bono mʋ, sɩ kʋ waɩ kʋ kɩ sɩ Wɛ pa ba lǝni ba wʋbʋŋa sɩ ba joori ba sɛ DƖ cɩga kam.
55002026	Kʋntʋ tɩn, ba swan laan wʋ́ joori yɩ ba wanɩ ba vrɩ ba tɩtɩ sʋtaanɩ jɩŋa nɩ, dɩ ya na jaanɩ-ba nɩ cɩkʋ te yɩ dɩ pa ba kɩ dɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn.
55003001	Ta n ye nɩ lʋgʋ tiim maŋa nɩ lɛɛrʋ zanzan wʋ́ ba lʋgʋ baŋa.
55003002	Kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ nɔɔna wʋ́ ta wʋra ba na lagɩ wǝǝnu ba tɩtɩ zǝnǝ yɩranɩ má ŋwaanɩ, yɩ baá ta yɩ sǝbu-swǝn-nyɩna dɩ kamun-nyɩna, yɩ baá ta tee ba tɩtɩ. Nɔɔna wʋ́ ta twɩ daanɩ yɩ ba ba sɛ ba tiinǝ niǝ, yɩ ba bá zuli balʋ na kɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ tɩn. Baá ta yɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ yɩ ba ba nɩgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ nyɩm.
55003003	Nɔɔna bá ta soe daanɩ, yɩ ba bá ta jɩgɩ da-ŋwaŋa. Baá ta yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna yɩ ba ba lagɩ sɩ ba ja ba tɩtɩ, baá ta yɩ wʋ-lʋn-nyɩna, yɩ baá ta culi wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lamma tɩn.
55003004	Nɔɔna wʋ́ ta tusi ba cilonnǝ, yɩ ba bá ta zuri ba yɩra dɩ lwarɩm kǝm. Baá ta magɩ ba nyɔɔna ba brɩ ba tɩtɩ kamunni. Baá ta soe ba wʋbʋŋa wǝǝnu ba dwe Baŋa-Wɛ.
55003005	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ wʋ́ ta kɩ nɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ te, yɩ Wɛ dam nan tǝri ba tee nɩ. Fɔgɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ.
55003006	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ badaara yǝni ba sǝgi ba zʋʋrɩ sam mʋ ba ganɩ kaana balʋ na yɩ ka-kayɛ tɩn ba pa ba wʋbʋŋa cɔga. Kaana bam kʋntʋ wʋ cɔgɩ dɩ ba kǝm-balwaarʋ zanzan, yɩ ba wʋbʋŋa paɩ ba tɔgɩ woŋo kʋlʋ maama ba fra na zʋ tɩn.
55003007	Kaana bam kʋntʋ tiini ba kwaanɩ ba zaasɩ mʋ maŋa maama, yɩ ba nan ba fɔgɩ ba lwarɩ cɩga.
55003008	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ kǝm dɩm nyɩ dɩ Zanɛsɩ dɩ Zambrɛsɩ dɛɛn na vɩn Moyisi ni faŋa faŋa te tɩn mʋ. Ba dɩ vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam mʋ. Ba jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-balwaarʋ mʋ, yɩ ba Wɛ tɔgɩm dɩm yɩ kafɛ.
55003009	Ba nan daa bá wanɩ ba vu yigǝ dɩ ba gana yam. Bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔna maama wʋ́ ba lwarɩ ba jwǝrim dɩm jaja, nɩnɛɛnɩ kʋ dɛɛn na kɩ Zanɛsɩ dɩ Zambrɛsɩ te tɩn.
55003010	Kʋ nan na yɩ nmʋ Timoti, n maŋɩ n ye amʋ zaasɩm dɩm dɩ a ŋwɩa dɩ a wʋbʋŋa na yɩ te tɩn. Nmʋ nan ta ye a na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, yɩ n ta ye a na jɩgɩ wʋ-zuru dɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa dɩ te tɩn.
55003011	Nmʋ nan ta ye nɔɔna na bɛɛsɩ-nɩ yɩ a yaarɩ te tɩn. Nmʋ ye wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama na kɩ amʋ Antɩɔsɩ nɩ dɩ Yikon dɩ Lisitri nɩ, yɩ dɩ kʋ dɩ, a ta wʋ yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam. Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan mʋ vrɩ-nɩ yaara yam kʋntʋ maama wʋnɩ.
55003012	Kʋntʋ, balʋ maama na lagɩ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ cɩga tɩn dɩ wʋ́ na bɛɛsɩm.
55003013	Kʋ daarɩ, kʋ na yɩ nɔn-balwaarʋ dɩ kampin-nyɩna bam, bantʋ lwarɩm dɩm wʋ́ tiini dɩ puli kʋ ja gaalɩ. Baá ta ganɩ nɔɔna, yɩ baá ganɩ ba tɩtɩ dɩ.
55003014	Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ nmʋ, yɔɔrɩ n ta n tɔgɩ cɩga kalʋ nmʋ na maŋɩ n lwarɩ yɩ n kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ ka tɩn, bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye balʋ dɛɛn na brɩ-m wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ tɩn wʋ lanyɩranɩ.
55003015	N biini nɩ mʋ n maŋɩ n ye Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn. Zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ vɩɩrɩ-m yɩ n na swan yalʋ na wʋ́ pa n na vrɩm, n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
55003016	Kʋlʋ maama na pʋpʋnɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ Wɛ Joro mʋ pɛ dɩbam yɩ kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ pa dɩbam, sɩ kʋ taa brɩ nɔɔna cɩga, naa kʋ brɩ-ba nɩ ba tusi, naa kʋ kwe-ba sɩ ba da cwǝŋǝ, naa kʋ zaasɩ-ba ba na wʋ́ ta tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ te tɩn,
55003017	sɩ dɩbam balʋ na yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna tɩn laan yɔɔrɩ dɩ́ maŋɩ fasɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama.
55004001	Timoti, a lagɩ a ta nmʋ Wɛ dɩ Zezi Krisi yigǝ nɩ, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ta n tɔɔlɩ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam. Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ ba o di naŋʋna dɩ twa maama sarɩya tɩn. Oó joori o ba o di paarɩ nɔɔna tɩtarɩ nɩ.
55004002	Kʋntʋ, n maŋɩ sɩ n ta n tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam. Nɔɔna na cǝgi naa ba zɩ ba cǝgi dɩ, sɩ n ta n kwaanɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kam. Nan pa ba lwarɩ nɩ ba tusi mʋ sɩ ba joori ba tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ, sɩ n kaanɩ-ba, sɩ n daarɩ n pa ba taa jɩgɩ baarɩ, sɩ n ta n brɩ-ba lanyɩranɩ dɩ wʋ-zuru zanzan.
55004003	Bɛŋwaanɩ maŋa wʋ́ ba, yɩ nɔɔna daa bá sɛ ba taa cǝgi zaasɩm dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga tɩn. Ba laan wʋ́ daarɩ ba taa tɔgɩ ba tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ te tɩn mʋ, yɩ baá kikili vwan karanyɩna tiinǝ zanzan sɩ ba taa brɩ-ba wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama ba na lagɩ sɩ ba taa ni tɩn.
55004004	Ba laan wʋ́ sɩn ba zwa sɩ ba yɩ taa cǝgi Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba daarɩ ba sɛ nabiinǝ sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn.
55004005	Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ n ja n tɩtɩ mʋ wǝǝnu maama wʋnɩ. Vɔ n wʋ yaara wʋnɩ. Kwaanɩ n ta n tʋŋɩ sɩ n pa nɔɔna lwarɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam. Tɩtʋŋɩ dɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ nmʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, sɩ n tʋŋɩ-dɩ lanyɩranɩ.
55004006	Kʋ nan na yɩ amʋ, amʋ ŋwɩa kam nyɩ nɩ ba na logi mun-na ba ma kɩ kaanɩm te tɩn mʋ. Kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ maŋa kam yiǝ sɩ a vu Wɛ te.
55004007	A na tʋŋɩ a pa Wɛ te tɩn nyɩ dɩ a kwaanɩ a duri sɩ a di yigǝ mʋ te. Amʋ kwaanɩ mʋ a pɩɩnɩ a tɩtɩ a duri taan a vu a yi kweelim je, yɩ a daa ta wʋ yagɩ Wɛ cɩga kam.
55004008	Kʋntʋ tɩn, amʋ pɛɛrɩ laan tigi Wɛ tee nɩ dɩ cǝgi-nɩ. Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na wʋ́ tɔgɩ cɩga o ma di nabiinǝ taanɩ tɩn. O ma wʋ́ kwe a pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ o pa-nɩ sarɩya dɛ dɩm nɩ. Kʋ nan daɩ amʋ yɩranɩ mʋ oó pa pɛɛrɩ dɩm kʋntʋ. Oó pa balʋ maama dɩ na so-o yɩ ba jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ oó joori o ba tɩn mʋ.
55004009	Nan kwaanɩ lanyɩranɩ sɩ n ba amʋ te lɩla.
55004010	Bɛŋwaanɩ Demasɩ yagɩ amʋ, o fra na tiini ya zʋ zɩm lʋgʋ baŋa wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩm tɩn ŋwaanɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o vu Tesaloniki mʋ. Kresan ma kɛ Galatɩ. Titi dɩ ma kɛ Dalɩmatɩ.
55004011	Luki yɩranɩ mʋ wʋ a tee nɩ. Nmʋ nan na maa n bɩɩna, sɩ n pa Marɩkɩ tɔgɩ o ba, bɛŋwaanɩ wʋntʋ wʋ́ wanɩ o wǝli-nɩ dɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
55004012	Kʋ daarɩ amʋ tʋŋɩ Tisiki Efɛɛzɩ nɩ mʋ.
55004013	Nmʋ na maa n bɩɩna, sɩ n kwe a gɔrɔ kʋm a na yagɩ Trʋasɩ nɩ Karɩpusi tee nɩ tɩn n ja n ba, dɩdaanɩ twaanʋ tɩm dɩ, kʋ na dwe dɩdɩ vara twaanʋ tɩlʋ ba na pʋpʋnɩ tɩ wʋnɩ ba pri tɩn.
55004014	Alɛsandrɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ yarʋ tɩn tiini o kɩ amʋ lwarɩm kʋ ja gaalɩ. Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan wʋ́ pa o na cam o kǝnǝ yam kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
55004015	N dɩ nan cʋ n tɩtɩ dɩd-o, bɛŋwaanɩ o kwaanɩ sɩ o cɔgɩ dɩbam na yǝni dɩ́ brɩ cɩga kalʋ tɩn mʋ.
55004016	Maŋa kalʋ a na puli sɩ a tʋlɩ a taanɩ dɩm sarɩya yam jǝgǝ kam nɩ tɩn, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ wʋ tu o zɩgɩ amʋ kwaga nɩ. Ba maama duri mʋ ba daarɩ amʋ yɩranɩ. Wɛ nan yɩ kwe ba taalɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ.
55004017	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan mʋ zǝni-nɩ, yɩ o pa-nɩ dam yɩ a ma wanɩ a tɔɔlɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, yɩ dwi-gɛ tiinǝ maama ni-ka. Kʋntʋ tɩn, Wɛ mʋ vrɩ amʋ tʋʋnɩ jɩŋa nɩ DƖ yagɩ.
55004018	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm nan wʋ́ vrɩ amʋ wo-lwaanʋ maama wʋnɩ, yɩ o daarɩ o ja-nɩ o vu o zʋ Wɛ paarɩ dɩm wʋnɩ dɩ yazurǝ. Wʋntʋ mʋ maŋɩ dɩ zulǝ maŋa maama. Amina.
55004019	Jɔɔnɩ Prisili dɩ Akwila n pa-nɩ, dɩdaanɩ Onisifɔɔrɩ dɩ o sɔŋɔ tiinǝ bam maama.
55004020	Erasɩtɩ maŋɩ Korɛntɩ nɩ mʋ. Kʋ daarɩ amʋ yagɩ Trofim Mileti nɩ, o na ba jɩgɩ yazurǝ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
55004021	Kwaanɩ n kɩ lɩla n ba kʋ loori waarʋ mɩmaŋa. Yubulusi dɩ Pudan dɩ Linusi dɩ Kloodɩa dɩ dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam maama jɔɔnɩ-m lanyɩranɩ.
55004022	Dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm wʋ́ ta wʋra dɩ nmʋ. Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
56001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ Wɛ gamba-sono dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩntʋŋnʋ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ sɩ a pa nmʋ Titi. Wɛ mʋ pɛ sɩ a pa balʋ DƖ na kuri sɩ ba taa yɩ DƖ nɔɔna tɩn taa jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ, sɩ ba kwǝri ba lwarɩ DƖ cɩga kam. Cɩga kam kʋntʋ nan mʋ paɩ nɔɔna ŋwɩ nɩ Wɛ na lagɩ te tɩn,
56001002	sɩ ba wanɩ ba taa jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ baá na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ. Kʋ na loori lʋgʋ pulim tɩn, mʋ Wɛ maŋɩ DƖ go ni sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam ŋwɩa kam kʋntʋ, yɩ DƖ bá kwanɩ DƖ ni.
56001003	Kʋ daarɩ ka maŋa kam na yi tɩn, Wɛ ma pa dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩm kʋntʋ kuri jaja. Kʋ yɩ kwǝrǝ kam kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ tɩn pɛ amʋ ni sɩ a taa tɔɔlɩ a brɩ nɔɔna.
56001004	Nmʋ Titi yɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ bu mʋ te, dɩ́ maama na jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa nmʋ yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
56001005	Amʋ dɛɛn na yagɩ nmʋ Krɛtɩ nɩ tɩn, kʋ yɩ sɩ n kwaanɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na daarɩ sɩ n kɩ tɩn mʋ. Zezi nɔɔna bam na wʋ tɩʋ kʋlʋ maama nɩ tɩn, sɩ n lɩ nakwa tiinǝ da, nɩnɛɛnɩ a na maŋɩ a ta dɩ nmʋ te tɩn.
56001006	Nmʋ na lɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ tɩn, o maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ wʋlʋ nɔɔna na bá ta jɩgɩ o yɩra taanɩ tɩn mʋ. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kaanɩ dɩdʋa yɩranɩ mʋ. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ o biǝ dɩ sɛ Wɛ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ nɔn-kayɛ dɩ banɩ-nyɩna.
56001007	Bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ wʋlʋ na nii Zezi nɔɔna bam tɩn taa yɩ wʋlʋ nɔɔna na bá ta jɩgɩ o yɩra taanɩ tɩn mʋ, Wɛ na kɩ DƖ nɔɔna bam wʋntʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. O wʋ maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ bɩyɩrɩ-nyɩm, naa nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ banɩ na lʋmma tɩn, naa sa-nyɔrʋ naa najajarʋ, naa wʋlʋ na kɩ kampinǝ sɩ o ma na wǝǝnu tɩn.
56001008	Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jeeri vǝrǝ lanyɩranɩ tɩn. O maŋɩ sɩ o taa yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm wʋlʋ na cʋ o tɩtɩ yɩ o tɔgɩ Wɛ dɩ cɩga yɩ o waɩ o tɩtɩ o jaana tɩn.
56001009	O maŋɩ sɩ o yɔɔrɩ o taa tɔgɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na yɩ cɩga, nɩ dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ brɩ abam te tɩn. Kʋntʋ, oó wanɩ o brɩ nɔɔna badonnǝ sɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam kʋntʋ, yɩ o daarɩ o pa balʋ na vɩn Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn lwarɩ nɩ ba tusi mʋ.
56001010	Bɛŋwaanɩ banɩ-nyɩna zanzan mʋ wʋ abam tee nɩ, ba na yǝni ba ŋɔɔnɩ bɩtarɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn ba ma ganɩ nɔɔna. Ba zanzan mʋ yɩ balʋ na tiini ba sɛ ba Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm tɩn.
56001011	Abam nan maŋɩ sɩ á pa ba pu ba niǝ mʋ dɩ ba zaasɩm dɩm kʋntʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ ba zaasɩm dɩm yǝni dɩ paɩ nɔɔna dɩ ba sɔŋɔ tiinǝ maama mʋ tusi Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ. Ba yǝni ba brɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba brɩ nɔɔna tɩn mʋ, ba ma ganɩ-ba ba joŋi sǝbu.
56001012	Krɛtɩ tiinǝ bam tɩtɩ yiyǝn-yeenu dɛɛn mʋ tagɩ o wɩ: «Krɛtɩ tiinǝ yǝni ba fɔ vwan mʋ maŋa maama. Ba nyɩ dɩ varɩ-balwaarʋ mʋ te, yɩ ba ta yɩ yawɔrɩ-nyɩna dɩ nɔn-kwǝǝlu dɩ.»
56001013	O nan na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ o taga. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ n maŋɩ sɩ n tiini n kaanɩ Krɛtɩ tiinǝ bam, sɩ kʋ pa ba yɔɔrɩ ba taa tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ,
56001014	sɩ ba daa yɩ sɛ Zwifǝ bam sɩnswalɩ sɩlʋ na ba jɩgɩ kuri tɩn, naa ba sɛ nabiinǝ tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa cullu tɩm ba na yagɩ cɩga kam yɩ ba daarɩ ba tɔgɩ tɩn.
56001015	Wʋlʋ maama na jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn, kʋlʋkʋlʋ ba jɩgɩ digiru wʋntʋ tee nɩ. Kʋ daarɩ wʋlʋ na vɩn Wɛ yɩ o ba jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn, kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ kʋ na lana wʋntʋ tee nɩ. Kʋntʋ tu wʋbʋŋa cɔgɩ mʋ, yɩ o daa yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn.
56001016	Nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ donnǝ nan tɛ ba wɩ, ba ye Wɛ mʋ, yɩ ba tɩtʋŋa laan yagɩ ya ba tɔgɩ Wɛ wʋbʋŋa. Ba yɩ banɩ-nyɩna mʋ, yɩ ba tiini ba kɩ lwarɩm kʋ ja gaalɩ. Ba warɩ kʋlʋ na lana tɩn ba kɩ.
56002001	Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ nmʋ Titi, ta n brɩ nɔɔna bam kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ cɩga zaasɩm dɩm tɩn.
56002002	Nmʋ maŋɩ sɩ n brɩ nankwɩn sɩ ba taa yɩrɩ ba tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ ba kwǝri ba taa yɩ balʋ nɔɔna na nɩgɩ-ba tɩn, sɩ ba taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ, sɩ ba yɔɔrɩ ba sɛ Zezi dɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ sono dɩ pu-dɩa.
56002003	Nan brɩ kazɩna sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ ba tɩtɩ sɩ kʋ pa Wɛ na zulǝ ba tee nɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa yɩ bɩbarɩ-nyɩna naa sa-nyɔra. Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa kwe nɔɔna kwiǝ yalʋ na lana tɩn mʋ.
56002004	Kʋntʋ mʋ baá wanɩ ba brɩ ka-bwǝnǝ ba na wʋ́ ta soe ba banna dɩ ba biǝ te tɩn,
56002005	sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ, sɩ ba yɩ taa kɩ digiru, sɩ ba kwǝri ba taa yɩ ka-yʋʋrʋ tɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ sɔŋɔ tɩtʋŋa lanyɩranɩ yɩ ba sɛ ba banna ni tɩn. Kʋntʋ, nɔɔna daa bá wanɩ ba yáalɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam.
56002006	Kʋ zɩ na yɩ nɔn-dʋnnʋ, sɩ n kwe-ba sɩ ba dɩ taa cʋ ba tɩtɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ.
56002007	Kʋ nan na yɩ nmʋ tɩtɩ, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ n tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ na wʋ́ brɩ nɔɔna sɩ ba dɩ tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ lanyɩranɩ tɩn, sɩ n daarɩ n brɩ-ba Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam lanyɩranɩ dɩ cɩga.
56002008	Pa n ni-taanɩ taa jɩgɩ cɩga, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ wanɩ o yáalɩ-dɩ. Kʋntʋ wʋ́ pa dɩbam dʋna na cavɩɩra, ba daa na bá na woŋo sɩ ba maa ŋɔɔnɩ ba cɔgɩ dɩbam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
56002009	N daarɩ n kwe gambɛ nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba sɛ ba tiinǝ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ pa ba tiinǝ bam wʋ poli. Ba yɩ vɩn ba tiinǝ bam ni.
56002010	Ba nan wʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba ŋɔ-ba. Ba maŋɩ sɩ ba tʋŋɩ lanyɩranɩ dɩ cɩga mʋ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna lwarɩ nɩ dɩbam Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn zaasɩm dɩm lamma.
56002011	Bɛŋwaanɩ, Wɛ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ sono kʋm na dagɩ zanzan te, sɩ kʋ pa nɔɔna maama wanɩ ba na vrɩm DƖ tee nɩ.
56002012	DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ brɩ dɩbam nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ yagɩ lwarɩm tɩtʋŋa maama dɩ lʋgʋ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ dɩ́ fra na zʋʋrɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ taá cʋ dɩ́ tɩtɩ, sɩ dɩ́ taá tɔgɩ cɩga cwǝŋǝ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ taá kwarɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ.
56002013	Kʋ nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ kʋntʋ mʋ, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna dɩ wʋpolo, sɩ dɩ́ cǝgi Zezi Krisi sɩ o joori o ba dɩ paarɩ zulǝ. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ dɩbam Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ kamunu yɩ o yɩ dɩ́ Vɩrnʋ tɩn.
56002014	Wʋntʋ mʋ sɛ o tɩ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ, sɩ o ma vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm dwi maama wʋnɩ, sɩ o daarɩ o fɔgɩ o kwɛ dɩ́ bɩcara sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩ o tɩtɩ nɔɔna, sɩ dɩ́ taá kwaanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna.
56002015	Nan ta n brɩ nɔɔna wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ, sɩ n daarɩ n kwe-ba, sɩ n kwǝri n kaanɩ-ba, nɩ Wɛ na pɛ nmʋ ni sɩ n kɩ te tɩn. Nan yɩ sɛ sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ gooni-m.
56003001	Guli n brɩ nɔɔna bam nɩ ba maŋɩ sɩ ba taa nɩgɩ ba tɩʋ kʋm yigǝ tiinǝ dɩ balʋ na yɩ dɩdɛɛra tɩn, sɩ ba taa sɛ ba ni. Ba nan maŋɩ sɩ ba taa tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna dwi maama mʋ.
56003002	Ba nan yɩ zaŋɩ ba twɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ, naa ba taa yɩ najajara. Kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba taa zuli nɔɔna mʋ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba taa jɩgɩ wʋ-bono dɩ nɔɔna maama.
56003003	Bɛŋwaanɩ dɩbam maama dɛɛn yɩ nayǝri-nyɩna mʋ, yɩ dɩ́ tusi, yɩ dɩ́ vɩn Wɛ ni. Dɩbam fra dɛɛn mʋ te dɩbam, yɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ wo-yɔɔrʋ tɩlʋ maama dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn. Dɩ́ maa yǝni dɩ́ jɩgɩ pu-sɩŋa dɩ wʋ-gʋʋ yɩ dɩ́ culi daanɩ.
56003004	Nan dɩ kʋ dɩ, Wɛ dɩlʋ na yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ tɩn brɩ jaja nɩ DƖ soe nabiinǝ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ DƖ vrɩ dɩbam lwarɩm wʋnɩ DƖ yagɩ.
56003005	Kʋ nan daɩ dɩbam na kɩ kǝm-laarʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ, kʋ yɩ Wɛ na yɩ ŋwaŋa tu tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ. DƖ ma pa DƖ Joro kʋm zarɩ wo-digiru tɩlʋ na wʋ dɩ́ bɩcara nɩ tɩn, yɩ DƖ daarɩ DƖ pa dɩbam wʋbʋŋ-dʋʋra, sɩ dɩ́ na ŋwɩ-dʋŋa DƖ tee nɩ.
56003006	Kʋ maa yɩ dɩbam Vɩrnʋ Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ mʋ Wɛ tʋŋɩ DƖ Joro kʋm DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ,
56003007	sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ na cɩga DƖ tee nɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ na Wɛ wo-laarʋ tɩm dɩ́ na yɩ DƖ biǝ yɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti DƖ tee nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
56003008	A na tagɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ tɩn yɩ cɩga mʋ. Kʋntʋ, a lagɩ sɩ n kwaanɩ n brɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ lanyɩranɩ, sɩ kʋ pa balʋ na sɛ Wɛ tɩn tiini ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ. Kʋntʋ mʋ lana yɩ kʋ jɩgɩ kuri kʋ paɩ nɔɔna maama.
56003009	Kʋ daarɩ n maŋɩ sɩ n cɩ n tɩtɩ dɩ kantɔgɔ dwi maama, kʋ na yɩ bɩtar-yɔɔrʋ baŋa nɩ dɩ dɩ́ kwǝ dwi natɔga kam baŋa nɩ dɩ Zwifǝ bam cullu tɩm baŋa nɩ, sɩ tɩ ba jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ tɩ yɩ kafɛ mʋ.
56003010	Nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na jaanɩ kampwara o tui nɔɔna tɩtarɩ nɩ tɩn, sɩ n kaanɩ kʋntʋ tu nɩnɛɛnɩ kuni bɩle te. O ta na wʋ sɛ nmʋ taanɩ dɩm, sɩ á cɩ á tɩtɩ dɩd-o.
56003011	Bɛŋwaanɩ nmʋ ye nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na yɩ kʋntʋ doŋ, o daa ba lagɩ sɩ o tɔgɩ cwǝŋǝ. O tusim dɩm mʋ brɩ nɩ o bá na bʋra Wɛ tee nɩ.
56003012	A lagɩ a tʋŋɩ Aritimasɩ naa Tisiki mʋ nmʋ tee nɩ. Ba wʋlʋ na yi nmʋ te tɩn, sɩ n kwaanɩ n ba amʋ te lɩla Nikopolisi nɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ a lɩ wʋbʋŋa sɩ a maŋɩ dáanɩ mʋ sɩ waarʋ tɩm maŋa kɛ.
56003013	Nan kwaanɩ n wǝli Zenasɩ wʋlʋ na yɩ bɩtar-yeenu tɩn dɩ Apolɔsɩ ba cwǝŋǝ kam vǝŋǝ ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n pa-ba kʋlʋ maama na muri-ba tɩn.
56003014	Pa dɩ́ ko-biǝ bam taa ye nɩ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ ba tiini ba kwaanɩ ba taa kɩ kǝm-laarʋ mʋ, sɩ ba wanɩ ba zǝni balʋ na maŋɩ zǝnǝ tɩn. Kʋntʋ mʋ wʋ́ pa ba ŋwɩa taa jɩgɩ kuri nɔɔna maama tee nɩ.
56003015	Dɩ́ ko-biǝ balʋ na wʋ amʋ tee nɩ tɩn maama jɔɔnɩ nmʋ. Jɔɔnɩ balʋ maama na sɛ Zezi yɩ ba yɩ dɩbam cilon-sonnu tɩn n pa dɩbam. Wɛ wʋ́ pa abam maama yu-yoŋo.
57001001	Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn mʋ pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ, yɩ dɩ́ ko-bu Timoti wʋ amʋ tee nɩ. Dɩ́ pʋpʋnɩ dɩ́ pa nmʋ Filimɔn, n na yɩ dɩbam ciloŋ-sono yɩ n tɔgɩ dɩ dɩbam n tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa tɩn mʋ.
57001002	Dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ-m, yɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ dɩ́ ko-bu-kana Apɩa, dɩ Arisipi wʋlʋ na wǝli dɩ dɩbam o na cam Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ jɔɔnɩ Zezi kɔgɔ kʋlʋ na yǝni kʋ jeeri daanɩ nmʋ sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn maama.
57001003	Dɩ́ Ko Wɛ dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yazurǝ dɩ yu-yoŋo.
57001004	Maŋa maama amʋ na yǝni a loori Wɛ, a guli nmʋ gulǝ DƖ yigǝ nɩ, yɩ a kɩ DƖ le nmʋ ŋwaanɩ.
57001005	Bɛŋwaanɩ amʋ ni nɩ n jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi yɩ n soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam maama lanyɩranɩ.
57001006	Wɛ wʋ́ pa nmʋ na jɩgɩ wǝl-dɔnɔ kʋlʋ dɩ dɩbam n na kɩ n wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Zezi Krisi tɩn pa n wanɩ n lwarɩ wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ maama Wɛ na kɩ DƖ pa dɩbam Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
57001007	A ko-bu-sono, nmʋ na soe Wɛ nɔɔna bam te tɩn mʋ paɩ a wʋ poli zanzan, yɩ kʋ pa a jɩgɩ baarɩ, bɛŋwaanɩ n wǝli Wɛ nɔɔna bam yɩ n pa ba na baarɩ dɩ wʋpolo.
57001008	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ amʋ lagɩ a loori nmʋ sɩ n kɩ kʋlʋ na maŋɩ sɩ n kɩ tɩn mʋ. Amʋ ya jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a da Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ a pa nmʋ ni, sɩ n lwarɩ n na wʋ́ kɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
57001009	A nan lagɩ sɩ a loori-m dɩ sono mʋ. Amʋ Pooli wʋlʋ na yɩ nankwɩan yɩ ba kɩ-nɩ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ lele kʋntʋ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn,
57001010	a lagɩ a loori-m nmʋ gambaa Onisim ŋwaanɩ mʋ. A na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ tɩn, o tu amʋ te, yɩ a brɩ-o Wɛ cɩga kam yɩ o sɛ. Kʋntʋ tɩn, wʋntʋ laan nyɩ nɩ a tɩtɩ bu mʋ te.
57001011	O dɛɛn na tʋŋɩ o pa nmʋ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o wʋ pɛ n na nyɔɔrɩ. Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, o laan jɩgɩ nyɔɔrɩ o pa amʋ dɩ nmʋ maama.
57001012	A lagɩ a tʋŋ-o sɩ o joori o ba nmʋ te, wʋntʋ yɩ a tɩtɩ bɩcarɩ mʋ.
57001013	Amʋ na wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam ŋwaanɩ tɩn, a yaá ta lagɩ sɩ o maŋɩ a tee nɩ mʋ, sɩ o lǝni nmʋ yuu nɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o pa-nɩ.
57001014	A nan ba lagɩ sɩ a kɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ yɩ nmʋ na wʋ sɛ. A na kɩ kʋntʋ, kʋʋ́ ta yɩ nɩ a fɩn nmʋ sɩ n wǝli-nɩ, sɩ kʋ daɩ n tɩtɩ wʋbʋŋa.
57001015	Onisim na duri o yagɩ nmʋ tɩn, dɛ doŋ kʋ yɩ sɩ o pɔɔrɩ dɩ nmʋ maŋa fɩnfɩɩn yɩranɩ mʋ, sɩ o laan joori o ba o taa wʋ nmʋ tee nɩ maŋa maama.
57001016	O na duri o yagɩ nmʋ tɩn, o dɛɛn yɩ gambaa mʋ. O na joori o ba, yɩ zaŋɩ n nii-o nɩ gambaa te, sɩ o laan dwe gambaa o na jigi nmʋ ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Amʋ tiini a so-o. Nmʋ dɩ nan wʋ́ ta n tiini n so-o kʋ ja gaalɩ, o na yɩ n gambaa yɩ o kwǝri o yɩ n ko-bu dɩ́ Yuutu wʋm ŋwaanɩ tɩn.
57001017	Nmʋ na sɛ nɩ dɩbam sɩɩnɩ dɩ́ yɩ ciloŋo daanɩ, sɩ n kwaanɩ n jeeri Onisim lanyɩranɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ amʋ tɩtɩ te.
57001018	O dɛɛn na maŋɩ o kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ o cɔgɩ dɩ, naa o na jɩgɩ nmʋ jɩnɩ, sɩ n yagɩ kʋ maama dɩ amʋ.
57001019	Amʋ Pooli tɩtɩ mʋ mɛ a jɩŋa a pʋpʋnɩ tɩntʋ nɩ: Amʋ wʋ́ ŋwɩ jɩnɩ dɩm. (Kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan maŋɩ n ye nɩ, n jɩgɩ amʋ jɩnɩ zanzan, dɩ nmʋ na nɛ ŋwɩa Wɛ tee nɩ amʋ na brɩ nmʋ Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn ŋwaanɩ.)
57001020	A ko-bu, kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ, a lagɩ sɩ n kɩ woŋo kʋlʋ a na loori-m tɩn mʋ dɩ́ Yuutu sono kʋm ŋwaanɩ, sɩ n pa a taa jɩgɩ wʋpolo Zezi Krisi ŋwaanɩ.
57001021	Amʋ na pʋpʋnɩ tɔnɔ kʋntʋ a pa nmʋ tɩn, a ye lanyɩranɩ nɩ nmʋ wʋ́ sɛ a wʋbʋŋa yam. A ta ye nɩ nmʋ wʋ́ kɩ n dwǝni a na loori kʋlʋ tɩn.
57001022	Kʋlʋ na wǝli da tɩn, a loori-m sɩ n kwaanɩ n lagɩ digǝ, sɩ a na tuǝ, sɩ a taa tigi da. Bɛŋwaanɩ a jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ sɛ abam na loori-DƖ amʋ ŋwaanɩ te tɩn, yɩ DƖ wʋ́ pʋrɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ a joori a ba abam te.
57001023	Epafrasɩ dɩ jɔɔnɩ-m. Wʋntʋ dɩdaanɩ amʋ mʋ wʋ pɩɩna digǝ nɩ Zezi Krisi cɩga kam ŋwaanɩ.
57001024	Marɩkɩ dɩ Arisarɩkɩ dɩ Demasɩ dɩ Luki maama dɩ jɔɔnɩ-m. Bantʋ dɩ amʋ mʋ tɔgɩ daanɩ dɩ́ tʋŋɩ Wɛ tɩtʋŋa yam.
57001025	Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi wʋ́ pa abam yu-yoŋo.
58001001	Faŋa faŋa tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ dɩbam nabaara bam kuni zanzan mʋ. DƖ dɛɛn yǝni DƖ pa DƖ nijoŋnǝ bam mʋ ŋɔɔnɩ wǝǝnu dwi tǝri tǝri dɩ ba.
58001002	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ na yɩ lʋgʋ baŋa kweelim maŋa tɩn, Wɛ laan pɛ DƖ Bu mʋ ba o ŋɔɔnɩ DƖ taanɩ dɩ dɩbam. Wɛ dɛ wʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa dɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama, yɩ DƖ pa-o ni sɩ o ba o taa te wǝǝnu maama.
58001003	Wɛ Bu wʋm mʋ jɩgɩ pooni dɩlʋ na brɩ Wɛ paarɩ-zulǝ yam na yɩ te tɩn. O maa jɩgɩ o Ko Wɛ nyɩnyʋgʋ fasɩ. O ni-taanɩ maa jɩgɩ dam yɩ dɩ paɩ wǝǝnu maama fɔgɩ tɩ zɩga. O ma ba o saarɩ nɔɔna lwarɩm o fɔgɩ-ba o pa ba ji lanyɩranɩ, yɩ o laan joori o di Baŋa-Wɛ te o vu o jǝni DƖ jazɩm nɩ.
58001004	Kʋntʋ tɩn, Baŋa-Wɛ Bu dwe Wɛ malɛsɩ sɩm, dɩ Wɛ na pɛ-o yɩrɩ dɩlʋ na daga dɩ dwe sɩntʋ na jɩgɩ yɩra yalʋ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
58001005	Kʋ na yɩ malɛsɩ sɩm, Wɛ wʋ fɔgɩ DƖ ta dɩ malɛka DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ yɩ amʋ Bu, yɩ zɩm amʋ dɩ jigi nmʋ Ko.» Wɛ nan wʋ tagɩ malɛka kalʋkalʋ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ ta yɩ ka Ko, sɩ ka dɩ taa yɩ amʋ bu.»
58001006	Kʋ daarɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na lagɩ DƖ tʋŋɩ DƖ Bu-dʋa kam sɩ o ba lʋgʋ baŋa tɩn, DƖ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Malɛsɩ sɩm maama maŋɩ sɩ sɩ kuni doonǝ mʋ sɩ zul-o.»
58001007	Kʋ nan na yɩ malɛsɩ sɩm, Wɛ tagɩ sɩ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: Sɩ yɩ dɩntʋ tɩntʋŋna mʋ, yɩ DƖ pa sɩ nyɩ nɩ viu dɩ min-vwɩ te, sɩ sɩ taa tʋŋɩ sɩ pa-DƖ.
58001008	Kʋ daarɩ kʋ na yɩ Wɛ Bu wʋm, DƖ tagɩ o taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ, n paarɩ dɩm wʋ́ ta wʋra sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn. Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n te n nɔɔna bam dɩ cɩga.
58001009	Nmʋ soe cɩga cwǝŋǝ, yɩ n daarɩ n culi balɔrɔ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ n Ko Baŋa-Wɛ pɛ nmʋ na wʋpolo lanyɩranɩ dɩ zulǝ n dwǝni balʋ maama na wʋra dɩ nmʋ tɩn.»
58001010	Wɛ ta tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ wʋlʋ na yɩ wǝǝnu maama Yuutu tɩn mʋ kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa pulim nɩ, yɩ n ta kwǝri n ma n jɩa n kɩ wɛyuu wǝǝnu maama.
58001011	Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba tɩ cɔgɩ, kʋ daarɩ nmʋ nan wʋra mʋ maŋa maama. Wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ maama wʋ́ ba tɩ doori nɩ gɔrɔ na yǝni kʋ doori te tɩn.
58001012	Tɩ wʋ́ ba tɩ lɩɩrɩ, yɩ n kukuli-tɩ n tiŋi nɩ n na kukuli gwar-doŋo n tiŋi yɩ n daarɩ n lǝni gwar-dʋŋʋ n zʋ te tɩn. Nmʋ nan ta wʋ́ ta n yɩ nɩ n na maŋɩ n yɩ te tɩn mʋ. N ŋwɩa bá fɔgɩ ka ti.»
58001013	Wɛ dɛɛn wʋ fɔgɩ DƖ ta dɩ DƖ malɛsɩ sɩm kalʋkalʋ DƖ wɩ: «Ba n jǝni a jazɩm nɩ, sɩ a kɩ n dʋna maama n nɛ kuri nɩ sɩ n nɔ-ba nɩ tɩga te.» Kʋ yɩ DƖ Bu wʋm yɩranɩ mʋ DƖ tagɩ kʋntʋ.
58001014	Malɛsɩ sɩm laŋa nan yɩ ta mʋ? Sɩ nyɩ nɩ jwǝǝru mʋ te, sɩ ba jɩgɩ yɩra nɩ nabiinǝ te. Sɩntʋ yɩ sɩlʋ na tʋŋɩ sɩ pa Wɛ tɩn mʋ. Wɛ maa yǝni DƖ tʋŋɩ-sɩ, yɩ sɩ ve sɩ zǝni balʋ na wʋ́ na vrɩm tɩn.
58002001	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ kʋ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kalʋ dɩ́ na ni tɩn lanyɩranɩ, sɩ dɩ́ yɩ ywǝri Wɛ cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ.
58002002	Wɛ na tɔgɩ DƖ malɛsɩ sɩm jɩŋa DƖ pa dɩ́ nabaara bam kwǝrǝ kalʋ tɩn jɩgɩ kuri lanyɩranɩ. Nɔɔnʋ na wʋ sɛ-ka yɩ o na cɔgɩ DƖ niǝ yam, kʋntʋ tu maŋɩ sɩ o na cam mʋ kʋ maŋɩ dɩ o na kɩ te tɩn.
58002003	Kʋ laan nan na yɩ dɩbam balʋ Wɛ na dɛ DƖ Bu wʋm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa dɩ́ lwarɩ DƖ kwǝrǝ kam tɩn, dɩ́ yigǝ na tǝrǝ dɩ o vrɩm dɩm kʋntʋ dɩ na dwe malɛsɩ sɩm na brɩ kʋlʋ tɩn, dɩ́ wʋ́ wanɩ dɩ́ lu na? Dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi mʋ dɛ yigǝ o ŋɔɔnɩ Wɛ vrɩm dɩm kʋntʋ taanɩ o brɩ nɔɔna. Balʋ na ni-dɩ kʋntʋ tɩn laan ma daarɩ ba ta ba brɩ dɩbam nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga mʋ.
58002004	Wɛ tɩtɩ dɩ ma brɩ nɩ kʋ yɩ cɩga, dɩ DƖ na pɛ ba kɩ wo-kɩnkagɩla dwi tǝri tǝri dɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na brɩ DƖ dam tɩn. DƖ ma daarɩ DƖ pa ba maama DƖ Joro kʋm dam, sɩ ba ma tʋŋɩ te dɩ te DƖ wʋbʋŋa na lagɩ tɩn.
58002005	Lʋ-dʋŋʋ kʋlʋ na maa bɩɩnɩ yɩ dɩ́ tɛ kʋ taanɩ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ malɛsɩ sɩm mʋ Wɛ pɛ dam sɩ sɩ taa te-kʋ.
58002006	Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋdoŋ tagɩ o wɩ: «Nabiinu yɩ bɛɛ mʋ, yɩ nmʋ Baŋa-Wɛ guli o gulǝ? Nabiinu bu yɩ bɛɛ mʋ, yɩ nmʋ nii o baŋa nɩ kʋntʋ?
58002007	Nmʋ pɛ o ba maɩ dɩ malɛsɩ sɩm maŋa fɩnfɩɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ n laan pa o di paarɩ yɩ o na zulǝ.
58002008	N ma n daarɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu maama o nɛ kuri nɩ.» Kʋ na tagɩ kʋ wɩ, «Wɛ kɩ wǝǝnu maama o dam kuri nɩ» tɩn, kʋ lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ kʋlʋkʋlʋ tǝrǝ o na ba te-kʋ. Kʋ nan yɩ cɩga mʋ nɩ, lele kʋntʋ dɩ́ daa ta wʋ nɛ nɩ wǝǝnu maama wʋ nabiinǝ dam kuri nɩ.
58002009	Dɩ́ nan ye nɩ, kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ Wɛ pɛ o tu o tɩtɩ o wʋ yi malɛsɩ sɩm maŋa fɩnfɩɩn wʋnɩ mʋ, yɩ o laan ba o na paarɩ-zulǝ dɩ tiǝ, o na sɛ o yaarɩ o tɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ tɔgɩ DƖ zaanɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ DƖ pa Zezi lǝni nabiinǝ maama yuu nɩ o tɩ ba vrɩm ŋwaanɩ.
58002010	Kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Wɛ dɩlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama DƖ tɩtɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn wʋbʋŋa mʋ, sɩ DƖ pa Zezi na yaara, sɩ o laan wanɩ o vrɩ nabiinǝ zanzan sɩ ba ji Wɛ biǝ, sɩ ba daarɩ ba na paarɩ-zulǝ. Kʋ yɩ Zezi mʋ paɩ nɔɔna na vrɩm Wɛ tee nɩ.
58002011	Zezi ta mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ nabiinǝ jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo Wɛ yigǝ nɩ tɩn. Wʋntʋ dɩ o na pɛ balʋ maama jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo tɩn yɩ ko dɩdʋa biǝ mʋ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ o bǝ-ba nɩ o ko-biǝ, yɩ kʋ ba jɩgɩ cavɩɩra dɩd-o.
58002012	Mʋ kʋ kuri o tagɩ dɩ Wɛ o wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ pa nmʋ yɩrɩ zaŋɩ a ko-biǝ bam tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ a zɩgɩ ba wʋnɩ a leeni a zuli nmʋ.»
58002013	O daa ta maa wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ kwe a wʋ maama a pa Wɛ.» O ma daa ta ta o wɩ: «Nii-na amʋ dɩ biǝ balʋ Wɛ na kɩ amʋ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn.»
58002014	Balʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ biǝ tɩn yɩ nabiinǝ mʋ, yɩ ba jɩgɩ yɩra dɩ jana. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ Zezi dɩ dɛɛn tɔgɩ o ji nabiinu, sɩ o wanɩ o tɔgɩ o tʋʋnɩ dɩm ŋwaanɩ o cɔgɩ wʋlʋ na paɩ tʋʋnɩ jaanɩ nɔɔna tɩn. Wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ sʋtaanɩ.
58002015	Zezi na wanɩ tʋʋnɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ pɛ o wanɩ o vrɩ balʋ na fʋna dɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn o yagɩ. Bantʋ ŋwɩa kam maama wʋnɩ ba yɩ nɩ gambɛ mʋ te, ba na kwarɩ tʋʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
58002016	Dɩ́ laan nan lwarɩ nɩ kʋ daɩ malɛsɩ sɩm mʋ o tu sɩ o zǝni. O tu sɩ o zǝni Abraham dwi tiinǝ bam mʋ.
58002017	Mʋ kʋ kuri o jigi nabiinu yɩ o sɩɩnɩ o nyɩ dɩ o ko-biǝ bam woŋo maama wʋnɩ. Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ-o cwǝŋǝ, sɩ o taa yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ ba ŋwaŋa lanyɩranɩ yɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ dɩ cɩga ba ŋwaanɩ tɩn. Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ o waɩ o saarɩ ba lwarɩm yɩ o pa ba fɔgɩ dɩ Wɛ.
58002018	Kʋntʋ, Zezi tɩtɩ na nɛ maŋɩm dɩ yaara tɩn, o laan wʋ́ wanɩ o zǝni balʋ na wʋ yaara dɩ maŋɩm wʋnɩ tɩn sɩ ba taa jɩgɩ pu-dɩa.
58003001	A ko-biǝ-ba, abam yɩ Wɛ nɔɔna mʋ. DƖ ma bǝŋi abam sɩ á tɔgɩ á na ywǝǝni DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ. Nan lwarɩ-na nɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na tʋŋɩ, sɩ o ba o ji DƖ kaanɩm yuutu dɩbam Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ.
58003002	Wɛ mʋ pɛ-o tɩtʋŋɩ dɩm kʋntʋ. O maa tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ dɩ cɩga. Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Moyisi dɩ dɛɛn na nii Wɛ nɔɔna bam baŋa nɩ dɩ cɩga te tɩn.
58003003	Zezi nan sɩɩnɩ o maŋɩ sɩ o na zulǝ o dwǝni Moyisi, bɛŋwaanɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋlʋ na lɔgɩ sɔŋɔ tɩn mʋ na zulǝ o dwe sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩtɩ.
58003004	Sɔŋɔ nan tǝrǝ yɩ kʋ daɩ nɔɔnʋ mʋ lɔgɩ-kʋ. Wɛ nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na kɩ woŋo maama tɩn.
58003005	Moyisi dɛɛn yɩ tɩntʋŋnʋ mʋ, yɩ o tʋŋɩ dɩ cɩga Wɛ nɔɔna bam ŋwaanɩ. O ma da yigǝ o brɩ-ba Wɛ cɩga kalʋ na wʋ́ ba ka lwarɩ jaja tɩn.
58003006	Kʋ daarɩ Zezi Krisi mʋ yɩ sɔŋɔ kʋm tɩtɩ bu cɩga cɩga, yɩ o te sɔŋɔ kʋm. Dɩbam mʋ yɩ sɔŋɔ kʋm kʋntʋ, dɩ dɩ́ na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa yɩ dɩ́ brɩ dɩ wʋpolo nɩ dɩ́ jɩgɩ tɩɩna Wɛ tee nɩ.
58003007	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ sɛ-na Wɛ Joro kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam,
58003008	á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara, nɩ á nabaara bam dɛɛn na vɩn Wɛ ni, yɩ ba kwǝri ba maŋɩ-DƖ ba nii te maŋa kalʋ ba na wʋ kagʋa kam wʋnɩ tɩn.»
58003009	Wɛ maa wɩ: «Abam nabaara bam dɛɛn nɛ amʋ na kɩ kʋlʋ maama dɩ ba bɩna fiinna tɩn, yɩ ba daa ta tiini ba kwaanɩ ba maŋɩ amʋ sɩ ba nii.
58003010	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ amʋ banɩ zaŋɩ dɩ nɔɔna bam kʋntʋ, yɩ a ta a wɩ: ‹Kʋ yɩ ba paalɩ ba ywǝri mʋ maŋa maama, yɩ ba vɩn sɩ ba tɔgɩ amʋ cwe sɩm.›
58003011	Amʋ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm ma pa a ta a du dɩ ba a wɩ: ‹Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun.› »
58003012	A ko-biǝ-ba, cʋ-na á tɩtɩ sɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ yɩ taá jɩgɩ wʋbʋŋ-lwaanʋ o bɩcarɩ nɩ, sɩ kʋ pa o yɩ kɩ o wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Ŋwɩa Tu Wɛ, sɩ o daarɩ o yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm.
58003013	Nan taá zǝni-na daanɩ maŋa maama, sɩ kʋ pa á taá jɩgɩ pu-dɩa, nɩ Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam ta na ŋɔɔnɩ dɩ dɩbam zɩm te tɩn, sɩ abam wʋlʋwʋlʋ yɩ pa lwarɩm gan-o sɩ o pa o bɩcarɩ digili dɩ Wɛ.
58003014	Dɩbam nan tɔgɩ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ́ ji Wɛ biǝ mʋ, dɩ dɩ́ na zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ, nɩ dɩ́ na puli dɩ́ kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn, sɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi kweelim.
58003015	Kʋ yɩ nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te kʋ wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara, nɩ á nabaara bam dɛɛn na vɩn Wɛ ni te tɩn.»
58003016	Balʋ dɛɛn na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam yɩ ba vɩn DƖ ni tɩn yɩ bra mʋ? Ba yɩ balʋ maama Moyisi dɛɛn na tɔgɩ ba yigǝ o ja-ba o nuŋi Ezipi tɩʋ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn mʋ.
58003017	Wɛ banɩ dɛɛn zaŋɩ dɩ bra mʋ bɩna fiinna tɩn? Kʋ yɩ nɔɔna balʋ na kɩ lwarɩm kagʋa kam wʋnɩ yɩ Wɛ pa ba tɩ da tɩn mʋ.
58003018	Wɛ na dugi DƖ wɩ, dɩntʋ brɩ DƖ bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun tɩn, kʋ yɩ bra mʋ DƖ tɛa? Kʋ yɩ balʋ na wʋ sɛ DƖ ni tɩn mʋ.
58003019	Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ dɩ́ lwarɩ nɩ, Wɛ na wʋ pɛ-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ tɩn, kʋ yɩ ba na wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ DƖ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
58004001	Wɛ na goni DƖ ni sɩ DƖ pa nɔɔna zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun tɩn daa ta wʋra. Dɩbam nan maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ taá yɩrɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ mʋ, sɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o ba o darɩ nɩ o wʋ zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm kʋntʋ wʋ.
58004002	Dɩbam maŋɩ dɩ́ ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam, nɩnɛɛnɩ dɩ́ nabaara bam dɛɛn dɩ na ni-ka te tɩn. Bantʋ nan na ni-ka tɩn, ba wʋ pɛ ka ja kuri dɩ ba, bɛŋwaanɩ ba wʋ kɩ ba wʋ-dɩdʋa sɩ ba tɔgɩ Wɛ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn.
58004003	Dɩbam balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn mʋ wʋ́ ba dɩ́ na siun DƖ woro kʋm wʋnɩ. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ tagɩ bantʋ taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ ban-zɔŋɔ kʋm pɛ a ta a du dɩ ba a wɩ: ‹Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba na siun.› » Wɛ na tagɩ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ daɩ nɩ DƖ ba jɩgɩ siun jǝgǝ mʋ ba ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ zɩgɩ maŋa kalʋ Wɛ na kɩ lʋgʋ baŋa yɩ DƖ kɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam maama DƖ ti tɩn, mʋ DƖ daarɩ DƖ sin.
58004004	Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm tagɩ da yarpɛ dɛ dɩm taanɩ kʋ wɩ: «Da yarpɛ dɛ nɩ mʋ Wɛ sin dɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam maama.»
58004005	Wɛ nan tagɩ DƖ siun kʋm taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ brɩ a bá pa-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba zʋ amʋ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin.»
58004006	Kʋntʋ tɩn, dɩ́ nabaara balʋ na dɛ yigǝ ba ni Wɛ kwǝr-ywǝŋǝ kam tɩn wʋ wanɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin, ba na vɩn DƖ ni tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kʋ laan daarɩ sɩ nɔɔna badaara mʋ na cwǝŋǝ ba zʋ.
58004007	Mʋ kʋ kuri Wɛ daa ta tiŋi dɛ dɩdoŋ, kʋ na lagɩ kʋ ta nɩ zɩm, sɩ nɔɔna wanɩ ba zʋ DƖ woro kʋm wʋ ba sin. Kʋntʋ, bɩna zanzan na kɛ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn ta pɛ Davidi mʋ ta kʋlʋ dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ ni tɩn o wɩ: «Abam zɩm na ni Wɛ kwǝrǝ kam, á yɩ zaŋɩ á digili á bɩcara.»
58004008	Zozwe dɛɛn ya na sɩɩnɩ o ja dɩ́ nabaara bam o vu o zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ sɩ ba sin, Wɛ ya daa bá ŋɔɔnɩ siun dɛ dɩdoŋ taanɩ daga.
58004009	Kʋntʋ mʋ dɩ́ ye nɩ cwǝŋǝ daa ta wʋra zɩm, sɩ Wɛ nɔɔna na siun, nɩ DƖ tɩtɩ na sin da yarpɛ dɛ dɩm nɩ te tɩn.
58004010	Wʋlʋ maama na zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ tɩn, wʋntʋ wʋ́ sɩɩnɩ o na siun dɩ o tɩtʋŋa yam, nɩ Wɛ dɩ dɛɛn na sin dɩ DƖ tɩtʋŋa yam te tɩn.
58004011	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ kwaanɩ-na á pa dɩ́ zʋ Wɛ woro kʋm wʋ sɩ dɩ́ na siun. Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ yɩ zaŋɩ o vɩn Wɛ ni sɩ o joori Wɛ kwaga nɩ, nɩ dɩ́ nabaara bam dɛɛn na kɩ te tɩn.
58004012	Wɛ taanɩ dɩm jɩgɩ ŋwɩa yɩ dɩ dana lanyɩranɩ. Dɩ jɩgɩ ni dɩ dwe sʋ-lɔŋɔ kʋlʋ na jɩgɩ niǝ yale tɩn. Dɩ maa waɩ dɩ zʋʋrɩ nɔɔnʋ wʋ dɩ pɔɔrɩ o joro dɩ o bɩcarɩ wǝǝnu maama daanɩ, yɩ dɩ daarɩ dɩ ye o swan dɩ o wʋbʋŋa maama na yɩ te tɩn.
58004013	Kʋlʋkʋlʋ bá wanɩ kʋ sǝgi Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Woŋo kʋlʋ maama na wʋra tɩn yɩ jaja mʋ DƖ yigǝ nɩ. Kʋ yɩ dɩntʋ mʋ dɩ́ maŋɩ sɩ dɩ́ ba dɩ́ zɩgɩ DƖ yigǝ nɩ dɩ́ ta kʋlʋ maama dɩ́ na kɩ tɩn.
58004014	Dɩbam nan jɩgɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu o na yɩ kamunu o diini o vu o yi Wɛ-sɔŋɔ. Wʋm mʋ yɩ Wɛ Bu Zezi. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ sɛ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm lanyɩranɩ dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ.
58004015	Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm kʋntʋ nan daɩ wʋlʋ na ba jɩgɩ dɩbam balʋ na bwǝnǝ tɩn ŋwaŋa. O tɩtɩ dɩ nan nɛ yaara dɩ maŋɩm woŋo maama wʋnɩ, nɩ dɩbam dɩ na nɛ maŋɩm te tɩn. Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o ta wʋ kɩ lwarɩm.
58004016	Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, pa-na dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ baarɩ sɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ yi Dam-fɔrɔ Tu Wɛ jǝŋǝ je, sɩ dɩ́ joŋi DƖ zaanɩ dɩm. Kʋntʋ mʋ Wɛ wʋ́ duri dɩ́ ŋwaŋa yɩ DƖ pa dɩbam zaanɩ, sɩ kʋ wanɩ kʋ zǝni dɩbam maŋa kalʋ dɩ́ na lagɩ tɩn.
58005001	Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu maama yɩ ba yǝni ba lɩ-o o donnǝ nabiinǝ wʋnɩ mʋ, sɩ o taa tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ ba ŋwaanɩ. O nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa maɩ pɛɛra dɩ vara mʋ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ, sɩ DƖ yagɩ ba lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba.
58005002	O tɩtɩ dɩ nan na bwǝnǝ tɩn, o waɩ o jaanɩ o bɩcarɩ dɩ balʋ na yǝri Wɛ cɩga kam lanyɩranɩ yɩ ba tusi tɩn.
58005003	O nan na bwǝnǝ kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ o tɩtɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ, dɩ nɔɔna bam dɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ.
58005004	Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan bá wanɩ o lɩ o tɩtɩ sɩ o taa yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu. Kʋ yɩ Wɛ mʋ wʋ́ kur-o, nɩnɛɛnɩ DƖ dɛɛn na puli DƖ kuri Aarɔn te tɩn.
58005005	Kʋ nan yɩ bɩdwɩ mʋ dɩ Zezi Krisi dɩ na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu te tɩn. Kʋ daɩ nɩ wʋm mʋ beeri zulǝ yam kʋntʋ o pa o tɩtɩ. Wɛ nan mʋ tagɩ dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ yɩ amʋ Bu, yɩ zɩm amʋ dɩ jigi nmʋ Ko.»
58005006	Wɛ daa ta tagɩ DƖ tɔnɔ kʋm wʋnɩ jǝgǝ kadoŋ nɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.»
58005007	Zezi na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ maŋa kalʋ tɩn, o tiini o loori Wɛ dɩ baarɩ yɩ o yi-na nuŋǝ, o na ye nɩ Wɛ wʋ́ wanɩ DƖ joŋ-o tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ. Wɛ ma sɛ o loro kʋm, o na tu o tɩtɩ yɩ o sɛ-DƖ lanyɩranɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
58005008	Nan dɩ o na maŋɩ o yɩ Wɛ Bu tɩn dɩ, o na yaarɩ te tɩn mʋ pɛ o lwarɩ Wɛ ni sɛɛm na yɩ te tɩn.
58005009	O nan na kɩ kʋlʋ maama Wɛ na lagɩ o ti tɩn, o laan waɩ o vrɩ balʋ maama na sɛ o ni tɩn o pa ba na ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn Wɛ tee nɩ.
58005010	Wɛ ma brɩ nɩ o sɩɩnɩ o yɩ DƖ kaanɩm yuutu, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
58005011	Amʋ ya jɩgɩ wǝǝnu zanzan mʋ sɩ a ta a brɩ abam kʋntʋ laŋa nɩ, kʋ nan tiini kʋ cana sɩ a pa á ni kʋ kuri, bɛŋwaanɩ abam laan jɩgɩ yawɔrɔ mʋ yɩ á bá wanɩ á ni kʋ kuri lɩla.
58005012	Kʋ na daɩ kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ, kantʋ maŋa kam nɩ abam laan ya wʋ́ ta yɩ balʋ na maŋɩ sɩ á taá jɩgɩ Wɛ nɔɔna á zaasɩ tɩn mʋ. Kʋ nan na yɩ cɩga, kʋ fɩn mʋ sɩ nɔɔna mʋ joori ba brɩ abam Wɛ taanɩ dɩm dayigǝ wo-mwaalʋ tɩm. Abam nyɩ dɩ biǝ balʋ ta na wʋ yi sɩ ba di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn, yɩ á maŋɩ sɩ á taá ŋɔgɩ yɩla mʋ nɩ bu-balɛ te.
58005013	Balʋ na jɩgɩ bu-balɛ wʋbʋŋa kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ ba ta yǝri kʋlʋ na maŋɩ dɩ kʋlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn daanɩ.
58005014	Kʋ daarɩ balʋ wʋbʋŋa na bɩgɩ dɩ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn mʋ di wʋdiu kʋlʋ na duunǝ tɩn. Bantʋ mʋ yǝni ba tɔgɩ Wɛ cɩga kam, yɩ ba waɩ ba kuri wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na lana yɩ tɩ maŋɩ sɩ ba kɩ tɩn, ba daarɩ tɩlʋ na wʋ maŋɩ tɩn.
58006001	Nan pa-na dɩ́ kɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ ba na maŋɩ ba da yigǝ ba brɩ abam Zezi Krisi cwǝŋǝ kam wʋnɩ tɩn, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ zaasɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ́ pa dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa bɩ Wɛ cɩga kam wʋnɩ tɩn. Abam daa wʋ maŋɩ sɩ á joori á puli Wɛ taanɩ dɩm zaasɩm, bɛŋwaanɩ á maŋɩ á zaasɩ á na wʋ́ lǝni á wʋ á yagɩ kǝm-balwaarʋ tɩlʋ na jɩgɩ abam tɩ ve tʋʋnɩ wʋnɩ tɩn, dɩ á na wʋ́ kɩ á wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ te tɩn.
58006002	Á maŋɩ á zaasɩ ba na wʋ́ miisi nɔɔna na wʋnɩ te tɩn woŋo, kʋ wǝli dɩ ba na wʋ́ zi ba jɩa nɔɔna baŋa nɩ ba warɩ Wɛ ba ŋwaanɩ te tɩn, yɩ á kwǝri á zaasɩ twa na wʋ́ bi te tɩn, kʋ wǝli dɩ Wɛ na wʋ́ ba DƖ di nabiinǝ sarɩya DƖ ma kweeli te tɩn.
58006003	Á nan pa-na dɩ́ gaalɩ wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ dɩ́ kɛ, sɩ dɩ́ daarɩ dɩ́ kwaanɩ dɩ́ vu yigǝ, sɩ Wɛ wʋ́ zǝni dɩbam yɩ dɩ́ wanɩ dɩ́ vu yigǝ.
58006004	Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na maŋɩ ba sɛ Wɛ cɩga kam tɩn, ba na paalɩ ba yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o joori o dɩ-ba ka wʋnɩ. Bantʋ maŋɩ ba na Wɛ pooni dɩm, yɩ ba lwarɩ ŋwɩ-dʋŋa kalʋ Wɛ na pɛ tɩn na yɩ te tɩn. Ba maŋɩ ba na Wɛ Joro kʋm dam.
58006005	Ba maŋɩ ba lwarɩ Wɛ taanɩ dɩm na ywǝmmǝ te tɩn, yɩ ba nɛ Wɛ paarɩ dɩlʋ na lagɩ dɩ ba tɩn dam na yɩ te tɩn.
58006006	Nɔɔna bantʋ dwi na yagɩ Wɛ cwǝŋǝ tɔgɩm, nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ daa bá wanɩ o pa ba lǝni ba wʋ ba daa ta tɔgɩ Wɛ, bɛŋwaanɩ kʋ nyɩ nɩnɛɛnɩ bam tɩtɩ mʋ joori ba pa Wɛ Bu Zezi tʋʋn-dagara kam yuu nɩ ba gʋ yɩ ba paɩ nɔɔna mwan-o te.
58006007	Kʋ nyɩ dɩ dʋa na nɩa lanyɩranɩ nɔɔnʋ kara nɩ te tɩn mʋ. Tɩga kam na nyɔgɩ dʋ-na bam yɩ ka daarɩ ka kɩ wʋdiiru lanyɩranɩ ka pa balʋ na dugi ka baŋa nɩ tɩn, Wɛ wʋ́ kɩ tɩga kam kʋntʋ lanyɩranɩ.
58006008	Kʋ daarɩ tɩga kam na nuŋi sabarɩ dɩ wo-kʋrrʋ yɩranɩ mʋ, kʋ brɩ nɩ ka yɩ kafɛ mʋ, yɩ fɩnfɩɩn na wǝli da Wɛ wʋ́ cɔgɩ-ka DƖ yagɩ, yɩ kʋ tiim nɩ baá zwɛ-ka dɩ mini mʋ.
58006009	A badon-sonnu-ba, dɩbam na maŋɩ dɩ́ ŋɔɔnɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, dɩ́ jɩgɩ abam cɩga nɩ á tɔgɩ cwǝ-ŋʋŋa kalʋ na wʋ́ pa á na vrɩm tɩn.
58006010	Wɛ yɩ cɩga tu mʋ. DƖ nan bá swe á na maŋɩ á tʋŋɩ tɩtʋŋ-ŋʋna yalʋ tɩn. DƖ ta bá swe á na soe-DƖ lanyɩranɩ yɩ á tʋŋɩ á wǝli DƖ nɔɔna bam kʋ ba kʋ yi zɩm maama tɩn.
58006011	Amʋ nan na tiini a lagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ abam maama kwaanɩ á tɔgɩ Wɛ lanyɩranɩ kʋ vu kʋ yi kweelim, sɩ á laan na kʋlʋ maama á na jɩgɩ tɩɩna sɩ á na Wɛ tee nɩ tɩn.
58006012	Á nan yɩ pa yawɔrɔ zʋ abam. Á lwǝni-na balʋ na fɔgɩ ba zɩgɩ dɩ pu-dɩa yɩ ba jɩgɩ wʋ-dɩdʋa dɩ Wɛ tɩn. Bantʋ laan mʋ wʋ́ ba ba joŋi wo-laarʋ tɩlʋ Wɛ na goni ni sɩ DƖ pa-ba tɩn.
58006013	Wɛ dɛɛn na goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩ Abraham tɩn, kʋ yɩ DƖ dugi dɩ DƖ tɩtɩ mʋ, bɛŋwaanɩ woŋo daa tǝrǝ kʋ na dwe-DƖ sɩ DƖ du dɩ kʋ.
58006014	Wɛ goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ wʋ́ kɩ nmʋ lanyɩranɩ, yɩ aá pa n dwi puli zanzan.»
58006015	Wɛ na dugi kʋntʋ tɩn, Abraham dɛɛn ma vɔ pu-dɩa o cǝgi taan, yɩ o laan ba o na Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩm sɩ DƖ pa-o kʋlʋ tɩn.
58006016	Kʋ na yɩ nabiinǝ na yǝni ba du durǝ, baá ma kʋlʋ na dwe-ba tɩn yɩrɩ mʋ ba du, sɩ kʋ brɩ nɩ ba taanɩ dɩm yɩ cɩga, sɩ bʋbwɛa daa ta tǝrǝ.
58006017	Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩm dɩ balʋ tɩn, DƖ dɩ lagɩ sɩ ba lwarɩ lanyɩranɩ nɩ DƖ bá fɔgɩ DƖ yiri DƖ ni dɩm. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ dugi durǝ DƖ wǝli dɩ DƖ ni-gonim dɩm.
58006018	Wɛ na ba fɔɛ vwan tɩn ŋwaanɩ, wǝǝnu tɩm kʋntʋ tɩle bá wanɩ tɩ lǝni. Kʋntʋ ŋwaanɩ mʋ dɩbam balʋ na kɩ dɩ́ tɩtɩ Wɛ jɩŋa nɩ tɩn wʋ́ tiini dɩ́ zɩgɩ kǝŋkǝŋ dɩ pu-dɩa, sɩ dɩ́ taá jɩgɩ tɩɩna nɩ dɩ́ wʋ́ na kʋlʋ Wɛ na tiŋi sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn.
58006019	Tɩɩna yam dɩ́ na jɩgɩ Wɛ tee nɩ kʋntʋ tɩn tiini ya dana, yɩ ya bá wanɩ ya cɔgɩ. Ya maa paɩ dɩ́ wʋbʋŋa tigi jǝgǝ dɩdʋa, yɩ ya paɩ dɩ́ yi Wɛ tɩtɩ jǝŋǝ je mɛ na cɩgɩ dɩ gɔrɔ sɩ nabiinǝ yɩ zʋ tɩn.
58006020	Zezi nan mʋ maŋɩ o da yigǝ o zʋ jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ dɩbam ŋwaanɩ. Wʋntʋ mʋ jigi Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
58007001	A laan lagɩ a ŋɔɔnɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ woŋo mʋ a brɩ abam. Wʋntʋ dɛɛn yɩ Salɛm tiinǝ pɛ mʋ, yɩ o kwǝri o yɩ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ kaanɩm tu. Abraham na kɩ jara o wanɩ pwa yɩ o laan ma joori maŋa kalʋ tɩn, mʋ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ jeer-o cwǝŋǝ nɩ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa-o.
58007002	Abraham laan ma kwe wǝǝnu tɩlʋ maama o na nɛ jara yam je nɩ tɩn o cɛ kuni fugǝ, o kwe kuni bɩdwɩ dɩm o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ. Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ yɩrɩ dɩm kuri mʋ yɩ pɛ wʋlʋ na yɩ Cɩga Tu tɩn. Kʋ wǝli da, o na yɩ Salɛm pɛ tɩn, kʋ dɩ kuri mʋ yɩ Yazurǝ Pɛ.
58007003	Dɩbam nan wʋ ni Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ ko dɩ o nu ŋwa, yɩ dɩ́ yǝri o kuri na puli mɛ tɩn. Dɩ́ nan yǝri o lʋra dɛ dɩ o tʋʋnɩ maŋa. Kʋntʋ mʋ pɛ o nyɩ dɩ Wɛ Bu Zezi, yɩ o yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
58007004	Bʋŋɩ-na á nii Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ kamunu te tɩn. Dɩbam nabaarʋ Abraham dɛɛn ma cɛ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ o na nɛ jara yam je nɩ tɩn kuni fugǝ, yɩ o lɩ kuni bɩdwɩ o pa-o.
58007005	Kʋ na yɩ balʋ na nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ yɩ ba yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, Wɛ ni dɩm pɛ-ba cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba joŋi kuni kuri fugǝ wʋnɩ kuni bɩdwɩ dɩm ba donnǝ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam tee nɩ woŋo maama wʋnɩ, yɩ bantʋ dɩ nan yɩ Abraham dwi tiinǝ mʋ.
58007006	Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ nan wʋ nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ. Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, o ta joŋi o wǝǝnu tǝri Abraham tee nɩ. O ma daarɩ o sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa Abraham, yɩ Abraham nan ya mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ Wɛ na goni DƖ ni dɩd-o tɩn.
58007007	Kʋ nan ba jɩgɩ bʋbwɛa nɩ, nɔɔnʋ na sɔɔlɩ Wɛ o pa o doŋ, wʋntʋ mʋ yɩ kamunu o dwe o na sɔɔlɩ o pa wʋlʋ tɩn.
58007008	Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ balʋ na nuŋi Leevi dwi dɩm wʋnɩ tɩn dɛɛn yǝni ba joŋi ba wǝǝnu tǝri mʋ, bantʋ nan yɩ balʋ na tʋ tɩn mʋ. Kʋ daarɩ kʋ nan na yɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ, wʋntʋ ŋwɩ mʋ taan, nɩ Wɛ tɔnɔ kʋm na tagɩ te tɩn.
58007009	-
58007010	Abraham na cɛ o wǝǝnu yɩ o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ o tǝri tɩn, ba ta wʋ lʋgɩ Leevi, yɩ o nan wʋ o nabaarʋ Abraham jana kam wʋnɩ. Leevi nan mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ dwi tiinǝ na jɩgɩ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba joŋi ba wǝǝnu tǝri ba donnǝ Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ bam tee nɩ tɩn. Nan dɩ kʋntʋ dɩ, kʋ nyɩ dɩ Leevi tɔgɩ Abraham ŋwaanɩ mʋ o pa Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ o tǝri.
58007011	Wɛ dɛɛn tɔgɩ Leevi dwi tiinǝ kaanɩm dɩm ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ pa DƖ cullu tɩm Yisɩrayɛlɩ tiinǝ. Bantʋ nan na yǝni ba kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ te tɩn ya na maŋɩ fasɩ, Wɛ ya daa bá kuri kaanɩm tu wʋdoŋ wʋlʋ na daɩ Leevi dwi tu tɩn. Wɛ nan kuri wʋlʋ na yɩ kaanɩm tu nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn, yɩ o wʋ nuŋi Aarɔn dwi dɩm wʋnɩ.
58007012	Kʋntʋ, Wɛ na lǝni DƖ kaanɩm tu dwi dɩdoŋ wʋnɩ tɩn, kʋ maŋɩ sɩ DƖ cullu tɩm dɩ tɔgɩ tɩ lǝni mʋ.
58007013	-
58007014	Taanɩ dɩntʋ maama nan brɩ dɩ́ Yuutu Zezi Krisi woŋo mʋ. Wʋntʋ daɩ Leevi dwi tu. Dɩ́ ye nɩ ba lʋg-o Zuda dwi dɩm wʋnɩ mʋ. Dwi dɩm kʋntʋ wʋnɩ nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan wʋ fɔgɩ o ji Wɛ kaanɩm tu. Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ cullu tɩlʋ DƖ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn, tɩ wʋ pɛ Zuda dwi tiinǝ cwǝŋǝ sɩ ba ji Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ.
58007015	Dɩ́ nan sɩɩnɩ dɩ́ lwarɩ jaja nɩ Wɛ lǝni kaanɩm tu wʋdoŋ mʋ, o na nyɩ dɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.
58007016	Zezi na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tu te tɩn wʋ tɔgɩ dwi dɩm cullu tɩm ŋwaanɩ, kʋ tɔgɩ o ŋwɩa kalʋ tʋʋnɩ na ba jɩgɩ dam ka baŋa nɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
58007017	Wɛ nan tagɩ o taanɩ DƖ wɩ: «Nmʋ mʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn, nɩ Mɛlɩkisedɛkɩ dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn.»
58007018	Kʋ ma brɩ nɩ Wɛ yagɩ cwǝ-doŋǝ kam mʋ, ka na bwǝnǝ yɩ ka ba zǝni nɔɔna tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
58007019	Cullu tɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn warɩ tɩ pa nɔɔna maŋɩ fasɩ Wɛ yigǝ nɩ. Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, dɩ́ laan jɩgɩ tɩɩna lanyɩranɩ dɩ Wɛ na tiŋi cwǝ-laa kalʋ DƖ pa dɩbam sɩ dɩ́ ma wanɩ dɩ́ tɔgɩ-ka dɩ́ vu dɩ́ yi DƖ te tɩn.
58007020	Wɛ nan dugi durǝ mʋ DƖ wǝli da. Leevi dwi tiinǝ bam dɛɛn nan na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, DƖ wʋ dugi durǝ kam kʋntʋ doŋ dɩ ba.
58007021	Kʋ daarɩ, Zezi nan na jigi Wɛ kaanɩm tu tɩn, Wɛ dugi durǝ mʋ dɩd-o DƖ wɩ: «Amʋ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ dugi a durǝ, yɩ a bá fɔgɩ a za a ni. Nmʋ wʋ́ ta n yɩ amʋ kaanɩm tu sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.»
58007022	Wɛ na dugi DƖ durǝ kam kʋntʋ tɩn, kʋ brɩ nɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ mʋ DƖ tiŋi cwǝ-laa DƖ pa dɩbam, yɩ kantʋ garɩ cwǝ-doŋǝ kam.
58007023	Kʋ na yɩ Leevi dwi tiinǝ balʋ dɛɛn na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ tɩn, ba yɩ zanzan, tʋʋnɩ na yǝni dɩ jaanɩ-ba yɩ ba lǝni daanɩ tɩn ŋwaanɩ mʋ.
58007024	Kʋ daarɩ Zezi mʋ yɩ wʋlʋ na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn. Nɔɔn-nɔɔnʋ nan daa bá lǝni o yuu nɩ o ji Wɛ kaanɩm tu.
58007025	Kʋntʋ tɩn, o waɩ o vrɩ balʋ na tɔgɩ o ŋwaanɩ ba yi Wɛ te tɩn maŋa maama, o na jɩgɩ ŋwɩa kalʋ na ba ti yɩ o loori Wɛ o pa-ba tɩn ŋwaanɩ.
58007026	Zezi nan mʋ yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na maŋɩ tɩn dɩbam ŋwaanɩ. O jɩgɩ wʋ-poŋo, o yɩ nɔn-ŋʋm Wɛ yigǝ nɩ, o ba jɩgɩ lwarɩm. Wɛ ma lɩ-o nɔn-balwaarʋ tɩtarɩ nɩ, yɩ DƖ zǝŋ-o DƖ ja DƖ di wɛyuu DƖ sɔŋɔ nɩ.
58007027	Kʋ na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuu tiinǝ bam dɛɛn na yɩ te tɩn, dɛ maama ba yǝni ba kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ mʋ sɩ DƖ yagɩ ba tɩtɩ lwarɩm DƖ ma cɛ-ba, yɩ ba laan daarɩ ba kaanɩ Wɛ ba donnǝ bam dɩ lwarɩm ŋwaanɩ. Kʋ nan na yɩ Zezi, wʋntʋ kwe o tɩtɩ mʋ o ma kaanɩ Wɛ kuni bɩdwɩ yɩranɩ, yɩ kʋntʋ jɩgɩ kuri sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
58007028	Cullu tɩlʋ Wɛ na kɩ Moyisi jɩŋa nɩ tɩn pa nabiinǝ jiri Wɛ kaanɩm yuu tiinǝ yɩ ba daa ta bwǝnǝ mʋ. Kʋ nan na yɩ Wɛ ni-gonim dɩlʋ DƖ na dugi durǝ dɩ ŋwaanɩ tɩn, dɩntʋ laan mʋ lǝni Moyisi cullu tɩm yuu nɩ, yɩ dɩ pa Wɛ tɩtɩ Bu wʋm ji DƖ kaanɩm yuutu wʋlʋ na maŋɩ fasɩ sɩ kʋ taa ve maŋa kalʋ na ba ti tɩn.
58008001	Taana yantʋ maama wʋnɩ taanɩ dɩlʋ na yɩ kamunu tɩn mʋ yɩ sɩ dɩbam jɩgɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu wʋm kʋntʋ doŋ. Wʋntʋ mʋ je Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ, Dam-Paŋwa Tu Wɛ paarɩ jangɔŋɔ kʋm jazɩm nɩ.
58008002	O maa wʋ Wɛ di-laa cɩga cɩga wʋnɩ o tʋŋɩ o pa-DƖ. Jǝgǝ kam kʋntʋ yɩ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ tɩtɩ sɔŋɔ mʋ, kʋ daɩ lʋgʋ baŋa vwe dɩlʋ nabiinǝ na pugi sɩ ba taa zuli-DƖ da tɩn.
58008003	Wʋlʋ maama na yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu tɩn tɩtʋŋɩ yɩ sɩ o taa maɩ pɛɛra dɩ vara mʋ o kaanɩ Baŋa-Wɛ. Dɩbam Wɛ kaanɩm yuutu Zezi dɩ nan maŋɩ sɩ o taa jɩgɩ kʋlʋ o na wʋ́ pa Wɛ tɩn.
58008004	Zezi nan ya ta na wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, o bá ta yɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tu. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ kaanɩm tiinǝ maŋɩ ba wʋ lʋgʋ baŋa nɩ, yɩ ba yǝni ba maɩ pɛɛra ba ma kaanɩ Wɛ, kʋ maŋɩ dɩ Moyisi cullu tɩm na brɩ te tɩn.
58008005	Bantʋ na yǝni ba tʋŋɩ ba pa Wɛ te tɩn yɩ wǝǝnu tɩlʋ na wʋ Wɛ-sɔŋɔ nɩ tɩn nyɩnyʋgʋ dɩ tɩ luluŋu mʋ. Moyisi dɛɛn na lagɩ o pu vwe dɩlʋ nɔɔna na wʋ́ ta paɩ Wɛ zulǝ dɩ wʋnɩ tɩn, Wɛ dɛɛn brɩ-o o na wʋ́ kɩ te, yɩ DƖ ta DƖ wɩ: «Kwaanɩ n kɩ wǝǝnu tɩm maama sɩ tɩ taa nyɩ nɩ amʋ na maŋɩ a brɩ-m piu kʋm yuu nɩ te tɩn.»
58008006	Kʋ daarɩ lele kʋntʋ, Zezi na tʋŋɩ o pa Wɛ te tɩn tiini kʋ jɩgɩ kuri lanyɩranɩ kʋ dwe kaanɩm tiinǝ bam tɩtʋŋa yam maama, nɩ ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩlʋ Wɛ na tɔgɩ Zezi ŋwaanɩ DƖ go DƖ pa dɩbam tɩn na lana dɩ dwe dayigǝ ni-gonim dɩm na yɩ te tɩn. Bɛŋwaanɩ Wɛ na goni ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩm sɩ DƖ pa dɩbam kʋlʋ tɩn tiini kʋ lana kʋ dwe DƖ ni-doori dɩm.
58008007	Dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ Wɛ na goni DƖ pa DƖ nɔɔna bam tɩn ya na maŋɩ fasɩ, DƖ ya daa bá go ni dɩdoŋ DƖ lǝni dɩntʋ yuu nɩ.
58008008	Wɛ dɛɛn nan brɩ nɩ DƖ nɔɔna bam kɩ ba tusi mʋ. Kʋntʋ mʋ DƖ tagɩ DƖ wɩ: «Maŋa maa bɩɩna, yɩ amʋ wʋ́ go ni-dʋʋrɩ a pa a nɔɔna bam, kʋ nan yɩ Yisɩrayɛlɩ dwi tiinǝ dɩ Zuda dwi tiinǝ bam maama mʋ.
58008009	Ni-dʋʋrɩ dɩntʋ bá ta nyɩ dɩ dayigǝ ni dɩlʋ amʋ na goni a pa ba nabaara bam maŋa kalʋ a na jaanɩ ba jɩŋa a pa ba nuŋi Ezipi tɩʋ kʋm wʋnɩ tɩn. Bantʋ dɛɛn wʋ sɛ ba tɔgɩ ni dɩlʋ amʋ na goni dɩ ba tɩn. Kʋntʋ mʋ pa a yigǝ daa tǝri ba wʋnɩ.» Mʋ Yuutu Baŋa-Wɛ na tagɩ kʋlʋ tɩn. DƖ daa ta ma ta DƖ wɩ:
